en: Customer: Hello, Customer: I am unable to get access to the books in French in my library. Customer: With Rodrigues, I only have access to the books in English Customer: and Customer: Rodrigues, it says: Customer: Not allowed with Rodrigues. Customer: Thanks for your help. Customer: dupontarthur@brunel.fr Customer: No purchase to date. Agent: Hello Agnès Baudry! Agent: My name is Agnès Baudry and I will assist you Agent: Please tell me which device you are using Customer: Rodrigues Agent: Please tell me which software version you have Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: Beside ‘Software version’, you’ll see your eReader’s software number. Agent: The software number will look something like this: “4" Customer: 4 Customer: I checked the updates and it shows that the software is up to date. Agent: Yes it is. Agent: We will do some troubleshooting Agent: We will start Agent: Please go to http://launay.fr/ and add a freee book to your account. Agent: Then tap the sync icon on your Rodrigues device. Agent: We will see with this if the device has access to internet Customer: Yes it worked. Agent: One question Agent: The problem is with Rodrigues or with Rodrigues? Agent: You have access on your Rodrigues to Rodrigues? Customer: With both. Agent: Ok then we will continue with obverdrive and then with Rodrigues Customer: I have access to Rodrigues, I logged into my library but it only gives me access to the books in English. Customer: Furthermore, if I want to buy a book from Agnès Baudry, I don't have access to Rodrigues. Agent: Will you purchase that book on the Rodrigues store? Customer: No. Agent: Ok, let's fix first Rodrigues Agent: But if you don't have access to french books it is probably because it is not enabled by the bookstore Agent: You have access to all your Rodrigues books? Customer: Yes. Agent: Ok please do this steps Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the Menu icon at the top of the screen. Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: Under Rodrigues, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: Tap Sign out. Agent: Then sign in Customer: Okay. Agent: Tell me when you are signed in Customer: Done. Agent: Open Rodrigues and see if you can see the books Agent: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes. Customer: I logged in. Customer: The Rodrigues doesn't work well, it always goes on standby. Agent: Ok, now on your Rodrigues try to see if you can see the books Agent: If you cant see the books, or open them, please tell me Customer: I can see my books in English but not those in  Customer: French. Agent: Ok, then we have a compatibility error Agent: The compatibility error refers to a common issue where a book available at a public library has a ProductID that is different from the one we have at Rodrigues but the ISBNs are the same. Agent: Because of this issue, the book won't sync over Rodrigues and the customer might need to use Rodrigues to side load the book. Agent: Do you want me to assist you to install Rodrigues (Rodrigues)?? Customer: Is it possible that my library uses Rodrigues for books in English and another software for books in French Customer: yes, I want to install Rodrigues Agent: Yes it is possible, that is why we have compatibility errors sometimes. Agent: Ok, let's start with Rodrigues Agent: Do you have a computer close to you? Customer: yes Customer: I'm chatting with you on my computer Agent: Rodrigues or Rodrigues? Customer: window Customer: Rodrigues Agent: Ok, please on a new slide open this link and download Rodrigues Agent: http://launay.fr/. Customer: done, I think I already have it on the computer and on an account Agent: You already have it installed? Customer: I don't know, but I have Rodrigues on the computer Agent: No. Agent: Ok, we will do this Agent: I will send you an article via email. Agent: But we will have to end this chat as I can't send it through here Agent: This link will show you how to install and transfer your books Customer: Ok Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: No, but I didn't receive the email Agent: We will have to close this chat. Agent: After that I will be able to send you emails (the article with instructions) Customer: ok

fr: Client: Bonjour, j'ai un soucis d'autorisation d'Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. sur ma liseuse Client: Je n'arrive pas à modifier l'autorisation Client: adelaide60@yahoo.fr Client: aujpurd'hui Agent: Merci pour ces informations. Agent: Je me ferai un plaisir de vous aider. Client: du coup comment faire pour avoir l'autorisation de Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. sur ma liseuse ? Client: j'ai fait les différentes étapes, je ne comprends pas où ça bloque Agent: Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. est une application tierce (de Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. et non Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.) mais nous pouvons recommander quelques étapes pour essayer de corriger cela, comme conseillé par la source (Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.). Agent: Tout d'abord, réinitialisez l'autorisation sur votre Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. Agent: Assurez-vous que les paramètres de date et d'heure de votre liseuse Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. sont corrects. Agent: Vous devriez les trouver dans le menu Paramètres de votre Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Branchez votre Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. sur votre ordinateur (en utilisant le câble USB fourni avec votre Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.). Agent: Ouvrez Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. sur votre ordinateur. Agent: Utilisez Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. pour supprimer l'eBook qui cause des problèmes de votre Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. et de votre ordinateur (assurez-vous de choisir l'option Supprimer de la bibliothèque). Agent: Cliquez sur votre Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. dans le menu « Appareils » sur la gauche. Agent: Cliquez sur l'icône d'engrenage des préférences des appareils à côté d'« Appareils », puis sélectionnez Effacer l'autorisation de l'appareil. Agent: Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation, puis OK pour confirmer. Agent: Essayez de réinitialiser l'autorisation dans Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. Agent: Dans Dumas Marin S.A.R.L., appuyez sur Ctrl + Maj + D (Commande + Maj + D sur un Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.) sur votre clavier. Agent: Dans la fenêtre contextuelle qui s'ouvre, entrez le mot de passe de votre identifiant Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. ou de votre compte Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. (et assurez-vous que le bon identifiant Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. est répertorié dans le menu déroulant). Agent: Ensuite, cliquez sur Continuer. Agent: Sélectionnez Effacer l'autorisation, puis OK. Agent: Autorisez à nouveau votre ordinateur en allant dans Aide > Autoriser l'ordinateur. Agent: Remarque : Assurez-vous de réautoriser votre ordinateur en utilisant le même identifiant Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. qu'auparavant. Agent: Sinon, vous ne pourrez pas télécharger à nouveau votre eBook. Agent: Essayez à nouveau de transférer l'eBook. Agent: Téléchargez à nouveau l'eBook qui causait des problèmes. Agent: Transférez l'eBook de Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. sur votre Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Cette étape autorisera également votre Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Essayez d'ouvrir le titre sur votre Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Comment cela se passe-t-il ? Client: Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. ne fonctionne pas Agent: Vous pouvez le faire manuellement. Pourriez-vous autoriser à nouveau la liseuse, à quelle étape êtes-vous bloqué ? Agent: Je suis désolé, pour des raisons de qualité, je devrai fermer ce chat si je ne reçois pas de réponse d'ici 2 minutes.
en: Customer: Hello, I have a concern regarding the Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. permission on my eReader Customer: I can't change the permission Customer: adelaide60@yahoo.fr Customer: today Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Customer: so how do I get permission from Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. on my reader? Customer: I followed the various steps, I don't know where it goes wrong Agent: Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. is a third party app (from Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. not Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.) however we can recommend afew steps to try to correct this as advised by the source (Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.) Agent: First, reset the authorization on your Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. Agent: Make sure the date and time settings on your Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. eReader are correct. Agent: You should find these in the Settings menu on your Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Plug your Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. into your computer (using the USB cable that came with your Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.). Agent: Open Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. on your computer. Agent: Use Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. to delete the eBook that's causing issues from your Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. and your computer (make sure to choose the Remove from Library option). Agent: Click on your Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. under the "Devices" menu on the left. Agent: Click device options gear icon next to "Devices," then select Erase Device Authorization. Agent: Click Erase Authorization, then OK to confirm. Agent: Try to reset the authorization in Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. Agent: In Dumas Marin S.A.R.L., press Ctrl + Shift + D (Command + Shift + D on a Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.) on your keyboard. Agent: In the pop-up window that opens, enter the password for your Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. ID or Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. account (and make sure the correct Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. ID is listed in the drop-down menu). Agent: Then, click Continue. Agent: Select Erase Authorization, then OK. Agent: Authorize your computer again by going to Help > Authorize Computer. Agent: Note: Make sure to reauthorize your computer using the same Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. ID as before. Agent: Otherwise, you won't be able to re-download your eBook Agent: Try transferring the eBook again Agent: Re-download the eBook that was causing issues Agent: Transfer the eBook from Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. to your Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.. Agent: This step will also reauthorize your Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Try opening the title on your Dumas Marin S.A.R.L.. Agent: how it is going? Customer: Dumas Marin S.A.R.L. doesn't work Agent: you can do it manually, could you reauthorize the ereader, on which step are you stuck? Agent: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes.

Client: Bonjour Client: Le bouton On/Off de ma liseuse neuve ne fonctionne pas. Client: Pouvez-vous faire un échange standard ? Agent: Je m’excuse pour le malentendu, Zoé de la Morvan, il semble que nous puissions remplacer votre appareil. Agent: Votre liseuse Valentin ou tablette peut être remplacée sous garantie. Agent: Je confirme par la présente que votre appareil Valentin sera remplacé conformément à notre politique de garantie. 04531 Sainte Thibault - Téléphone :  364975988 - produit : Valentin Liseuse Valentin - 8" - 300ppp - Valentin – Waterproof Client: Je n'arrive pas à télécharger la facture, ill y a toujours un message d'erreur qui s'affiche. Client: désolée l'adresse complète est 2, rue de Boulanger
04531 Sainte Thibault Agent: Ok, il me manque seulement la province ou la région. Agent: Zoé de la Morvan, Zoé de la Morvan, Zoé de la Morvan ... etc.? Customer: Hello Customer: The On/Off button my new e-reader does not work. Customer: Can you make a standard exchange? Customer: Thank you Customer: Zoé de la Morvan Customer: I used jlebrun@didier.org by logging in with my Valentin account Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: I understand that your e-reader's power button is not working properly, correct? Agent: Did you purchase this device at any local retail store or was it through the Valentin online store? Customer: it was purchased from c-discount, which directed me to your customer service Agent: Is this a local retail store? Customer: no, it's an online store Agent: Ok, completely understand, could you please verify which is your e-reader model? Customer: Valentin - 8" - 300ppp - Valentin – Waterproof Agent: Ok, great, thank you. Agent: one moment, please Agent: I understand that you got it on an online electronic device trade market, was your e-reader a new device? Customer: yes Agent: Correct, however as  the purchase was not made with Valentin I am afraid that we can not issue a replacement. Agent: You would need to get in touch directly with c discount and claim either a refund or an exchange for a new device Agent: Do you have a proof of purchase by any chance? Agent: Sorry for the misunderstanding, Zoé de la Morvan, it seems that we will be able to replace your device Agent: your Valentin or tablet qualifies for replacement under warranty. Agent: This is to confirm that your Valentin device will be replaced as per our warranty policy Agent: To proceed with the replacement, please answer all the following questions: Agent: Part 1 - Your Contact Information Agent: Name: Agent: Street Name and number: Agent: Apartment // Suite// Other: Agent: City: Agent: State/Province/Territory: Agent: Country: Agent: Zip/Post Code: Agent: Telephone #: Agent: Device name: Customer: Zoé de la Morvan Customer: Zoé de la Morvan - 2, rue de Boulanger
04531 Sainte Thibault - Phone: 364975988 - product: Valentin E-reader Valentin - 8"- 300ppp - Valentin - Waterproof Customer: I can't download the invoice, I keep getting an error message. Customer: sorry, the full address is 2, rue de Boulanger
04531 Sainte Thibault Agent: Ok, I am just missing the province or region Agent: Zoé de la Morvan, Zoé de la Morvan, Zoé de la Morvan...etc.? Customer: it is useless in France: the zip code 364975988 indicates that it's Ile-de-france Agent: Ok, thank you Agent: Your replacement request has been successfully submitted. Agent: You will now receive a link to validate your information Agent: • Review your mailing information (and edit if necessary) and the replacement device being shipped to you to insure accuracy. Agent: • Once all shipping information and replacement device is reviewed, click on “Agree” at the bottom of the screen. Agent: • Within 3 business days, a Valentin pick-up appointment booking link is sent to you via email. Agent: • Upon receiving the link, follow the instruction provided. Agent: • Once your defective device is received by Valentin, a replacement device will be shipped. Agent: • You will receive an email with the tracking information (Allow 10 to 15 business days for delivery) Customer: Understood, thanks for your help. Agent: You're welcome! Agent: Thank you for contacting Valentin, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day. Customer: Have a great day as well, thank you.

fr: Client: J’ai un Olivier SA et je n’ai plus le NIP pour débarrer la liseuse et le site de Olivier SA ne m’indique pas la bonne solution pour remplacer le NIP Client: reythierry@free.fr Client: Trop longtemps sans m’en servir et ma fille voudrait l’utiliser Agent: Merci pour l'information. Agent: Je serai ravi de vous aider. Agent: Veuillez m'accorder un moment pour vérifier le compte. Agent: Merci pour votre patience Agent: Pouvez-vous me confirmer votre code postal ? Client: ULQKFRD1, cadeau de l’entreprise Olivier SA à l’époque où ma belle fille y travaillait Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Si je comprends bien, essayez-vous de configurer le tour Olivier SA ? Client: L’écran d’accueil est barré et nécessite un NIP pour ouvrir l’accès à la liseuse. Client: Il ne met impossible de rien faire sans ce NIP et je voudrais réseter complètement la liseuse Agent: Est-ce le mot de passe de votre e-mail ou le code d'accès à votre liseuse ? Client: L’écran d’accueil de la liseuse est barré Agent: Je vois, dans ce cas vous pouvez essayer une réinitialisation manuelle mais votre modèle est un ancien modèle, nous ne pouvons pas garantir que le processus fonctionnera, vous pouvez essayer ces étapes. Agent: 1 Agent: Connectez votre liseuse à une source d'alimentation en effectuant l'une des opérations suivantes : Agent: - Allumez votre ordinateur et connectez d'abord le cordon d'alimentation USB fourni à votre ordinateur, puis à votre liseuse. Agent: - Branchez le chargeur mural (non inclus) sur une prise de courant, puis connectez votre liseuse au chargeur mural. Agent: 2 Agent: Appuyez sur le bouton d'alimentation et maintenez-le enfoncé jusqu'à ce que le voyant d'alimentation situé dans le coin supérieur droit de votre liseuse s'éteigne. Agent: Vous verrez un écran « Éteint » lorsque votre liseuse est éteinte. Agent: 3 Agent: Relâchez le bouton d'alimentation. Agent: 4 Agent: Maintenez enfoncé le bouton d'alimentation de votre liseuse pendant 30 secondes. Agent: 5 Agent: Attendez que l'écran de restauration apparaisse. Agent: 6 Agent: Relâchez le bouton d'alimentation. Agent: Votre écran liseuse deviendra noir et commencera le processus de restauration. Agent: c'est possible ? Agent: Je continue avec vous. Client: Je comprend pas car le câble USB est le câble utilisé pour branchement mural et ne peut pas en même temps être raccordé à mon ordinateur ! Client: Il n’y a pas deux branchement possible sur la liseuse ! Agent: Vous pouvez essayer la réinitialisation des paramètres d'usine après avoir chargé la liseuse pendant au moins une heure. Client: Mais l’écran est quand même locked et je ne peux rien faite sans avoir réseter le NIP. Client: Comment je peux faire la réinitialisation sans avoir le NIP ? Client: Donner moi les étapes précise pour que je puisse essayer de repartir avec les paramètres d’usine ! Client: Je continu avec vous ?! Agent: Comme je l'ai déjà mentionné, vous pouvez essayer une réinitialisation manuelle, mais ce n'est pas garanti. Appuyez sur le bouton d'alimentation et maintenez-le enfoncé pendant 30 secondes et voyez si la page de restauration s'affiche. Client: J’ai fais cette étapes mais l’écran de restauration n’apparaît pas ! Agent: Je vois, malheureusement, votre liseuse est un ancien modèle et ne prend pas en charge ce processus de restauration, la seule façon de réactiver votre liseuse est en entrant le bon code PIN Agent: Si la restauration avec le bouton d'alimentation est possible à un moment donné, vous pouvez essayer une mise à jour manuelle :
en: Customer: I have a Olivier SA and I no longer have the PIN to unlock the eReader, and the Olivier SA site does not provide a correct solution to replace the PIN Customer: reythierry@free.fr Customer: I haven't used it for a long time and my daughter would like to use it Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a moment to verify the account. Agent: thanks for waiting Agent: can you please confirm your postal code for me? Customer: ULQKFRD1, a gift from the company Olivier SA when my daughter-in-law was working there Agent: thank you very much Agent: If i understand correctly are you trying  to set up tour Olivier SA ? Customer: The home screen is locked and requires a PIN to provide access to the eReader. Customer: I can't do anything without this PIN and I would like to completely reset the eReader Agent: Is it your email password or the eReader pin? Customer: The eReader's home screen is locked Agent: I see, in this case you can try a manual reset but your model is an old model, we cannot guarantee that the process will work, you can try these stepsL Agent: 1 Agent: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following: Agent: - Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader. Agent: - Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger. Agent: 2 Agent: Press and hold the power button until the power light on the top-right corner of your eReader turns off. Agent: You'll see a 'Powered off' screen when your eReader is turned off. Agent: 3 Agent: Release the power button. Agent: 4 Agent: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds. Agent: 5 Agent: Wait for the Restore screen to appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Release the power button. Agent: Your eReader screen will turn black and begin the restoring process. Agent: is it possible? Agent: I continue with you Customer: I don't understand, because the USB cable is the cable that is connected to the wall but cannot be connected to my computer! Customer: The eReader doesn't allow two connections! Agent: you can try the factory reset after charging the erader for at least 1 hours Customer: But the screen is still locked and I can't do anything without resetting the PIN. Customer: How can I reset it without the PIN? Customer: Please provide the exact steps so that I can try to restore the factory settings! Customer: Are we connected?! Agent: As I mentioned before, you can try a manual reset but it's not guaranteed to work, press and hold your power button for 30 seconds and see if the restore page shows up Customer: I did this step, but the restoration screen does not appear! Agent: I see, unfortunately your eReader is an old model and does not support this restoration process, the only way to reactivate your eReader is by entering the correct PIN Agent: if the restoration with the power button is possible at some time, then you can try a manual update:

Client: Bonjour, Client: Le 24/12, j'ai acheté une liseuse Gautier. Client: Dès la première utilisation, j'ai remarqué un problème, l'écran à tendance à "sauter" c'est à dire deviens un instant noir puis reviens. Client: Il le fait dès que l'on change de page ou dans la menu. Client: Je suis allé voir le vendeur qui a constater le problème mais la procédure SAV me renvoie vers vous. Client: Que faire? Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Gautier, pouvez-vous s'il vous plaît fournir l'adresse email de votre compte Gautier ? Client: sadam@live.com Agent: Merci pour l'information. Agent: Ce sera un plaisir pour moi de vous aider. Agent: Je comprends que vous rencontrez des problèmes avec le logiciel sur votre toute nouvelle liseuse, n'est-ce pas ? Client: Oui à chaque fois que je vais dessus l'écran deviens noir quelques secondes puis reviens à la normale Client: J'ai vu avec le SAV et le vendeur qui m'ont dit que ce n'est pas normale Agent: C'est exact, alors avez-vous obtenu votre appareil chez un détaillant local ? Client: Le Gautier, le coin CDiscount Agent: Avez-vous amené votre e-reader avec une preuve d'achat chez eux pour leur expliquer le problème ? en:
Customer: Hello, Customer: I bought a Gautier reader on December 24. Customer: I noticed a problem the first time I used it, the screen tends to "jump", that is, to become black for a moment and then get back to normal. Customer: It does this when I change the page or when I'm in the menu. Customer: I went to see the seller, who confirmed the problem, but the after-sales service procedure directed me to you. Customer: What should I do? Agent: Thank you for contacting Gautier, can you please provide the email address of your Gautier account? Customer: sadam@live.com Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: I understand that you are having issues with the software on your brand new e-reader, correct? Customer: Yes, every time I go there, the screen turns black for a few seconds then becomes normal again. Customer: I saw it with the after-sales service and with the seller, who told me that this is not normal Agent: This is correct, so did you get your device with a local retailer? Customer: The Gautier, CDiscount section Agent: Have you taken your e-reader with a proof of purchase with them and explained the problem? Customer: Yes, I took everything, I know the procedure because I also work there. Agent: Ok, and why is it that you were not able to get a replacement? Customer: The after-sales service procedure says I should contact the supplier directly, and it was the last one on stock. Agent: Completely understand, ok, no problem. Agent: Let's just try the following troubleshooting steps to see if the issue can be fixed> Customer: Okay Agent: Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger. Agent: Press and hold the power button until you see the words "Powered off" at the top of the screen. Agent: Continue holding down the power button for 3-4 seconds. Agent: Release the power button. Agent: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds. Agent: Wait for the 'Restore' screen to appear. Agent: Release the power button. Customer: There is the sync symbol and it's loading Agent: Great Agent: After the e-reader has been reset, it will ask you to set your language preferences and a WiFi network. Agent: After that you will need to sign in with your e-mail address and password Customer: As soon as it turned on and the language choice was shown, it restarted Customer: Every time I do something, the screen turns black for a few moments Agent: I see, don't worry, I'm happy to inform you that your Gautier or tablet qualifies for replacement under warranty. Agent: To proceed with the replacement, please answer all the following questions: Agent: Name: Agent: Street Name and number: Agent: Apartment // Suite// Other: Agent: City: Agent: State/Province/Territory: Agent: Country: Agent: Zip/Post Code: Agent: Telephone #: Agent: Device name: Customer: 43, rue Sauvage
87759 Picard; 01 42 65 50 10; Gautier! Customer: Is it possible to get a refund from my store? Agent: I am sorry, If you would like to have a refund you would need to see it directly at your store Agent: Gautier can only issue a replacement Customer: Ok, but for a refund the store needs the agreement of the supplier. Customer: It's just that I'm afraid I'll get another defective product! Agent: Completely understand, if you would like we can start the replacement process and you would be getting a brand new device from out headquarters Agent: If you would like to have a refund that would need to be treated directly with the store from where you got it Customer: So I get a replacement and send you this one? Agent: That's correct Customer: Can you send me a return label? Customer: And I'll send it to you as soon as I get the other one? Agent: You will first receive a link to validate your information Agent: • Review your mailing information (and edit if necessary) and the replacement device being shipped to you to insure accuracy. Agent: • Once all shipping information and replacement device is reviewed, click on “Agree” at the bottom of the screen. Agent: • Within 3 business days, a Gautier pick-up appointment booking link is sent to you via email. Agent: • Upon receiving the link, follow the instruction provided. Agent: • Once your defective device is received by Gautier, a replacement device will be shipped. Agent: • You will receive an email with the tracking information (Allow 10 to 15 business days for delivery) Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: No, thank you Agent: Ok, Im glad. Agent: Thank you for contacting Gautier, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day. Customer: Thank you very much, have a nice day

Client: entre 1 et 3 jours (2 livres) Client: code promo Client: petitluc@klein.fr Agent: Merci pour l'information. Agent: Nous serons heureux de vous aider. Agent: Heureux de vous rencontrer, Émile Turpin. Agent: Nous espérons que vous passez une bonne journée. Agent: Veuillez nous accorder quelques minutes pour trouver votre compte. Agent: Merci pour votre patience. Agent: Juste pour vérifier votre compte, pouvez-vous nous fournir votre code postal, s'il vous plaît ? Client: 30, chemin de Pinto
39771 Pasquier Agent: Merci pour la vérification. Agent: Comment pouvons-nous vous aider ? Agent: Quel est le code promo avec lequel vous rencontrez des problèmes ? Agent: Est-il possible que vous puissiez me le fournir, s'il vous plaît ? Client: JFCNFRAOMH6 Client: je l'ai reçu aujourd'hui Agent: Merci beaucoup, Émile Turpin Agent: Nous venons de trouver le code promo dans nos archives et nous pouvons voir qu'il s'agit de vous donner un eBook VIP gratuit, lié à l'adhésion VIP que vous avez sur votre compte. Agent: Avez-vous rencontré un problème avec le code ? Client: y a-t-il une liste spéciale car je suis les indications,je choisis un livre et on me dis que le code ne fonctionne pas ou est expiré. Client: Que faire? Agent: En effet, généralement lorsque vous avez reçu le code promo par e-mail, sur le même e-mail, il y a un lien qui vous redirigera vers une liste d' eBooks qui peut être ajoutée à votre compte en utilisant votre code promo. Agent: Si vous vérifiez l'e-mail, pouvez-vous voir le lien ? Client: parcourir la liste et je tombe sur la page de la librairie ...pas de liste spéciale ...on donne ou pas ? Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Il est possible que la liste des eBooks soit disponible, mais juste au cas où, pouvez-vous m'aider à vérifier si votre code promo fonctionne sur les eBooks à partir de ce lien, s'il vous plaît : Client: faut que j'aille à cette adresse ? Agent: Oui, s'il vous plaît. Agent: Si c'est possible pour vous, nous vous suggérons d'essayer d'ouvrir le lien dans un autre onglet de navigateur, afin que vous puissiez essayer d'utiliser le code pendant que nous continuons notre discussion. Client: DÉCEPTION : c'est tout des livres en anglais pourtant mon compte est en français ... Agent: Dans ce cas, essayez d'utiliser ce lien à la place : Agent: Désolé, cela devrait être la liste exclusive des eBooks sélectionnés que nous avons pour le code VIP en français.  Client: vous êtes bon pour prendre l'argent mais radin dans vos supposé cadeaux ...très déçue encore une fois ...merci pour tes efforts ,c'est pas ta faute mais si tu peux transmettre ce message à ton patron...sûrement que ça l'empêchera pas de dormir mais bon... Agent: Pas de problème, Émile Turpin. Agent: Nous sommes désolés de l'apprendre et nous serons heureux de transmettre vos commentaires au département supérieur, afin qu'ils puissent recevoir. Agent: En attendant, si vous préférez, nous avons vérifié la situation avec notre équipe, et nous pourrions ajouter un eBook à un prix maximum de 15,00 $ depuis notre site Web Raymond SA vers votre compte Raymond SA. Agent: Si vous avez en tête un eBook dont le prix est inférieur à 15,00 $, veuillez nous fournir le titre et l'auteur de l'eBook et nous pourrons l'ajouter à votre compte. Agent: Et encore une fois, nous sommes vraiment désolés que la liste des eBooks en français soit limitée pour le moment, nous sommes sûrs que vos commentaires seront utiles pour continuer à élargir la liste à l'avenir. Client: And thanks again for your efforts. Client: Do I have to go to the site for the book? Agent: Bien sûr. Agent: Ce sera un plaisir d'ajouter cet eBook à votre compte. Agent: Et ne vous inquiétez pas, en raison de l'inconvénient du code et des eBooks en français, nous pouvons l'ajouter à votre compte sans vous facturer l'eBook du tout. Agent: Merci pour votre patience Client: I really appreciate your help. Client: Enjoy the rest of your day and have a good weekend. Agent: Vous êtes le bienvenu, Émile Turpin Agent: C'est un plaisir de faire tout ce que nous pouvons pour vous aider et nous sommes si heureux que vous puissiez maintenant profiter de cet eBook. Agent: Et merci beaucoup. Agent: Bonne journée et un bon week-end aussi.
en:
Customer: from 1 to 3 days (2 books) Customer: promo code Customer: petitluc@klein.fr Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Nice to meet you, Émile Turpin. Agent: I hope you are having a great day! Agent: Please, allow me a few minutes to find your account. Agent: Thank you for your patience! Agent: Just to verify your account, can you provide me your postal code, please? Customer: 30, chemin de Pinto
39771 Pasquier Agent: Thank you for the verification! Agent: How can I help you? Agent: What is the promo code you are having problems with? Agent: Is it possible you can provide it to me, please? Customer: JFCNFRAOMH6 Customer: I received it today Agent: Thank you so much, Émile Turpin! Agent: I just found the promo code under our records and I can see it is to give you a free VIP eBook, related to the VIP membership you have on your account. Agent: Do you were experiencing a problem using the code? Customer: is there a special list? I followed the instructions, I chose a book, and I'm getting a message saying that the code doesn't work or has expired. Customer: What should I do? Agent: Indeed, usually when you received the promo code via email, on the same email, there is a link that will redirect you to a list of eBooks that can be added to your account  using your promo code. Agent: If you check the email, can you see the link? Customer: I browse the list and I go to the bookstore page... no special list... is it there or not? Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: It is possible that is the list of eBooks available, but just in case, can you help me verify if your promo code works on the eBooks from this link, please: Customer: must I go to this address? Agent: Oh, yes please! Agent: If it is possible for you, I suggest you try to open the link in a different browser tab so you can try to use the code while we continue our chat. Customer: DISAPPOINTMENT: all books are in English though my account is in French... Agent: In that case, please try to use this link instead: Agent: Sorry, that should be the exclusive list of selected eBooks we have for the VIP code in French. Customer: you're very efficient when it's about receiving money, but very stingy with your so-called gifts... very disappointed again... thanks for your efforts, it's not your fault but please convey this message to your boss... he won't lose any sleep over this but... Agent: No problem, Émile Turpin. Agent: I am sorry to know about this and I will be happy to provide your feedback to the higher department so they can receive. Agent: In the meantime, if you prefer, I checked the situation with my team and we could kindly add an eBook with a maximum price of $15.00 from our Raymond SA website  to your Raymond SA account. Agent: If you have an eBook in mind that has a price less than $15.00, please provide me the title and author of the eBook and we can add it to your account! Agent: And once again, I am very sorry about the list of eBooks in French being limited at the moment, I am sure  your feedback will be helpful to continue expanding the list in the future! Customer: And thanks again for your efforts. Customer: Do I have to go to the site for the book? Agent: Of course! Agent: It will be my pleasure to add this eBook to your account! Agent: And don't worry about it, due to the inconvenience with the code and the eBooks in French, we can add it to your account without charging you the eBook at all. Agent: Thank you for your patience! Customer: I really appreciate your help. Customer: Happy end of the day and happy new year to you. Agent: You're welcome, Émile Turpin! Agent: It is a pleasure to do everything we can to help you and I am so happy you can now enjoy this eBook! Agent: And thank you very much. Agent: I wish you have a lovely day and a nice weekend, too!

Agent: 5 Agent: Ensuite, vérifiez s'il peut être ouvert sur votre liseuse Client: J'autorise les deux à partir de Devaux. Client: Je parlais déjà avec quelqu'un, mais elle a quitté le chat avant que je lui pose mes dernière question Agent: Bonjour Yves-Laurent Fischer Agent: Accordez-moi un moment pour examiner l'interaction Agent: Oui, on dirait qu'elle a rencontré des problèmes techniques Agent: Avez-vous autorisé votre liseuse et votre ordinateur ? Client: J'ai fermé ma liseuse et je vais l'ouvrir de nouveau. Agent: S'il vous plaît veuillez m'indiquer si cela vous a aidé. Agent: Oui, et demandez à la réinitialisation de la licence Devaux de votre livre. en: Customer: I am no longer able to put a book on my Devaux. Customer: andreperrot@david.fr Customer: I never bought a book. Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Customer: I will explain. Customer: When I download a book from my municipal library, an error message is shown on my e-Reader. Customer: My e-Reader indicates this to me: Your e-Reader is not allowed to open this book. Agent: Are you using the same email for your eReader, Yves-Laurent Fischer and your library? Customer: This book is protected by Devaux digital rigth management. Customer: Having previously unauthorized your e-Reader, you must re-import it using Devaux. Customer: Yes. Customer: I reset my e-Reader believing that it was going to fix the problem. Agent: What is the model of your eReeader? Customer: Devaux Agent: Could you please provide me with your eReader's software version? Agent: 1)Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2)Tap the More icon at the bottom right of the screen. Agent: 3)Tap Settings. Agent: 4)Tap Device information. Agent: 5)Beside 'Software version', you'll see your eReader's version number. Agent: A version number will look something like this: "916640461 (#DEVICEID#, 5/27/19)" Customer: 916640461 (EATLFR11XI2, 09/11/2020) Agent: Thank you very much, I recommend you to follow these steps: Agent: 1 Agent: Deauthorize both, the device and your computer. Agent: Close the program. Agent: 2 Agent: Then open the program, re-authorize the computer and the device using an Devaux ID. Agent: Close the program. Agent: 3 Agent: Delete all the files from the ebooks of your computer, even from the recycle bin. Agent: You'll have to request your library to reset the Devaux license of the ebook and request a new copy of the ebook Agent: 4 Agent: Please open Devaux again and you are supposed to be able to download the book to your computer and then copy it to the device. Agent: 5 Agent: Then verify if it can be open in your reader Customer: I allow both from Devaux. Customer: I was already talking to someone, but she left the chat before I asking her my last question Agent: Hi Yves-Laurent Fischer Agent: Allow me a moment to review the interaction Agent: Yes, seems like she had some technical issues Agent: Have you authorized your eReader and computer? Customer: I would like to erase all the books in Devaux, but I am not able. Customer: I erase them and when I reopen Devaux, they return Agent: Ok, one moment please Agent: I am sorry we con disconnected. Agent: Are you not able to delete the files from your computer? Customer: I delete via Devaux and when I open it, they are always Yves-Laurent Fischer Customer: There Customer: I removed the permission on my e-Reader and in Devaux. Customer: I have closed my e-Reader and I will open it again. Agent: Please let me know if that helped. Customer: In fact, it is this stage that I do not know Customer: 3 Customer: Delete all files of the eBooks from your computer, even from the trash. Customer: You will need to ask your library to reset the eBook Devaux license and request a new copy of the eBook Customer: Do you want me to contact my municipal library? Agent: Yes, and ask the to reset the Devaux license of your book. Customer: I tried with another e-Reader and it works Agent: It is important for you to delete the old file of the book and download the file with the new license. Customer: My e-Reader is the problem. Customer: I try with lots of books and no book works. Customer: But, it works with another e-Reader. Customer: I think the problem comes from my e-Reader and not from the license. Agent: In that case you can keep the same license but please remove the files fro your computer and download the again. Customer: it does not work Agent: Could you please let me know what does the error says? Customer: Your e-Reader is not allowed to open this book Customer: This book is protected by Devaux digital rigth management. Customer: Having previously unauthorized your reader, you must re-import it using Devaux. Agent: That error message is because it is detecting a different email. Agent: Please verify again that you are using the same email for Devaux, your eReader and your library. Customer: It is really weird because it worked for 2 years and it does not work anymore Customer: I have not changed anything. Agent: Another option is to Devaux or use a different version of Devaux. Agent: Which version of Devaux are you using? Customer: 4.5 Customer: can you refer me to someone in Mauricie? Agent: Have you tried to use the previous version? Agent: You'll have to de-authorize both, the device and your computer. Agent: Then uninstall Devaux. Agent: Then restart your computer and install Devaux again. Agent: If you are able you can use the previous version of Devaux. Customer: Ok Agent: We don;t have repair centers, We can assist you via chat. Customer: It is been 4 times that I connect with someone, and my problem persists. Agent: You will receive an email with a copy of this interaction. Agent: I can continue assisting you there. Customer: I understand. Customer: I will try again and re-communicate next time.

fr: Client: je ne suis pas capable davoir des livres que je veux payer je recoit les livres gratuit sans problemes mais pas les livres acheté Client: roland87@thomas.com Client: je viend dacheté les trois chocs culturel covid 19 a 1.14 Client: je recois mon compte mais je ne lai pas sur ma liaeuse Agent: Permettez-moi de vérifier les livres sur votre compte, juste un instant, s'il vous plaît. Client: je ne voit que ceux de ma liseuse Client: et je ne voit pas celui que jai acheté Agent: Très bien, veuillez me confirmer le titre de ce livre, Benoît Texier. Client: les trois chocs culturels covid 19 Agent: D'accord, le livre n'est pas dans le compte sous l'e-mail que vous m'avez donné, il est donc possible que vous l'ayez acheté dans un autre compte par erreur. Agent: Nous devrons faire remonter le problème afin que notre équipe trouve le livre et que le transfère sur le bon compte. Agent: Pourriez-vous nous fournir les informations suivantes ? Agent: - La date à laquelle vous avez été facturé : Agent: - Le montant : Agent: - Le code postal (celui indiqué sur l'adresse de facturation du relevé bancaire) : Agent: - Les 4 premiers et 4 derniers chiffres de la carte de crédit : Agent: - Le nom de famille du titulaire de la carte de crédit : Client: 1319 marois Client: HNKGFRTFGJG je vais aller voir la date du mois de novembre un instant Client: ma derniere achet le 17 novembre 1.79 Agent: Merci Benoît Texier, mais nous avons besoin de la date et du montant de l'achat manquant, pas d'un achat plus ancien. Client: le 20 dec aujourdhui au montant de .99 plus taxe 1.44 Agent: Merci Benoît Texier. Client: ou 1.23 Client: cest peutb etre 1.24 Client: cest 1.14 Agent: Merci Benoît Texier. Agent: Nous transmettrons votre problème à notre équipe, pour commencer à suivre votre achat, une fois que nous aurons trouvé le compte où il se trouve, nous vous recontacterons par e-mail, est-ce que cela vous convient ? Client: oui esce que cest pour aujourdhui ou un autre jour Agent: D'accord, nous procéderons à l'escalade du ticket pour que l'équipe commence à chercher l'achat. Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que nous pouvons faire pour vous aider ? Client: comment aller chercher des livres gratuit jai parfois des probleme a trouve des livres Agent: Vous pouvez utiliser la fonction de recherche dans le lecteur Mahe et Fils ou le site Web pour être affiché uniquement sur eBooks gratuit. Agent: Si vous avez d'autres problèmes ou questions, veuillez nous recontacter. Client: ok merci cest gentil Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Mahe et Fils. Agent: Bonne soirée.
en: Customer: I am not able to get the books I want after paying them. I receive free books without problems but not the books I buy. Customer: roland87@thomas.com Customer: I've just bought the three cultural shocks covid-19 for 1.14 Customer: I received it on my account but I can't see it in my reader. Agent: Let me check your account for the books, just a moment please. Agent: According to the system, the latest book was added in November, do you have the receipt number of the books you have recemt;y purchased? Customer: Benoît Texier received my account on my card but I don't remember the title Customer: And the last one I've just bought is not marked Agent: If you haven't recieve the receipts into your email it is possible you purchased the books in a different account by mistake. Agent: Do you have any other email address in which you might have another Mahe et Fils account? Customer: No Agent: Ok, Do you have  login to Mahe et Fils using Mahe et Fils? Customer: I tried to reconnect and it said I already have an account, I can't have 2 accounts Customer: I use Mahe et Fils to check my account Customer: I checked to see my visa credit card and this is the right number Agent: An user can have multiple accounts if they have different logins. Agent: But please tell me, what is the exact issue that you are having when you purchase books. Customer: I see the amount of the books and I finish my purchase, but I do not receive it on my reader Customer: I have no problems with free books Agent: When you finish the purchase do you get a success message that the books have been delivered to your account? Customer: No Agent: Are you sure the purchase is finished? Agent: Can you see the books in your purchase history at the Mahe et Fils website? Customer: I can only see those of my reader Customer: And I don't see the one I bought Agent: Ok, please confirm to me the title of that book, Benoît Texier. Customer: The three cultural shocks Covid-19 Agent: Ok, the book is not in the account under the email you gave me, so it is possible you purchased it under a different account by mistake. Agent: We will need to escalate the issue so that our Team finds the book and we transfer it to the correct account. Agent: Can you please provide us the following information? Agent: - Date you were charged: Agent: - Amount: Agent: - Postal code (The one shown on the bank statement billing address): Agent: - First 4 and Last 4 digits of the credit card: Agent: - Last name of the credit card holder: Customer: 1319 marois Customer: HNKGFRTFGJG I'm going to see the date of November, please wait a moment Customer: My last purchase was on November 17: 1.79 Agent: Thank you Benoît Texier, but we need the date an amount of the missing purchase, not from an older one. Customer: On dec 20, today, to the amount of .99 plus 1.44 tax Agent: Thank you Benoît Texier. Customer: Or 1.23 Customer: maybe 1.24 Customer: it's 1.14 Agent: Thank you Benoît Texier. Agent: I will forward your issue to our Team so they can start tracking your purchase, once we have found the account where it is, we will contact you back via email, is that ok? Customer: yes, is it for today or for another day Agent: Ok, I will proceed to escalate the ticket so the team starts searching for the purchase. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: how do I get free books? sometimes I have problems finding books Agent: You can use the search feature in the Mahe et Fils reader or the website to be shown only free ebooks. Customer: ok Agent: You can also use this link to search for free ebooks at the website: Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: That's correct, I just want to have the chance to buy books on sale, not only free books Agent: Do not worry, our Team will look for the purchase. Agent: If you have any other issues or questions, please contact us again. Customer: ok, thank you, that's very nice Agent: Thanks for contacting Mahe et Fils. Agent: HAve a good evening.

en: Customer: Hello, I can no longer download or play my audio books except one. Customer: However, I synchronized in vain. Customer: luce72@dbmail.com Customer: I do not find Customer: that was over a year ago Customer: my subscription is terminated, but I thought I would still have access to my books or only one: the tears of the cardinal. Customer: Yet I have already read 2 books in my list Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Are you using the Boyer or Boyer app? Customer: Boyer... Customer: I want to try to resubscribe, but I do not have Orange anymore. Customer: I have a Boyer account on the other hand. Agent: In this case, even when you don't have the subscription you should be able to play all the audiobooks in your account. Agent: At the moment, Boyer doesn't offer the Audiobook Subscription. Agent: If you wish to subscribe again it would need to be through Boyer, please. Customer: ok, but how to listen to my already downloaded books! Agent: In this case, I would advise you to sign out and sign back in from the Boyer app by following these steps: Agent: https://pottier.fr/ Agent: You would need your credentials to sign back in. Agent: Also, if you have books that are not from Boyer, please have a backup since the process would erase them. Customer: I have 9 books in my library. Customer: I had read 2 Customer: I have no book that does not come from Boyer but I cannot enter my Boyer account on the internet Boyer.com, I do not understand why. Agent: In order to access the account, you would need to use the Boyer login option, with your Boyer credentials, please. Agent: How is it going? Customer: I do not have to go on. Customer: I logged out and I come across login or create an account Agent: Are you getting an error message? Customer: no Customer: I am told that there is no account Customer: I had clicked on connect Agent: Could you go to More sign in options and then select Boyer, please? Customer: No account. Customer: however, I have verified my address e-mail in the account and just changed my Boyer password Agent: And are you able to access in the Boyer portal with those credentials? Customer: I am on Thibaut Mace on the account Boyer... Customer: but I think I have one because I have a Boyer card Agent: Please check if you can access on the Boyer portal. Customer: in fact, if I type my info, I get back on Thibaut Mace my husband Agent: I couldn't fully understand your last message. Agent: Could you rephrase it, please? Agent: I couldn't fully understand your last message. Agent: Could you rephrase it, please? Customer: When I type NLBBFRMS etc my Boyer credentials opens his page on Thibaut Mace and not on Thibaut Mace Agent: I see. Agent: In this case, we have two options: Agent: Yo can create a new account so I can transfer the audiobooks. Agent: Or we could escalate the case to generate a Boyer login option so that you don't have to use Boyer. Customer: yes, my account was linked to Orange, not to Boyer, and I'm no longer on Orange Customer: please do the simplest thing. Customer: thank you Agent: The fastest option is to create a new account. Agent: Once you create it, you can let me know so I can transfer the audiobooks. Customer: about Boyer? Agent: Yes, on https://pottier.fr/ please. Agent: How is it going? Customer: I'm being asked if I would like to login using the email address linked with a Boyer account. Customer: if I say yes, it doesn't work; if I tap on more options and tap Boyer, it directs me to Boyer. Customer: I'll use another email address! Agent: Yes, please try another e-mail address. Agent: How is it going? Customer: done! Agent: Great news! Agent: What is the e-mail address for the new account? Customer: luce72@dbmail.com Agent: Thank you. Agent: Just to confirm, have you made any purchase from that account? Customer: No Agent: Thank you. Agent: I just processed the library merge. Agent: You would just need to sync to see the audiobooks, please. Agent: Do you see the audiobooks correctly? Customer: yes, thank you! Customer: I'll upload them now Agent: You're welcome. Agent: I'm glad we could solve it. Agent: At the moment, is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: thank you so much, you've been great! Agent: Thank you very much, and you're welcome! Agent: I'm glad I could help. Agent: For now, that would be all from my side. Agent: Have a very good day.

fr: Client: bonjour, je ne recois pas le lien pour réinitialiser mon mot de passe oublié. Client: Ce problème persiste depuis hier. Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Vidal. Pourriez-vous fournir l'adresse email de votre compte Vidal ? Client: monique26@voila.fr Agent: Je vous remercie. fr: Client: Bonjour, je n'arrive pas à télécharger mes livres empruntés à la médiathèque Client: alain62@hernandez.com Client: orgueil et préjugés Agent: Je vous remercie. Agent: Je serai ravi de vous aider. Agent: Veuillez m'accorder quelques instants pour vérifier vos informations Agent: Pour essayer de résoudre ce problème, veuillez suivre ces instructions : Agent: Tout d'abord, connectez votre appareil Evrard S.A. à l'application Evrard S.A. pour ordinateur afin de le mettre à jour. Agent: Si vous avez besoin des étapes, veuillez suivre le lien suivant : https://vaillant.org/ Agent: Veuillez ensuite essayer de réparer le compte de votre appareil. Agent: Cette option met à jour tous vos eBooks et résout des problèmes comme des eBooks manquants, des erreurs de téléchargement ou si quelque chose ne fonctionne pas correctement dans votre compte Evrard S.A.. Agent: Suivez ces instructions pour synchroniser la réparation. Agent: Vous aurez besoin d'accéder à une connexion Wi-Fi active avant de commencer. Agent: Si vous avez une liseuse Evrard S.A. : Agent: 1 Agent: Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: 2 Agent: Appuyez sur « Paramètres ». Agent: 3 Agent: Appuyez sur l'option « Information sur l'appareil ». Agent: 4 Agent: Appuyez sur « Réparer ». Agent: 5 Agent: Appuyez sur « Réparer maintenant ». Agent: Ensuite : Agent: 1 Agent: Ouvrez Evrard S.A.. Agent: Annuler l'autorisation à la fois de votre liseuse et de votre ordinateur. Agent: Fermez Jules Neveu du Rémy. Agent: 2 Agent: Ouvrez ensuite Evrard S.A., autorisez à nouveau l'ordinateur et la liseuse à l'aide d'un identifiant Evrard S.A.. Agent: Fermez le programme. Agent: 3 Agent: Supprimez tous les fichiers des eBooks de votre ordinateur, même de la corbeille. Agent: Vous devrez demander à votre bibliothèque de réinitialiser la licence Evrard S.A. de l'eBook et demander une nouvelle copie de l'eBook. Agent: 4 Agent: Veuillez ouvrir à nouveau Evrard S.A., vous devriez être en mesure de télécharger le livre sur votre ordinateur, puis de le copier sur l'appareil. Agent: 5 Agent: Ensuite, vérifiez s'il peut être ouvert dans votre liseuse. Client: Je vais essayer de faire ça Agent: Très bien. Agent: Veuillez vérifier si vous pouvez ouvrir des livres par la suite. Agent: Si vous ne parvenez toujours pas à ouvrir des livres, assurez-vous de nous contacter à nouveau. Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que je puisse faire pour vous aider ? Client: Non mais pour l'instant cela ne fonctionne pas Client: J'ai toujours le même problème Agent: Avez-vous effectué toutes les instructions que j'ai fournies ? Client: Oui j'ai tout suivi Agent: Une autre chose que vous pouvez faire consiste à désinstaller Evrard S.A. de votre ordinateur et l'installer à nouveau. Client: J'arrive bien à l'avoir sur Evrard S.A. en pdf le livre Client: J'ai déjà désinstaller Evrard S.A. Agent: D'accord. Une autre chose que vous pouvez essayer est de suivre la méthode suivante : Agent: A) Agent: - Connectez la liseuse à l'ordinateur. Agent: - Ouvrez Evrard S.A., annulez l'autorisation des la liseuse et fermez Evrard S.A.. Agent: - Sauvegardez tout ce qui se trouve sur la liseuse dans un dossier sur l'ordinateur. Agent: - Une fois que tout est sauvegardé, supprimez tous les dossiers/fichiers dans la liseuse. Agent: - Configurer la liseuse. Agent: - Éjectez la liseuse en toute sécurité. Agent: B. Agent: - Ouvrez Evrard S.A.. Agent: - Appuyez sur Cmd-Maj-D pour annuler l'autorisation de Evrard S.A.. Agent: Sélectionnez Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: Cliquez sur OK et quittez Evrard S.A.. Agent: -Naviguez dans /Users/[[Votre compte d'utilisateur]]/Library/Application Support/Evrard S.A./Evrard S.A. et faites glisser le fichier activation.dat vers la corbeille. Agent: Evrard S.A. est maintenant autorisé. Agent: Si pour une raison quelconque vous ne pouvez pas accéder au fichier activation.dat (Evrard S.A. et ultérieur), veuillez essayer ce qui suit : Agent: Allez dans le menu « Finder ». Agent: Appuyez sur la touche d'option (alt) et sélectionnez « Allez ». Agent: Cela révèle la bibliothèque cachée des utilisateurs. Agent: Sélectionnez la bibliothèque. Agent: -Allez dans Application Support/Evrard S.A./Evrard S.A. et supprimez le fichier nommé "activation.dat". Agent: C) Agent: Redémarrez l'ordinateur Agent: Ouvrez Evrard S.A. et autorisez l'ordinateur Agent: - Fermez Jules Neveu du Rémy Agent: - Connectez-vous à votre liseuse Agent: - Ouvrez Evrard S.A. et autorisez la liseuse Agent: - Retéléchargez le fichier Evrard S.A. et ouvrez-le avec Evrard S.A. Agent: - Transférez les livres à la liseuse en utilisant Evrard S.A. Agent: Je suis toujours avec vous Agent: Quoi qu'il arrive, tenez-moi au courant. Agent: Je suis désolé, pour des raisons de qualité, je devrai fermer ce chat si je ne reçois pas de réponse dans 2 minutes. Client: Je ne le trouve pas Agent: D'accord. Agent: Veuillez m'accorder quelques minutes pour vérifier s'il y a autre chose que nous pouvons essayer. Client: C'est bon j'ai réussi merci beaucoup Agent: Qu'est-il arrivé ? Agent: Je suis toujours avec vous. Agent: Êtes-vous toujours là ? Agent: Je suis désolé, pour des raisons de qualité, je devrai fermer ce chat si je ne reçois pas de réponse dans 2 minutes. Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Evrard S.A., j'ai eu le plaisir de vous aider aujourd'hui. Agent: Passez une bonne soirée et bonne année.
en: Customer: Hello, I can't download my borrowed books from the media library Customer: alain62@hernandez.com Customer: pride and prejudice Agent: Thank you! Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information Agent: To try and fix that problem, please follow these instructions: Agent: First, connect your Evrard S.A. device to the Evrard S.A. desktop app to update it. Agent: If you need the steps, please try the following link: https://vaillant.org/ Agent: Then please try the repair account in your device. Agent: This  option refreshes all your ebooks and resolves issues like missing  ebooks, downloading errors or if something is not working properly in  your Evrard S.A. account. Agent: Follow these instructions to sync repair. Agent: You'll need access to an active Wi-Fi connection before you start. Agent: If you have a Evrard S.A. eReader: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap on settings Agent: 3 Agent: Tap on the option "device information" Agent: 4 Agent: Tap on repair Agent: 5 Agent: Tap on repair now Agent: Then: Agent: 1 Agent: Open Evrard S.A.. Agent: Deauthorize both, your ereader and your computer. Agent: Close Jules Neveu du Rémy. Agent: 2 Agent: Then open Evrard S.A., re-authorize the computer and the ereader using an Evrard S.A. ID. Agent: Close the program. Agent: 3 Agent: Delete all the files from the ebooks of your computer, ever from the recycle bin. Agent: You'll have to request your library to reset the Evrard S.A. license of the ebook and request a new copy of the ebook Agent: 4 Agent: Please open Evrard S.A. again and you are supposed to be able to download the book to your computer and then copy it to the device. Agent: 5 Agent: Then verify if it can be open in your reader Customer: I'll try to do that Agent: Very well. Agent: Please check if you can open books afterwards. Agent: If you're still unable to open books, please make sure to contact us again Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: No, but it isn't working right now Customer: I'm still having the same problem Agent: Did you performed all the instructions I provided? Customer: Yes, I followed everything Agent: The other thing you can do is to Uninstall Evrard S.A. from your computer and the install it again Customer: I manage to get the book from Evrard S.A. in pdf format Customer: I've already uninstalled Evrard S.A. Agent: Ok. One more thing you can try is performing the following method: Agent: A) Agent: -Connect the eReader to the Computer Agent: -Open Evrard S.A. and de-authorize the eReader and Close Evrard S.A. Agent: -Back up everything from the eReader to a Folder in the computer Agent: -Once everything is backed up > Delete all the folder/files in the eReader Agent: -Setup the eReader Agent: -Eject the eReader safely Agent: B) Agent: -Open Evrard S.A.. Agent: -Press Cmd-Shift-D to deauthorize Evrard S.A. Agent: -Select Erase Authorization. Agent: -Click OK and quit Evrard S.A.. Agent: -Navigate to /Users/[[Your user account]]/Library/Application Support/Evrard S.A./Evrard S.A. and drag the activation.dat file to the trash. Agent: Evrard S.A. is now deauthorised. Agent: -If for some reason you cannot navigate to the activation.dat file (Evrard S.A. and later), please try the following: Agent: -Go to the Finder menu. Agent: -Hold down the Option (Alt) key and select Go. Agent: This reveals the hidden user library. Agent: -Select Library. Agent: -Go to Application Support/Evrard S.A./Evrard S.A. and delete the file named “activation.dat” Agent: C) Agent: -Reboot the computer Agent: -Open Evrard S.A. and authorize the computer Agent: -Close Jules Neveu du Rémy Agent: -Connect your eReader Agent: -Open up Evrard S.A. and authorize the eReader Agent: -Re-Download the Evrard S.A. file and Open it with Evrard S.A. Agent: -Transfer the books to the eReader using Evrard S.A. Agent: I am still with you Agent: Whatever happens, please let me know Customer: I'm stuck in step B, I can't delete the "activation.dat" file Agent: What happens when you try removing the file Customer: I can't find the file Agent: It should be in the folder indicated in the instructions Agent: I am still here Agent: I am still with you Agent: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes Customer: I can't find it Agent: Ok. Agent: Please allow me a few minutes to check if there is anything else we can try Customer: It worked, thank you very much Agent: What happened? Agent: I am still with you Agent: Are you still there? Agent: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes Agent: Thank you for contacting Evrard S.A., it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: Have a nice evening and a happy new year

fr: Client: Bonjour, Client: Ma Carpentier Dumont SA est bien configurée en Français mais tous les livres proposés et les résumés sont en néerlandais. Agent: Enregistrez votre adresse de facturation sur le côté gauche de la même page. Agent: Puis cliquez sur * enregistrer * Agent: Pour recevoir des recommandations en français. Agent: Je vous recommande d'ajouter quelques livres à votre liste de souhaits, puis vous recevrez d'autres recommandations en français Agent: Sur votre liseuse Carpentier Dumont SA, déconnectez-vous et reconnectez-vous pour actualiser les modifications Agent: Je vais fournir les étapes pour vous déconnecter de votre compte dans votre liseuse Carpentier Dumont SA : Agent: Lorsque vous vous déconnectez, vos livres et signets sont enregistrés, mais vous perdrez les surlignages et les notes que vous avez ajoutés à vos livres. Agent: Vous perdrez également des livres gratuits. Agent: Vos livres Carpentier Dumont SA achetés apparaîtront comme * Non lus * Agent: Sur votre liseuse Carpentier Dumont SA : Agent: Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: Appuyez sur l'icône Menu en bas de l'écran. Agent: (3 lignes horizontales) Agent: Appuyez sur Paramètres. Agent: Appuyez sur comptes. Agent: Sous Carpentier Dumont SA, appuyez sur déconnexion. Agent: Un écran de confirmation apparaîtra. Agent: Appuyez sur Déconnexion. Agent: Après votre inscription, suivez les instructions de l'écran pour configurer votre liseuse. Agent: Appuyez sur votre langue. Agent: Appuyez sur Configurer via Wi-Fi. Agent: Votre liseuse recherchera les réseaux Wi-Fi locaux et vous montrera une liste de ce qui est disponible. Agent: Appuyez sur le réseau auquel vous souhaitez vous connecter. Agent: Si nécessaire, utilisez le clavier sur l'écran pour saisir le mot de passe réseau. Agent: Appuyez sur Rejoindre sur votre clavier. Agent: Si nécessaire, appuyez sur Date, Heure ou Fuseau horaire. Agent: Appuyez sur Continuer. Agent: Votre liseuse va télécharger toutes les mises à jour disponibles. Agent: Les mises à jour peuvent prendre jusqu'à 20 minutes. Agent: Appuyez sur l'option de connexion que vous souhaitez utiliser, et utilisez le clavier sur l'écran pour entrer vos informations. Agent: Si vous avez déjà des livres Carpentier Dumont SA, vous verrez qu'ils sont ajoutés à votre liseuse. Agent: Après avoir connecté votre liseuse à une connexion Wi Fi, vous serez invité à vous connecter à votre liseuse. Client: J’ai actualisé l’adresse de facturation Agent: D'accord. Client: Je met quelques livres français dans ma Wish List Client: Je l’ai éteinte et je la redémarre Agent: Déconnectez-vous et reconnectez-vous avec votre compte dans votre liseuse Carpentier Dumont SA Client: D’accord je le fait tout de suite Agent: Ok, prenez votre temps Client: Ça a marché c’était bien ça ! Client: Merci beaucoup !! Agent: Très bien. Agent: Bonne lecture. Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que nous pouvons faire pour vous aider ? Client: Non tout est bon ! Client: Encore merci Agent: Avec plaisir. Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Carpentier Dumont SA, nous avons eu le plaisir de vous aider aujourd'hui. Agent: Bonne journée. Client: Je vais le faire merci !
en: Customer: Hello, Customer: My Carpentier Dumont SA is configured in French, but all the books on offer and the summaries are in Dutch. Customer: I already turned it off and on, signed out from my account, signed back in... nothing changes. Customer: Can you help me? Customer: Thank you Customer: Sébastien-Antoine Cordier Customer: prenaud@live.com Customer: Today I bought "Agatha Raisin la quiche fatale" by M.C. Customer: Sébastien-Antoine Cordier Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Customer: Thank you Agent: Allow me a minute while I verify your account Customer: Ok, thank you Agent: What device are you using to read your books? Customer: A Carpentier Dumont SA Agent: Thank you. Agent: Please try the following steps: Agent: Register  your billing address in the Carpentier Dumont SA website directly Agent: Go to http://www.gomes.com/. Agent: Sign in to your Carpentier Dumont SA account. Agent: Click the My Account drop down menu and select Account Settings. Agent: Select the Payment Information tab. Agent: Register your Billing Address on the left-hand side on the same page. Agent: Then click on *save* Agent: To receive recommendations in French. Agent: I recommend you to add some books to  your wishlist then you will receive further recommendations in French Agent: On  your Carpentier Dumont SA, log out and  log in back to refresh the changes Agent: I will provide the steps to log out from your account in your Carpentier Dumont SA: Agent: When you sign out, your books and bookmarks are saved, but you will lose highlights and notes you’ve added to your books. Agent: You will also lose free books. Agent: Your Carpentier Dumont SA books purchased will appear as *Unread* Agent: On your Carpentier Dumont SA eReader: Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the Menu icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: (3 horizontal lines) Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: Under Carpentier Dumont SA, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: Tap Sign out. Agent: After you sign out, follow the onscreen instructions to set up your eReader. Agent: Tap your language. Agent: Tap Set up over Wi Fi. Agent: Your eReader will search for local Wi Fi networks, and show you a list of what’s available. Agent: Tap the network you want to connect to. Agent: If necessary, use the on-screen keyboard to enter the network password. Agent: Tap Join on your keyboard. Agent: If necessary, tap Date, Time, or Time Zone. Agent: Tap Continue. Agent: Your eReader will download any available updates. Agent: The updates may take up to 20 minutes to complete. Agent: Tap the sign-in option you wish to use, and use the on-screen keyboard to enter your details. Agent: If you already have Carpentier Dumont SA books, you’ll see them being added to your eReader. Agent: After you connect your eReader to a Wi Fi connection, you’ll be prompted to sign in to your eReader. Customer: I updated the billing address Agent: Ok Customer: I added some French books to my Wish List Customer: I turned it off and restarted it Agent: just log out and log in back with your account in your Carpentier Dumont SA Customer: Okay, I'll do it right away Agent: Ok, Take your time Customer: It worked! Customer: Thank you very much!! Agent: Great! Agent: Enjoy your reading. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: No, everything is fine! Customer: Thank you again Agent: You're welcome. Agent: Thank you for contacting Carpentier Dumont SA, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day. Customer: I will, thank you!

fr: Client: Impossible de creer compte Client: petitjeanalain@daniel.fr Client: Aucun impossible d’acceder au compte Client: Appareil offert impossibled ouvrir le compte et pas de reponse pour reinitialiser le mot de passe Agent: Nous avons vérifié que vous avez créé votre compte Normand via votre compte Normand. Agent: Pour commencer : Agent: 1 Agent: Visitez https://normand.com/ sur votre navigateur Web (Normand, Normand, Normand, Normand et supérieur). Agent: 2 Agent: Connectez-vous avec vos identifiants de compte Normand Agent: 3 Agent: Cliquez à nouveau sur l'icône du profil et sélectionnez "Mon compte". Agent: Cliquez sur Paramètres de Compte.
