en: Customer: Can't create an account Customer: petitjeanalain@daniel.fr Customer: None, I can't access the account Customer: The device was a gift, I can't open an account and there's no reply for resetting the password Agent: I have verified that you created your Normand account through your Normand account Agent: You need to choose "Continue with Normand", a pop-up screen will appear and, when prompted, and use your  Normand account's credentials (this option should be used to sign in to all of your devices and at the Normand website). Customer: Ok, but the prices are shown in dollars, the eReader is Canadian but I live in France Agent: You need to change to the Normand store of your country, and enter your payment information Customer: Sorry? Agent: We are happy to assist you in updating your payment information on your Normand account. Agent: To begin: Agent: 1 Agent: Visit https://normand.com/ on your web browser (Normand, Normand, Normand, Normand and higher). Agent: 2 Agent: Sign in with your  Normand account's credentials Agent: 3 Agent: Click on the profile icon again select My Account. Agent: Click on Account settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Under the My account tab, on the right under "Preferences and Personalization" enter your Name and date of birth. Agent: 5 Agent: Click the Payment Information tab and enter your Billing address (Country, address, postal code, phone number). Agent: 6 Agent: Once completed, click the "Save" button to keep your changes. Agent: 7 Agent: Under Payment Information, enter your Credit Card details (The postal code on your credit card must match the postal code on your billing address). Agent: 8 Agent: Once completed, click the "Save" button to keep your changes. Customer: The problem is Normand, because I tried to change my Normand password but it doesn't work Agent: Sign in with Normand please Customer: So, first of all, in order to sign in with Normand, I need to open or reset a Normand account Customer: Just a moment Agent: Thank you Customer: It's still processing, just a moment Agent: Of course, take your time Customer: Ok, I entered everything except the card Agent: yes, that's optional if you will use a different method Customer: What should I do now to make sure prices are in euros? Customer: Ok, I'm signing out from my eReader and signing in Customer: To make sure that the details Customer: Have been modified Agent: Thank you Customer: Just a moment Agent: Now sync your Normand Agent: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your Normand (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start): Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-left of the screen (3 horizontal lines). Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Beside Repair/restore your Normand account, tap Repair/Restore. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Repair now/Restore Agent: 7 Agent: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades. Customer: Step 4, I don't have info about the device Customer: I get technical info or sync and updates Customer: Which one should I choose? Agent: technical information Customer: Ok Agent: Then Beside Repair/restore your Normand account, tap Repair/Restore. Customer: I'm completing the step, just a moment Customer: It's syncing now Customer: It's updating now Customer: Ok, one last question Customer: I don't want to reopen my eReader with Normand every single time, I would like to use a Normand account Customer: Can you help me? Agent: Since you created your account through your Normand account, you will, always need to sign in with Normand Customer: Ok, I only went to Normand because Normand wasn't working Agent: Now sign in with Normand on all your devices Agent: Don't worry, we don't share your information with Normand, it's just a login option Customer: Do you mean all my eReaders? Customer: I only have one? Customer: Why can't I create my Normand account? Customer: I prefere that option Agent: I mean on the website also, and if you install a Normand app Customer: Why can't I create my Normand account? Customer: Which is one of the login options Agent: I can request this to our specialized team, and they will determine if this can be changed Customer: Ok Agent: We will contact you via email as soon as we have a response from or team Agent: For your reference, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation. Agent: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with today? Customer: Ok my email is Thibaut Durand Customer: No it is good thank you;) Agent: We will use that email. Agent: Thanks for chatting with Normand today. Agent: Have a great day! Agent: And have a happy new year 32156486!

fr: Client: Je ne peux pas charger des livres à partir de la bibliothèque publique... parfois ça fonctionne et d'autres fois ça bloque Client: frederic39@laposte.net Client: La vie a bout de bras Agent: Merci pour l'information. Agent: Nous serons heureux de vous aider. Agent: Sur quel appareil essayez-vous de lire ? Client: Meunier Girard et Fils Agent: Oui, nous savons, mais quel modèle ? Client: Pocket Agent: Pouvez-vous vérifier le nom du modèle liseuse ? Agent: afin que nous puissions vous fournir le dépannage correspondant. Client: pocket Agent: Il n'y a pas de Meunier Girard et Fils Agent: Veuillez vérifier vos paramètres Client: forma Agent: D'accord, merci. Agent: Comment empruntez-vous des eBooks ? Agent: Recevez-vous une erreur de message ? Client: bibliotheque municipale   le message :  votre liseuse n'est pas autorisée à ouvrir ce livre Agent: Avez-vous essayé la fonction buitl Meunier Girard et Fils sur la liseuse ? Client: non Client: ou je trouve cette fonction? Client: ok Agent: Sous paramètres Client: oui j'essaie d'entrer le nom de ma bibliothèque de St-Jean-sur-Richelieu Agent: D'accord et alors ? Client: non Agent: Ce n'est pas disponible ? Client: c'est ça j'essaie à nouveau Client: je ne la trouve pas dans les 20 pages???? Agent: Contactez votre bibliothèque et demandez-lui quel service ils utilisent pour emprunter des eBooks Client: ok merci de votre service. Client: Bonne journée Agent: Votre autre option est d'essayer avec Meunier Girard et Fils Agent: Avec la version 3.0 Agent: Notez que si vous avez installé la version Meunier Girard et Fils, cela peut être la source du problème. Agent: Malheureusement, Meunier Girard et Fils fonctionne mal avec certains livres qui sont au format Meunier Girard et Fils au moment du transfert au lecteur. Agent: Meunier Girard et Fils modifie très légèrement le Meunier Girard et Fils (Meunier Girard et Fils), et ce changement n'est pas reconnu par Meunier Girard et Fils. Agent: Le format Meunier Girard et Fils est une norme largement utilisée, mais Meunier Girard et Fils semble ne pouvoir traiter que des livres au format Meunier Girard et Fils. Agent: C'est pourquoi avec Meunier Girard et Fils certains livres sont transférables et d'autres non. Agent: Meunier Girard et Fils est un tiers application (d'Meunier Girard et Fils non Meunier Girard et Fils) mais nous pouvons recommander quelques étapes pour essayer de corriger cela comme conseillé par la source (Meunier Girard et Fils). Agent: Tout d'abord, réinitialisez l'autorisation sur votre Meunier Girard et Fils Agent: Assurez-vous que les paramètres de date et d'heure de votre liseuse Meunier Girard et Fils sont corrects. Agent: Vous devriez les trouver dans le menu Paramètres de votre Meunier Girard et Fils. Agent: Branchez votre Meunier Girard et Fils sur votre ordinateur (en utilisant le câble USB fourni avec votre Meunier Girard et Fils). Agent: Ouvrez Meunier Girard et Fils sur votre ordinateur. Agent: Utilisez Meunier Girard et Fils pour supprimer l'eBook qui cause des problèmes de votre Meunier Girard et Fils et de votre ordinateur (assurez-vous de choisir l'option Supprimer de la bibliothèque).  Agent: Cliquez sur votre Meunier Girard et Fils dans le menu « périphériques » sur la gauche. Agent: Cliquez sur l'icône d'engrenage des options du dispositif à côté de "Dispositifs", puis sélectionnez Effacer l'autorisation du dispositif. Agent: Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation, puis "OK" pour confirmer. Agent: Essayez de réinitialiser l'autorisation dans Meunier Girard et Fils Agent: Dans Meunier Girard et Fils, appuyez sur Ctrl + Maj + D (Commande + Maj + D sur un Meunier Girard et Fils) sur votre clavier. Agent: Dans la fenêtre contextuelle qui s'ouvre, entrez le mot de passe de votre compte Meunier Girard et Fils ID ou Meunier Girard et Fils (et assurez-vous que le bon Meunier Girard et Fils ID est répertorié dans le menu déroulant). Agent: Ensuite, Cliquez sur Continuer. Agent: Sélectionnez Effacer l'autorisation, puis OK. Agent: Autorisez à nouveau votre ordinateur en allant dans Aide > Autoriser l'ordinateur. Agent: Remarque : Assurez-vous de réautoriser votre ordinateur en utilisant le même identifiant Meunier Girard et Fils qu'auparavant. Agent: Sinon, vous ne pourrez pas télécharger à nouveau votre eBook Agent: Essayez à nouveau de transférer l' eBook Agent: Téléchargez à nouveau l' eBook qui causait des problèmes Agent: Transférez l' eBook d' Meunier Girard et Fils vers votre Meunier Girard et Fils. Agent: Cette étape autorisera également votre Meunier Girard et Fils. Agent: Essayez d'ouvrir le titre sur votre Meunier Girard et Fils.
en: Customer: I'm unable to load books from the public library... sometimes it works, sometimes it gets blocked Customer: frederic39@laposte.net Customer: La vie a bout de bras Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: on which device are you trying to read? Customer: Meunier Girard et Fils Agent: yes, i know, but which model? Customer: Pocket Agent: can you please check the ereader model name Agent: so i can provide you the corresponding troubleshooting Customer: pocket Agent: there is no Meunier Girard et Fils Agent: please check on your settings Customer: forma Agent: ok thank you Agent: how do you borrow ebooks? Agent: do you get a message error? Customer: municipal library message: your reader is not allowed to open this book Agent: have you tried the Meunier Girard et Fils buitl in feature on the ereader? Customer: no Customer: where do I find this feature? Customer: ok Agent: under settings Customer: yes, I'll try to enter the name of my St-Jean-sur-Richelieu library Agent: ok an then? Customer: no Agent: it is not available? Customer: exactly, I'll try again Customer: I can't find it in the 20 pages???? Agent: contact your library and ask them which service they use to borrow ebooks Customer: ok, thank you for your assistance. Customer: Have a nice day Agent: your other option is to try with Meunier Girard et Fils Agent: with 3.0 version Agent: Note that if you have installed the version Meunier Girard et Fils, this may be the source of the problem. Agent: Unfortunately, Meunier Girard et Fils malfunctions with certain books which are in Meunier Girard et Fils format at the time of transfer to the reader. Agent: Meunier Girard et Fils very slightly changes the Meunier Girard et Fils (Meunier Girard et Fils), and this change is not recognized by Meunier Girard et Fils. Agent: The Meunier Girard et Fils format is a widely used standard, but Meunier Girard et Fils seems to only be able to process books in the Meunier Girard et Fils format. Agent: This is why with Meunier Girard et Fils some books are transferable and others are not. Agent: Meunier Girard et Fils is a third party app (from Meunier Girard et Fils not Meunier Girard et Fils) however we can recommend afew steps to try to correct this as advised by the source (Meunier Girard et Fils) Agent: First, reset the authorization on your Meunier Girard et Fils Agent: Make sure the date and time settings on your Meunier Girard et Fils eReader are correct. Agent: You should find these in the Settings menu on your Meunier Girard et Fils. Agent: Plug your Meunier Girard et Fils into your computer (using the USB cable that came with your Meunier Girard et Fils). Agent: Open Meunier Girard et Fils on your computer. Agent: Use Meunier Girard et Fils to delete the eBook that's causing issues from your Meunier Girard et Fils and your computer (make sure to choose the Remove from Library option). Agent: Click on your Meunier Girard et Fils under the "Devices" menu on the left. Agent: Click device options gear icon next to "Devices," then select Erase Device Authorization. Agent: Click Erase Authorization, then OK to confirm. Agent: Try to reset the authorization in Meunier Girard et Fils Agent: In Meunier Girard et Fils, press Ctrl + Shift + D (Command + Shift + D on a Meunier Girard et Fils) on your keyboard. Agent: In the pop-up window that opens, enter the password for your Meunier Girard et Fils ID or Meunier Girard et Fils account (and make sure the correct Meunier Girard et Fils ID is listed in the drop-down menu). Agent: Then, click Continue. Agent: Select Erase Authorization, then OK. Agent: Authorize your computer again by going to Help > Authorize Computer. Agent: Note: Make sure to reauthorize your computer using the same Meunier Girard et Fils ID as before. Agent: Otherwise, you won't be able to re-download your eBook Agent: Try transferring the eBook again Agent: Re-download the eBook that was causing issues Agent: Transfer the eBook from Meunier Girard et Fils to your Meunier Girard et Fils. Agent: This step will also reauthorize your Meunier Girard et Fils. Agent: Try opening the title on your Meunier Girard et Fils.

en: Customer: I have Raymond Customer: I can get the book I borrowed from my library. Customer: I can transfer it to my Raymond reader. Customer: But when I try to open my book, I get a message that reads: Your eReader does not have permission to open this book. Customer: I tried all forums and I didn't find any solution. Customer: I've been having this problem for more than 10 hours..... it's really frustrating Customer: emmanuelbenard@laine.com Customer: I haven't made any purchase. Customer: Library only Agent: Hello! Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Customer: I have Raymond Agent: Can you please help me with the software version of your Raymond? Customer: Device model DJYJFRXV Agent: I'm afraid that's not the software version, but let me send you the steps so you can see it Agent: To find your eReader's software version: Agent: 1)Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2)Tap the More icon at the bottom right of the screen. Agent: 3)Tap Settings. Agent: 4)Tap Device information. Agent: 5)Beside 'Software version', you'll see your eReader's version number. Agent: A version number will look something like this: "9044415 (#DEVICEID#, 5/27/19)" Customer: 9044415 DJYJFRXV Agent: Thank you! Agent: can you please tell me if you have tried to transfer the books again? Agent: And remove authorizations? Customer: I removed Raymond several times, I authorized the computer. Customer: I restarted and authorized my eReader. Customer: I think I've tried everything Agent: I understand, have you tried to remove the book from both computer and eReader? Agent: And add again authorizations? Customer: yes, but I don't have permission to read Customer: yes, but I'll try again later. Agent: Yes, I can send you some steps that you can try, and I can suggest to ask your library to reset the licenses of the book Customer: ok for the steps Agent: Would you like for me to send you the steps? Agent: I can also send you the steps via email as well if you prefer trying later? Customer: by e-mail would be great Agent: Of course I can send them that way as well and you can try whenever you can ok? Customer: Thank you. Customer: I'll check the steps as soon as I receive them. Customer: I'll check them on my iPad Agent: Yes, of course, I will send them right here and via email as well, as soon as the chat end, since I can't send it  with the chat open, Agent: 1 Agent: Delete the book from the eReader. Agent: (Click on the 3 dots) Agent: 2 Agent: Delete the book file from your computer's download folder. Agent: 3 Agent: Connect the device to the computer and open Raymond Agent: 4 Agent: Remove the eReader authorization Agent: 5 Agent: Remove the computer authorization (Ctrl+shift+D) Raymond (Command + Shift + D) Agent: 6 Agent: Authorize the computer again (Ctrl+Shift+U) Agent: 7 Agent: Authorize the eReader again Agent: 8 Agent: Download your book again Agent: 9 Agent: Transfer your book again Agent: if you have any problems you can contact us back ok? Agent: Thank you for your time! Agent: Thank you for contacting Raymond, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day. Customer: Okay I'll try for a Raymond. Customer: If it works, how can I contact you again to let you know if it worked. Agent: Yes, thank you!

en: Customer: Our Perrier SARL reader, purchased on January 9, 2019, has serious battery problems. Customer: In fact, just after charging and restarting, it often goes down directly to 5 or 10%. Customer: Could you tell us how to claim the hardware warranty? Customer: undoubtedly sophie81@gmail.com Customer: I rarely use my Perrier SARL account Customer: Marcelle Faure du Vallet, are you there? Agent: Hello Marcelle Faure du Vallet! Customer: hello! Agent: Thank you for confirming the information. Agent: I will do my best to help you solved this the best way Possible. Customer: thank you! Agent: May I ask what is the Perrier SARL ereader you have? Customer: Marcelle Faure du Vallet Customer: number 2, I think Agent: May I please have the order number. Customer: it was bought from Perrier SARL Customer: I have the bill before my eyes Customer: if necessary Customer: sorry, it's a Perrier SARL! Customer: are you still there? Customer: Marcelle Faure du Vallet? Agent: Yes Customer: cool! Agent: Thank for the information. Customer: you're welcome! Agent: Can I will provided you with a Factory reset steps Customer: otherwise, can you help me? Customer: yes! Customer: I have the eReader right here Customer: I will follow your instructions Agent: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following: Agent: Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader. Agent: Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger. Agent: Press and hold the power button until you see the words "Powered off" at the top of the screen. Agent: Continue holding down the power button for 3-4 seconds. Agent: Release the power button. Agent: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds. Agent: Wait for the 'Restore' screen to appear. Agent: Release the power button. Agent: Your eReader screen will turn black and begin the restoring process. Agent: After the restoring process finishes, follow the onscreen instructions to set up your eReader. Agent: You'll need access to an active Wi Fi or internet connection to complete setup. Agent: You can also use the Perrier SARL app to set up your eReader using your computer. Agent: Set up your eReader Agent: After you reset your eReader, set it up over Wi Fi or with the Perrier SARL app on your computer. Agent: Set up your Perrier SARL over Wi Fi Agent: Set up your Perrier SARL with your computer Agent: Note: If you have issues setting up your Perrier SARL eReader over Wi Fi, use the Perrier SARL Desktop app to set up your eReader with your computer. Agent: Was this article helpful? Agent: Related articles Agent: Fix common Perrier SARL problems Agent: Reset your Perrier SARL Agent: Set up your Perrier SARL eReader for the first time using a computer Agent: Manual reset your Perrier SARL Agent: Perrier SARL screen issues Agent: Recently viewed articles Agent: Install Perrier SARL on your PC or Mac Agent: Repair your Perrier SARL account on your Perrier SARL eReader Agent: Fix common Perrier SARL problems Agent: Manual factory reset your Perrier SARL Agent: Manual reset your Perrier SARL Agent: ︿ Customer: and this procedure is supposed to restore the battery? Agent: Thank you for contacting Perrier SARL.

en: Customer: Since I made an update, I can no longer open books on my eReader. Customer: I'm getting a message that says that the books are protected by Leroy digital rights management and that I have to authorize my eReader again with my Leroy ID. Customer: I don't understand. Customer: I don't want to get a subscription or create any account, I just want to read my books, so what's the problem here??? Customer: thibautgillet@noos.fr Customer: None Customer: I haven't bought any books since I got my eReader, I already had my books, which I transferred to the eReader Agent: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine. Agent: Please let me verify your Leroy account. Agent: I will be happy to assist you. Agent: Please give me a moment. Customer: Hello? Agent: I'm sorry you have issues downloading the ebooks to the Leroy ereader. Agent: What you can do is to de-authorize the computer and the erader, then authorize the computer and the ereader again. Customer: How do I do that? Agent: One moment please Agent: Open Leroy. Agent: Delete the file from Leroy as well as from Leroy (under My Documents) Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: De-authorize your computer: Agent: a. Agent: Press CTRL+SHIFT+D all at the same time. Agent: (If you're on a Leroy, press Command+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Enter your Leroy password. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: a. Plug in your Leroy. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Leroy eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Leroy. Agent: Unplug your eReader. Customer: 1- You say open Leroy. Customer: Where do I open it? Customer: On my computer? Customer: 1- You say you open Leroy. Customer: 2- You say I should delete the Leroy file from my documents: I don't have it on my computer, and even if I had, why would I have to open it and delete it? Customer: 3- You say I need to cancel the computer's permission: do I have to connect the reader at the same time? Customer: 4-I don't have a Leroy account Agent: Ok, So if you don't have Leroy on your computer then you have to install it then authorize the Agent: the computer and the ereader. Agent: You can't download ebooks if you don't have Leroy. Customer: Why can't I open my books on my eRreader? Customer: I don't want to pay for Leroy, I don't need it. Customer: I've been having issues since the update, and I didn't have any issues before that Agent: If the ebooks are protected then you have to install the Leroy on your computer in order to download the ebooks. Customer: Is it free? Customer: I can open them on my computer without any problems Agent: I understand but even if the ebooks are free you have to authorize with Leroy unles the files are not protected then you can just transfer to the ereader with an USB cable Agent: Do you get any message? Customer: I didn't have any problems before the update, I can no longer open the documents, these are PDF documents from school, they are not protected! Customer: Is Jacqueline Ramos du Blanc free? Agent: Yes, Agent: https://leroy.org/- Customer: I will try what you suggested now. Customer: If there is a problem, I will contact you again, thank you Customer: Thank you very much Agent: Ok. Agent: Thank you for contacting Leroy, have a nice day. Agent: Goodbye.

fr: Client: J'ai enregistré une carte cadeau de 50€ sur laquelle je n'ai dépensé que 5,99€. Client: Maintenant elle n'apparaît plus et quand je tente de la charger a nouveau elle apparaît comme vide Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Bouvet, pouvez-vous fournir l'adresse électronique de votre compte Bouvet ? Client: danieledouard@noel.com Agent: Pour des raisons de sécurité, pouvez-vous confirmer la date de votre achat le plus récent ou le titre de l'un des eBooks/livres audio sur votre compte ? Client: 1 achat ce jour Agent: Merci pour l'information. Agent: Je me ferais un plaisir de vous aider. Agent: Ravi de vous rencontrer René Martins. Agent: J'espère que vous passez une bonne journée ! Agent: S'il vous plaît, accordez-moi quelques minutes pour trouver votre compte. Agent: Merci pour votre patience, René Martins ! Agent: J'ai pu trouver et vérifier votre compte. Agent: Ne vous inquiétez pas, tout va bien avec votre carte-cadeau. Agent: Lorsque vous utilisez une carte-cadeau Bouvet sur notre site Web pour effectuer un achat, le solde restant pour la carte est enregistré sur votre compte Bouvet en tant que crédit de boutique, c'est pourquoi vous ne pouvez plus utiliser la carte-cadeau si vous essayez de l'utiliser à nouveau. Agent: À ce moment, vous avez 44,01 € comme crédit de boutique pour votre compte et ce montant d'argent sera reflété lors du paiement de votre prochain achat si vous souhaitez l'utiliser. Agent: De plus, si vous allez sur notre site Web à http://pons.com/ et vous connectez à votre compte Bouvet, vous pouvez aller sur Mon compte > Paramètres du compte > Informations de paiement. Agent: À partir de cette page, vous pouvez voir le montant du crédit de boutique qui est enregistré sur votre compte. Client: Ok c'est très clair. Client: Par contre comment puis-je faire pour acheter un livre depuis ma liseuse Client: En utilisant la carte cadeau Agent: Pas de problème, ce serait exactement la même chose. Agent: Lorsque vous sélectionnez le eBook que vous souhaitez acheter, vous irez à la caisse de votre achat avant de le terminer. Agent: À partir de là, le crédit en boutique devrait être reflété et vous pouvez le sélectionner comme moyen de paiement pour votre achat. Agent: Une fois que vous l'aurez sélectionné et que vous vous assurez que tout va bien, vous pouvez compléter votre achat et le crédit de boutique sera utilisé. Client: Le credit de magasin napparait pas sur ma liseuse Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Sur la liseuse, que voyez-vous lorsque vous essayez d'y acheter un eBook ? Client: Uniquement la possibilité de payer par carte bancaire Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Et sur la liseuse, pouvez-vous voir le dernier eBook que vous y avez acheté enregistré ? Client: Oui Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Que se passe-t-il si vous essayez d'effectuer une synchronisation sur la liseuse, puis que vous essayez d'y acheter un eBook ? Client: La synchronisation est programmée en automatique Client: Je ne peux pas la lancer maintenant Agent: Merci beaucoup, René Martins. Agent: Oh, je suis navré, que voulez-vous dire ? Agent: Il n'est pas possible d'effectuer une synchronisation ou bien il n'est pas possible d'effectuer un achat à partir de la liseuse ? Client: Je n'arrive pas à faire la synchronisation maintenant Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Que se passe-t-il si vous essayez d'appuyer sur l'icône de synchronisation sur la liseuse pour synchroniser l'appareil ? Agent: Recevez-vous un message d'erreur ? Client: Ok la synchronisation est en cours Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Une fois la synchronisation terminée, faites-le nous savoir, pour réessayer de faire l'achat sur votre liseuse. Client: La synchronisation est terminée et j'ai tenté de refaire un achat Client: La remise se la Client: De la totalité du montant m'a été proposée Client: Donc ça marche. Client: Merci pour votre aide Agent: Fantastique. Agent: Nous sommes heureux de savoir que le crédit de magasin peut être utilisé sur la liseuse maintenant. Agent: Nous vous souhaitons une excellente lecture. Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que nous pouvons faire pour vous ? Client: Non merci bonne soirée Agent: Parfait. Agent: Ce fut un plaisir de vous aider. Agent: Et merci beaucoup. Agent: Belle soirée et un bon week-end aussi. Agent: Merci pour votre temps et votre gentillesse, René Martins.
en: Customer: I registered a €50 gift card, from which I spent only €5.99. Customer: Now it's no longer there, and when I try to load it again, it is empty Agent: Thank you for contacting Bouvet, can you please provide the email address of your Bouvet account? Customer: danieledouard@noel.com Agent: For security purposes, can you please confirm either the date of your most recent purchase or the title of one of the ebooks/audiobooks in your account? Customer: 1 purchase today Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Nice to meet you, René Martins. Agent: I hope you are having a great day! Agent: Please, allow me a few minutes to find your account. Agent: Thank you for your patience, René Martins! Agent: I was able to find and verify your account. Agent: Don't worry, everything is completely fine with your Gift Card. Agent: When you redeem a Bouvet Gift Card in our website to make a purchase, the remaining balance for the card is saved on your Bouvet account as Store Credit, that is why you cannot use the Gift Card anymore if you try to use it again. Agent: At this moment, you have 44,01 € as Store Credit for your account and this amount of money will be reflected on the checkout of your next purchase if you wish to use it. Agent: As well, if you go to our website at http://pons.com/ and sign into your Bouvet account, you can go to My Account>Account Settings>Payment information. Agent: From that page, you can see the amount of Store Credit that is saved on your account. Customer: Ok, that's very clear. Customer: On the other hand, how can I buy a book from my eReader? Customer: Using the gift card Agent: No problem, it would be exactly the same. Agent: When you select the eBook you wish to purchase, you will go to the checkout of your purchase before completing it. Agent: From there, the Store Credit should be reflected and you can select it as payment method for your purchase. Agent: Once you select it and  you make sure everything is fine, you can complete your purchase and the Store Credit will be used. Customer: The store credit isn't showing on my eReader Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: On the eReader, what can you see when you try to purchase an eBook from there? Customer: Only the possibility of paying by bank card Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: And on the eReader, can you see the last eBook you purchased saved there? Customer: Yes Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: What happens if you try to perform a sync on the eReader and then you try to make a purchase for an eBook there? Customer: Syncing is set up as automatic Customer: I can't launch it now Agent: Thank you very much, René Martins. Agent: Oh, sorry, what do you mean? Agent: It is not possible for you to perform a sync or do you mean it is not possible to make a purchase from the eReader? Customer: I can't do the syncing now Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: What happens if you try to tap the sync icon on the eReader to sync the device? Agent: Do you receive an error message? Customer: Ok, sync is in progress Agent: Thank you so much! Agent: Once the sync is complete, please let me know so we can try to make the purchase on your eReader again. Customer: Syncing is over and I tried to remake a purchase Customer: The discount is there Customer: From of the total amount shown Customer: So it works. Customer: Thanks for your help Agent: Fantastic! Agent: I am happy to know the Store Credit can be used on the eReader now. Agent: I wish you enjoy your reading! Agent: Is there anything else I can do for you? Customer: No, thanks, have a good evening Agent: Perfect! Agent: It has been a pleasure to help you. Agent: And thank you so much! Agent: I wish you have a lovely evening and a nice weekend, too! Agent: Thank you for your time and kindness, René Martins.

Agent: Un instant s'il vous plaît Client: merci, comment pratiquez vous ? Agent: Le courriel est en cours d'envoi Agent: Vous pouvez répondre au courriel dès que vous le recevez Agent: Il sera envoyé à l'adresse électronique que vous avez utilisée pour ouvrir ce chat. Agent: Dès que vous répondez au courriel avec les informations demandées, nous pouvons continuer votre processus de remplacement Client: Je viens de consulter mes mails mais je n'ai rien reçu Agent: Cela pourrait prendre quelques minutes de plus Agent: Il n'est pas nécessaire d'attendre en ligne, vous pouvez répondre lorsque vous recevez le courriel et nous continuerons le processus Agent: Votre numéro de référence est : Agathe Le Maillet Client: Désolé mais  à mon adresse mail leroynathalie@noos.fr je n'ai rien reçu. Agent: Le courriel est toujours en cours d'envoi Agent: Vous le recevrez dans quelques instants Client: Ok merci Agent: Pour votre information, je vous enverrai une transcription de notre conversation. Agent: Si vous avez d'autres questions ou préoccupations, vous pouvez toujours répondre à cet e-mail et nous serons en mesure de vous aider davantage. Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que je puisse faire pour vous aider ? Agent: Êtes-vous toujours connecté ? Agent: Je vais maintenant clore ce chat car aucune réponse n'a été reçue. Agent: Nous serons ravis de continuer à vous aider par e-mail, ou vous pouvez nous contacter à nouveau au moment qui vous convient le mieux. Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Hernandez, cela a été un plaisir de vous aider aujourd'hui. Agent: Je vous souhaite une excellente journée !
en: Customer: I'm having a problem with my Hernandez on/off button. Customer: I have to press it hard and long to turn it on or off. Customer: We exchanged it this morning, but the problem persists. Customer: It should be noted that we bought two other Hernandez in 2019 and did not experience this problem. Customer: What should we do to fix this? Customer: Thanks for your help. Customer: Agathe Le Maillet Customer: leroynathalie@noos.fr Customer: L'affaire Baltimore by Joël Dicker Customer: But it's not on this eReader, nor on my wife's, that we are having this problem, it's on a third eReader that we bought for our son-in-law! Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a moment to verify the account. Agent: thanks for waiting Agent: I am sorry that you are experiencing this issue, I will do my best to assist you. Agent: is the power button of the eReader damaged or loose? Customer: Not at all, as I said, the third eReader was exchanged this morning and it has the same problem, we have to press the button long and hard to turn the eReader on or off. Agent: is this eReader a replacement? Customer: Not at all, this 3rd eReader is a gift. Agent: When and where was this eReader purchased? Customer: …. Customer: For our son-in-law..... for Christmas..... we exchanged it this morning and we're still having the same problem. Customer: It was bought before Christmas and exchanged this morning... Customer: At Hernandez in Geneva. Agent: Is it possible to share a photo of your receipt or any other proof of purchase in order to verify the warranty? Customer: Yes, I'm scanning the document.... Customer: Visitor uploaded: Scan_+33 2 90 99 78 93.pdf Customer: URL: http://godard.org/ Customer: Type: application/pdf Customer: Size: 2 Customer: I sent it... Agent: thank you, please one moment Customer: Visitor uploaded: 2020-12-28-Hernandez.pdf Customer: URL: http://godard.org/ Customer: Type: application/pdf Customer: Size: 2 Customer: The ticket.... Agent: thank you very much Customer: I also have the proof of return for the exchanged one..... Customer: Is it a manufacturing defect, a defective series? Agent: Please stay online with me, I am contacting my team to get further assistance Agent: thanks for waiting Agent: We will replace your eReader Agent: I will send you a confirmation email Agent: please one moment Customer: Thank you, how do you do that? Agent: the email is being sent Agent: you can reply to the email as soon as you receive it Agent: it will be sent to the email address that you used to open this chat Agent: as soon as you reply the email with the information requested we can continue with your replacement process Customer: I just checked my emails, but I haven't received anything Agent: it could take a few minutes more Agent: it is not necessary to wait online, you can reply when you receive the email and we will continue the process Agent: your reference number is Agathe Le Maillet Customer: Sorry, but I didn't receive anything at my leroynathalie@noos.fr email address. Agent: the email is still on course Agent: you will receive it in a few moment Customer: Ok, thank you Agent: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation. Agent: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Agent: are you still with me? Agent: I will close this chat now since no response has been received. Agent: I will gladly continue assisting you via email, or you can contact us again at a more convenient time for you. Agent: Thank you for contacting Hernandez, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day.

fr:
Client: Acheté liseuse Blanc Tessier S.A.S. en octobre 3318391 Client: en panne en mode veille Client: marche/arret ne fonctionne pas Client: recharger batterie non plus Client: anais24@voila.fr Client: 22/12/20 Client: L'Assassin royal (Tome 8) - La Secte mau... Client: De : Robin Hobb Client: j'en ai acheté 3 autres depuis mais n'ai pas le mail de confirmation sous la main Client: suis au tome 12 (fini) Agent: Merci pour l'information. Agent: Nous serons heureux de vous aider. Agent: Nous examinerons votre compte, un instant s'il vous plaît. Client: merci Agent: Merci pour votre temps d'attente. Agent: Nous sommes désolés de savoir que vous rencontrez ce problème avec votre liseuse, cependant, nous sommes prêt à vous aider. Agent: Nous vous recommandons d'essayer d'effectuer la réinitialisation des paramètres d'usine de l'appareil. Agent: Nous partagerons avec les étapes de la façon de le faire, d'accord ? Client: ok Agent: Avant de commencer Agent: Chargez votre liseuse pendant au moins 1 heure. Agent: Assurez-vous d'avoir accès à une connexion Wi- Fi. Agent: Appuyez sur le bouton d'alimentation et maintenez-le enfoncé jusqu'à ce que l'écran noir " Éteint " s'affiche. Agent: Remarque : si vous ne voyez pas l'écran « Éteindre », passez à l'étape suivante. Agent: Appuyez et maintenez l'un des boutons de tour de page. Agent: Tout en maintenant le bouton de mise en page, appuyez sur le bouton d'alimentation et maintenez-le enfoncé. Agent: Attendez que l'écran clignote et lance le processus de réinitialisation. Agent: Il faut généralement environ 30 secondes à la liseuse pour lancer le processus de réinitialisation. Client: rien de tout cela ne marche : la liseuse a chargé toute la nuit (enfin, elle était branchée pour le faire mais je ne sais pas si elle a chargé). Client: Et les 2 manips indiquées ne fonctionnent pas. Client: soit elle ne charge plus, soit le bouton marche/arrêt ne fonctionne plus Agent: Nous comprenons. Agent: Nous vous chercherons plus d'aide, un instant s'il vous plaît. Agent: Merci pour votre temps d'attente, nous avons vérifié les informations. Malheureusement, la réinitialisation des paramètres d'usine de l'appareil est la dernière ressource que nous avons pour ce type de problèmes. Agent: Cependant, nous avons vérifié si nous pouvions procéder au remplacement de l'appareil et il semble que l'appareil soit toujours sous garantie. Pour demander le remplacement, nous avons besoin que vous nous fournissiez les informations suivantes : Agent: Nom : Agent: Nom de rue : Agent: Appartement / / Suite / / Autre : Agent: Ville : Agent: État / province / territoire : Agent: Pays : Agent: Code postal : Agent: Téléphone : Agent: Nom de l'appareil : Client: Honoré Cousin Client: 91, chemin Roland Carpentier
61395 Petitnec Client: 91, chemin Roland Carpentier
61395 Petitnec Client: FRANCE Client: Tel : 3318391 Client: Appareil : Blanc Tessier S.A.S. Liseuse Blanc Tessier S.A.S. Agent: Merci beaucoup, nous soumettrons la demande de remplacement et vous recevrez un courriel de confirmation avec les prochaines étapes de ce processus, cela vous convient-il ? Client: Eh bien je suppose qu'il n'y a pas d'autre solution, donc oui ... Agent: Merci pour votre compréhension et nous sommes vraiment désolés pour cette situation. Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que nous pouvons faire pour vous aider ?  Client: puis-je avoir un relevé de l'échange pour garder une trace ? Agent: Vous recevrez tous les informations par e-mail. Client: ok Client: merci au revoir Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Blanc Tessier S.A.S., nous avons eu le plaisir de vous aider aujourd'hui. Agent: Bonne journée.
en:
Customer: I bought a Blanc Tessier S.A.S. eReader on October 3318391 Customer: malfunction in standby mode Customer: start/stop doesn't work Customer: the battery recharge doesn't work either Customer: anais24@voila.fr Customer: 22/12/20 Customer: L'Assassin royal (Volume 8) - La Secte mau... Customer: By: Robin Hobb Customer: I bought 3 others since then, but I don't have the confirmation email with me now Customer: continued in volume 12 (finished) Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: I'll review your account, one moment please. Customer: thank you Agent: Thank you for your waiting time Agent: I'm really sorry to know that you are having this issue with your eReader, however, I'm willing to help you. Agent: I'll recommend you try perform the factory reset of the device. Agent: I'll share with the steps of how to do it, okay? Customer: ok Agent: Before you start: Agent: Charge your eReader for at least 1 hour. Agent: Make sure you have access to a Wi Fi connection. Agent: Press and hold the power button until you see a black 'Powered off' screen. Agent: Note: If you don't see the 'Powered off' screen, go to the next step. Agent: Press and hold one of the page turn buttons. Agent: While holding the page turn button, press and hold the power button. Agent: Wait until the screen flashes and starts the reset process. Agent: It usually takes about 30-seconds for the eReader to start the reset process. Customer: none of this works: the eReader was charging all night (I mean, it was connected, but I don't know if it charged). Customer: And the 2 steps you suggested don't work. Customer: either it's no longer charging, or the on/off button is no longer working Agent: I understand. Agent: I'll look for more assistance for you, one moment please. Agent: Thank you for your waiting time, I have checked the information, Unfortunately the factory reset of the device is the last resource that we have for this type of issues. Agent: However, I checked if we can proceed with a replacement of the device and it seems that the device still under warranty, so in order to request the replacement, I'll need that you provide me with the following information: Agent: Name: Agent: Street Name and number: Agent: Apartment // Suite// Other: Agent: City: Agent: State/Province/Territory: Agent: Country: Agent: Zip/Post Code: Agent: Telephone #: Agent: Device name: Customer: Honoré Cousin Customer: 91, chemin Roland Carpentier
61395 Petitnec Customer: 91, chemin Roland Carpentier
61395 Petitnec Customer: FRANCE Customer: Ph: 3318391 Customer: Device: Blanc Tessier S.A.S. eReader Blanc Tessier S.A.S. Agent: Thank you so much, I'll submit the request of the replacement and you will receive an email confirmation with the next steps for this process, is that okay for you? Customer: Well, I guess there's no other solution, so yes... Agent: Thank you for your understanding and I', really sorry for this situation. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: Can I have a proof of exchange for my records? Agent: You will receive all the informaton via email. Customer: ok Customer: thank you, bye Agent: Thank you for contacting Blanc Tessier S.A.S., it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day.

fr: Client: Je ne le vois pas Agent: Bonjour Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, je serai ravi de vous aider aujourd'hui. Agent: Comment puis-je vous aider ? Agent: Je suis désolé, pour des raisons de qualité, je devrai fermer ce chat si je ne reçois pas de réponse dans 2 minutes. Agent: Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, nous serons ravis de continuer à vous aider par e-mail ou vous pourrez nous contacter à nouveau. Agent: Votre numéro de référence est Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas Client: J’ai demandé deux fois pour échanger un étui pour que j’avais acheté pour la liseuse de ma femme  mais je ne sais pas encore comment faire je ne veux pas être remboursé mais seulement échange l’étui car il est trop petit   Agent: Je vois, Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas vous avez acheté la couverture directement avec nous ? Client: oui Agent: J'ai compris Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, je vais vous aider. Agent: Pouvez-vous me fournir le numéro de commande afin de voir ce que je peux faire pour vous ? Client: la couverture qu’elle a présentement à 5 pouces par 7 pouces mais ce que j’ai reçu c’est trop petit j’ai commandé chez vous parce que je trouvais cela plus simple mais je vois pas cela comme cela maintenant Client: numéro commande MNVBFRDQ Agent: Merci, Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas. Agent: Pour le moment, toutes nos housses de protection sont conçues pour un modèle spécifique. Je vois ici que vous avez acheté celle pour un appareil Pineau. Agent: Nous ne pouvons pas échanger contre un autre, car c'est le seul modèle que nous avons. Agent: Si vous voulez, je peux traiter le remboursement pour vous. Agent: Nous nous excusons sincèrement pour la gêne occasionnée. Client: Oui j’aimerais bien je croyais qu’an commandant de la compagnie même j’aurais le bon etui Agent: J'ai compris Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, je traiterai le remboursement pour vous. Agent: J'espère que vous avez trouvé celui qui convient à votre femme. Agent: Pour procéder au remboursement, veuillez fournir vos coordonnées complètes : Agent: Nom : Agent: Nom et numéro de rue : Agent: Appartement / / Suite / / Autre : Agent: Ville : Agent: État / province / territoire : Agent: Pays : Agent: Code postal : Agent: Téléphone : Agent: Nom de l'appareil : Client: pas encore car je pensais que je pourrais avoir le bon de vous Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas MNVBFRDQ  étui pour liseuse Pineau Agent: Merci beaucoup Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, accordez-moi quelques minutes pour créer le remboursement pour vous. Client: Pineau Agent: Je vous remercie pour votre patience. Agent: Je travaille toujours sur votre compte, veuillez m'accorder quelques minutes de plus. Client: prenez votre temps on en a beaucoup de libre ceux qui ne travaille pnlus Agent: Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, la housse était noire ? Client: Oui Agent: Merci beaucoup Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas. Agent: Une fois vos informations de contact reçues, nous vous enverrons un e-mail avec un lien pour valider vos informations d'expédition. Agent: 1 Agent: Assurez-vous que votre adresse de livraison est exacte et notez l'appareil de remplacement qui vous est expédié. Agent: Apportez les corrections nécessaires, le cas échéant. Agent: 2 Agent: Cliquez sur Accepter en bas de l’écran. Agent: Dans les 2 jours ouvrables, une étiquette de retour vous est envoyée par e-mail. Agent: 3 Agent: Imprimez l'étiquette de retour et suivez les instructions fournies pour nous renvoyer votre appareil. Agent: Ignorer simplement le remplacement de Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, il vous suffit d'envoyer le sleepCover Agent: Une fois que nous aurons reçu le sleepCover, nous traiterons le remboursement Client: mais je n’ai pas d’imprimante Agent: Pouvez-vous imprimer sur un autre site ? Agent: Nous avons vraiment besoin des étiquettes pour renvoyer le sleepCover Client: non vous ne pouvez pas m’envoyer les étiquettes pour que je vous lerenvoie Agent: Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, nous devons coller les étiquettes sur la boîte de l'appareil afin de le retourner, et nous assurer que l'article nous parvienne Client: Je ne comprends pas Agent: Je suis désolé Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas. Agent: Les étiquettes devraient être sur l’étui SleepCover, pour nous assurer que l'article nous parvient. Agent: Lorsque l’étui nous parvient, nous pouvons traiter le remboursement Client: Je vous remercie mais cela ne m’aide pas Agent: Je suis vraiment désolé Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas. Agent: Veuillez me faire savoir s'il y a autre chose que je puisse faire pour vous. Client: Mon problème c’est que je n’ai pas accès à une imprimante Agent: Est-il possible que vous puissiez aller dans n'importe quel magasin ou quelque chose ? Client: Je vais de donner une autre adresse e-mail mais cela peut prendre un peu de temps merci Agent: Je vois Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, voulez-vous changer l'adresse e-mail ? Client: je vais le faire envoyer à l’adresse e-mail suivante dominique12@huet.fr Agent: Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, le remboursement a été créé. Agent: Si vous voulez, vous pouvez renvoyer l'e-mail à cette adresse e-mail Client: Si je vais voir mon e-mail je vais perdre le chat avec toi ? Agent: J'espère que cela ne se produit pas, mais c'est le cas, vous pouvez répondre à mon e-mail et je me ferai un plaisir de continuer à vous aider personnellement. Agent: Ou vous pouvez nous contacter à nouveau comme vous préférez Client: merci beaucoup de ta gentillesse prenez bien soin de vous Agent: Mon plaisir Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, pour cette question ou une autre que vous pourriez avoir, n'hésitez pas à nous re-contacter. Agent: Nous sommes heureux de pouvoir vous aider. Agent: J'apprécierais grandement si vous pouviez y répondre. Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Pineau, j'ai eu le plaisir de vous aider aujourd'hui. Agent: J'espère que vous passez une excellente journée et prenez soin de vous !
en: Customer: I don't see it Agent: Hi Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, I will gladly assist you today. Agent: How can I help you? Agent: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes. Agent: But don't worry, we will gladly continue assisting you via email or you can contact us again. Agent: Your reference number is Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas Customer: I asked twice to exchange a case which I bought for my wife's eReader, but I don't know how to do it, and I don't want to get a refund, I just want to exchange the case because it's too small Agent: I see, Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas you bought the cover directly with us? Customer: yes Agent: Got it Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, I am going to help you. Agent: Can you please provide me the order number in order to see what I can do for you? Customer: The cover she currently has is 5 inches by 7 inches, but the one I bought is too small, I ordered it from you because I thought it would be simpler, but I don't think that anymore Customer: Order number MNVBFRDQ Agent: Thank you Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas. Agent: At the moment all our sleepcover are designed for an specific model, I can see here that you purchased the one for a Pineau device. Agent: We can't exchange for another one, because that's the only model we have. Agent: If you want I can process the refund for you. Agent: We deeply apologize the inconveniences Customer: Yes, I would like to, I thought that by ordering directly from the company I would get the right case Agent: Got it Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas I will process the refund for you. Agent: I hope that you found the one that fits with your wife Agent: To proceed with the refund, please provide your full contact information: Agent: Name: Agent: Street Name and number: Agent: Apartment // Suite// Other: Agent: City: Agent: State/Province/Territory: Agent: Country: Agent: Zip/Post Code: Agent: Telephone #: Agent: Device name: Customer: Not yet, because I thought I could get the right one from you Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas MNVBFRDQ case for the Pineau eReader Agent: Thank you so much Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, please allow me a few minutes to create the refund for you. Customer: Pineau Agent: I appreciate your patience. Agent: I am still working on your account,  please allow me a few more minutes. Customer: take your time, we have many books that no longer work Agent: Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, sleepcover was black right? Customer: Yes Agent: Thank you so much Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas. Agent: Once your contact information has been received, we will send you an email with a link to validate your shipment information. Agent: 1 Agent: Ensure your shipping address is accurate and note the replacement device being shipped to you. Agent: Make any corrections, if necessary. Agent: 2 Agent: Click on “Agree” at the bottom of the screen. Agent: Within 2 business days, a return shipping label is sent to you via email. Agent: 3 Agent: Print the return label and follow the instructions provided to send your device back to us. Agent: Just ignore about replacement Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, you only have to send the sleepcover Agent: Once we have received the cover, we will process the refund Customer: but I don't have a printer Agent: Are you able to print on another site? Agent: We really need the labels to return the cover Customer: no, you can't send me the labels so that I can send it back to you Agent: Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, we need to paste the labels on the device box in order to return it, and make sure that the item reach to us Customer: I don't understand Agent: I am sorry Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas. Agent: The labels should be on the sleepcover box, to make sure that the item reach us to us. Agent: Once the cover reach tu us, we can process the refund Customer: Thank you, but that doesn't help Agent: I am really sorry Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas. Agent: Please let me know if there's anything else I can do for you. Customer: My problem is that I don't have access to a printer Agent: Is possible that you can go to any store or something? Customer: I will provide another email address but it may take a little time, thanks Agent: I see Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, do you want to change the email address? Customer: I will send it to the following email address: dominique12@huet.fr Agent: Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, the refund was created. Agent: If you want you can resend the email to this email address Customer: If I check my email, will I lose this chat connection? Agent: I hope that this doesn't happens but it that's the case you can reply my email and I will gladly continue assisting  you personally. Agent: Or you can contact us again  as you prefer Customer: Thank you very much for your kindness, take care  Agent: My pleasure Anouk Dupuis Le Delmas, for this or another question you may have, please don't hesitate to contact us again. Agent: We are happy to help you. Agent: I would greatly appreciate if you could answer it. Agent: Thank you for contacting Pineau, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day and take care!

fr: Client: j'ai acheté une carte cadeau Bègue Baudry S.A.S. (30 euros) mais la personne ne la reçoit pas, pourtant l'adresse mail est la bonne. Client: J'ai essayé de la renvoyer plusieurs fois déjà. Client: onormand@le.com Client: 30 décembre Agent: Merci pour les informations fournies, j'espère que vous allez bien. Agent: Permettez-moi de vérifier votre compte Bègue Baudry S.A.S.. Agent: Je me ferai un plaisir de vous aider. Agent: Veuillez m'accorder un moment. Agent: Merci d'avoir patienté. Je regrette que vous rencontriez des problèmes pour envoyer la carte cadeau électronique. Agent: Pourriez-vous m'indiquer à quel compte vous souhaitez l'envoyer ? Client: l'adresse de la personne est Client: onormand@le.com /  le nom est Lucas Munoz Agent: D'accord. Agent: Accordez-moi un moment et laissez-moi vérifier. Agent: Ce que je peux faire, c'est ajouter ce montant sous forme d'avoir au compte de votre amie. Agent: Est-ce que cela vous convient ? Client: Mon amie utilise uniquement une Bègue Baudry S.A.S. liseuse, elle n'achète rien d'autre sur le site. Client: s'il y a un pb je préfère être remboursée. Client: Ou pouvez-vous créditer son compte Bègue Baudry S.A.S.? Client: J'ai déjà acheté des cartes cadeau Bègue Baudry S.A.S., pourquoi cela ne fonctionne pas avec ce compte? Agent: Je suis désolé, vous voulez dire l'ajouter comme crédit sur votre compte Bègue Baudry S.A.S. ? Client: Non sur le compte Bègue Baudry S.A.S. de Lucas Munoz Client: mais c'est peut-être ce que vous proposiez déjà? Agent: Oui, j'ai mentionné l'ajout de 30,00 € EUR au compte de votre amie : Bègue Baudry S.A.S.. Est-ce que cela vous convient ? Client: Oui parfait! Agent: D'accord. Agent: Donnez-moi un moment. Agent: Je suis désolé mais je ne trouve pas le compte de votre amie avec l'adresse e-mail que vous m'avez fournie. Agent: Si vous voulez, vous pouvez demander à votre amie de créer un compte chez Bègue Baudry S.A.S., nous pourrons ensuite y transférer le montant. Client: en effet : onormand@le.com Client: mon ami m'avait donné une mauvaise adresse Agent: D'accord. Agent: Alors, voulez-vous 30,00 € EUR sur votre compte Bègue Baudry S.A.S. ? Client: c'est celle-là l'adresse de son compte Bègue Baudry S.A.S. que vous pouvez créditer Client: non vous pouvez créditez le compte de Lucas Munoz dont je viens de vous donner la bonne adresse Agent: D'accord. Agent: Veuillez m'accordez un moment. Client: Merci désolée pour la confusion Agent: J'ai trouvé le compte. Agent: Un instant, s'il vous plaît. Agent: Je continue à travailler sur votre demande. Agent: J'examine toujours votre demande. Agent: Je travaille toujours sur votre compte. Agent: Merci d'avoir patienté. Agent: J'ai ajouté un avoir au compte de votre amie et elle pourra l'utiliser à tout moment. Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que je puisse faire pour vous aider ? Agent: Bonjour, êtes-vous toujours là ? Client: Mon amie n'a encore pas reçu les 30 euros sur son compte Client: est-ce normal? Agent: Le crédit pourra être consulté sur le compte Bègue Baudry S.A.S. sur le site Web. Agent: Veuillez vous déconnecter et attendre 2 minutes, puis vous reconnecter. Client: Elle vérifie sur son compte Agent: Affichez votre crédit Bègue Baudry S.A.S.. Agent: Accédez à https://www.leblanc.net/. Agent: Connectez-vous à votre compte. Agent: Sur votre ordinateur, affichez les détails de votre compte en cliquant sur Mon compte à côté de l'icône de profil en haut à droite de la page. Agent: Cliquez sur Paramètres du compte. Agent: Cliquez sur Informations de paiement. Client: Ok Merci , ça a fonctionné Agent: Parfait, je suis content que tout va bien maintenant. Agent: Je vous en prie. Agent: J'ai eu le plaisir de vous aider aujourd'hui. Agent: Bonne Année et meilleurs voeux pour vous cette année. Agent: Au revoir.
en: Customer: I bought a Bègue Baudry S.A.S. gift card (€30) but the recipient did not receive it, although the email address is correct. Customer: I tried to resend it several times already. Customer: onormand@le.com Customer: December 30 Agent: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine. Agent: Please let me verify your Bègue Baudry S.A.S. account. Agent: I will be happy to assist you. Agent: Please give me a moment. Agent: Thank you for holding, I'm sorry you have issues sending the egift card. Agent: Please tell me to what account you want to send it? Customer: The person's address is Customer: onormand@le.com /  the name is Lucas Munoz Agent: Ok. Agent: Please allow me a moment and let me check Agent: What I can do is to add this amount as store credit to your friend account. Agent: Is that ok for you? Customer: My friend only uses a Bègue Baudry S.A.S. eReader, she doesn't buy anything from the site. Customer: If there's a problem, I prefer to get a refund. Customer: Or can you add the credit to her Bègue Baudry S.A.S. account? Customer: I've purchased Bègue Baudry S.A.S. gift cards before, why doesn't it work with this account? Agent: I'm sorry what you mean is to add it as store credit on your Bègue Baudry S.A.S. account? Customer: No, on Lucas Munoz's Bègue Baudry S.A.S. account  Customer: But maybe that's what you're suggesting? Agent: Yes, I mentioned to add the 30,00 € EUR to your friend account: Bègue Baudry S.A.S.  is that ok for you? Customer: Yes, perfect! Agent: Ok. Agent: Please allow me a moment Agent: I'm sorry but I can't find your friend account with the email address you have provided me. Agent: If you want you can ask you friend to create an account with  Bègue Baudry S.A.S. then we can transfer the amount to it. Customer: indeed: onormand@le.com Customer: my friend had given me an incorrect address Agent: Ok. Agent: So do you want the  30,00 € EUR to your Bègue Baudry S.A.S. account? Customer: this is the address of her Bègue Baudry S.A.S. account, which you can credit Customer: no, you can credit Lucas Munoz's account, whose right address I've just given you Agent: Ok. Agent: Please allow me a moment Customer: Thank you, sorry for the confusion Agent: I found the account Agent: One moment please Agent: I keep working on your request Agent: I'm still checking your request Agent: I 'm still working with your account. Agent: Thank you for holding. Agent: I have added a store credit to  your friend account and will be able to use it at any time. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Agent: Hello are you still with me? Customer: My friend hasn't received the €30 on her account yet Customer: is this normal? Agent: The store credit will be able to check on the Bègue Baudry S.A.S. account on  the website Agent: Please ask to sign out and wait 2 minutes and then sign back in again. Customer: she's checking her account Agent: View your Bègue Baudry S.A.S. credit Agent: Go to https://www.leblanc.net/. Agent: Sign in to your account. Agent: On your computer, view your account details by clicking on My Account next to the profile icon at the top right of the page. Agent: Click Account Settings. Agent: Click Payment Information. Customer: Okay it worked, thank you. Agent: Perfect, I'm glad that everything is fine now. Agent: You're welcome. Agent: It was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: Happy New Year and best wishes for you this year. Agent: Goodbye.

fr: Client: Je tente d'ouvrir l'application Simon sur Simon et ça ne fonctionne pas. Client: zbrun@olivier.fr Client: Où est-ce que je trouve ça Agent: Merci pour l'information. Agent: Nous serons heureux de vous aider. Agent: Heureux de vous rencontrer Capucine Bernier. Agent: Nous espérons que vous passez une bonne journée. Agent: Veuillez nous accorder quelques minutes pour trouver votre compte. Client: Aie aie aie Client: Parler avec un robot, ça donne ça... Client: Pour répondre à votre question c'était le 18 décembre 64. Agent: Merci pour la vérification. Agent: Nous avons pu trouver votre compte, bien que nous ayons peur de ne pas être un robot. Agent: Que se passe-t-il exactement lorsque vous essayez d'utiliser l'Appli Simon sur votre ordinateur ? Agent: Dans quelle partie rencontrez-vous des problèmes ? Client: L'application charge indéfiniment. Client: En faisant clic droit je réussis à ouvrir un menu mais mon achat ne s'y trouve pas. Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: C'est comme si vous ouvrez l'application et vous connectez, mais après que l'application continue de se charger ? Agent: Pouvez-vous voir une notification informant l'application de la synchronisation ? Client: Je vois que l'application tente de charger après avoir entré mes informations, mais elle demeure "vide" Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Dans l'Application Desktop, pouvez-vous voir une option dans le coin supérieur droit qui ressemble à une icône de profil ? Agent: Si vous cliquez dessus, vous devriez pouvoir voir l'adresse e-mail associée au compte que vous utilisez dans l'application Simon. Agent: L'adresse e-mail montrant qu'il y a exactement la même chose que vous nous avez fournie ? Client: Non je vois seulement "Se connecter" et un motif qui montre que l'appli charge Client: Elle l'application ferme automatiquement après un certain temps Client: Elle est vraiment terrible l'application haha Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Nous sommes vraiment désolés de savoir à ce sujet. Agent: Par hasard, avez-vous essayé de réinstaller l' Appli Desktop ? Agent: De cette façon, s'il y a un problème dans cette partie, cela pourrait le réparer. Client: Je vais essayer Agent: Bien sûr merci. Agent: Bien que, au cas où vous n'auriez pas encore essayé, si vous désinstallez l'application, veuillez vérifier si vous pouvez supprimer tout dossier qui pourrait être lié au Appli Desktop de votre ordinateur. Agent: Une fois cela fait, veuillez télécharger l' Appli Desktop à partir de ce lien : Client: Je dois la choisir à partir de Simon c'est bien ça? Agent: Veuillez ne télécharger pas l' application du Simon, en fait, cela pourrait être le problème. Client: Le lien web que vous m'avez fourni ne charge pas Client: Page blanche Agent: Nous pensons que le Simon a une ancienne version de l'Appli Desktop, qui n'a pas été supprimée de leur magasin pour une raison inconnue, mais cette version de l'application utilise une couleur bleue caractéristiques au lieu de la liseuse. Agent: Assurez-vous que l'application est téléchargée directement à partir du site Web. Agent: Quant au lien, si possible, essayez de l'ouvrir dans un autre navigateur internet s'il ne fonctionne pas. Agent: De plus, au cas où, veuillez vérifier si votre connexion Internet fonctionne sans problème. Agent: Parfois, cela peut causer des problèmes de chargement. Agent: Si ce lien ne fonctionne toujours pas, essayez d'utiliser celui-ci : Client: Aucun des liens/navigateurs ne fonctionne Client: Et mon wifi est OK puisque nous communiquons Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Il est étrange de savoir que les liens ne fonctionnent pas. Agent: Quel navigateur utilisez-vous pour naviguer sur Internet ? Client: Simon ou Simon Client: Simon Client: Aussi Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Par hasard, si vous tapez « https://www.hernandez.com/ » dans Simon, pouvez-vous trouver notre site Web de cette façon ? Client: Non Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Et si vous essayez de rechercher un autre site Web dans Simon, pouvez-vous voir s'il se charge ou si le même problème se produit ? Client: LEs autres sites fonctionnent Agent: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Par hasard, pouvez-vous me fournir une capture d'écran de la page que vous pouvez voir lorsque vous essayez d'ouvrir notre site Web en utilisant l'un des liens que je vous ai envoyés, s'il vous plaît ?
en: Customer: I'm trying to open the Simon app on Simon and it doesn't work. Customer: zbrun@olivier.fr Customer: Where do I find it Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Nice to meet you, Capucine Bernier. Agent: I hope you are having a great day! Agent: Please, allow me a few minutes to find your account. Customer: Oh dear Customer: That's what you get when you talk to a bot... Customer: To answer your question, it was December 18, 64. Agent: Thank you for the verification! Agent: I was able to find your account, although I'm afraid I am not a robot. Agent: What is exactly happening when you try to use the Simon App in your computer? Agent: In what part are you having problems? Customer: The app just keeps loading. Customer: If I right click, I manage to open a menu but my purchase is not there. Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: It is like you open the App and sign in, but after that the App keeps loading? Agent: Can you see a notification informing the App is syncing? Customer: I see that the app is trying to load after entering my information, but it remains "empty" Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: In the Desktop App, can you see an option in the top-right corner that looks like a profile icon? Agent: if you click it, you should be able to see the email address associated with the account you are using in the Simon App. Agent: The email address showing there is exactly the same you provided me? Customer: No, I can only see "Log in" and a pattern showing that the app is loading Customer: After some time, the application closes automatically Customer: It's a really terrible app haha Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: I am so sorry to know about it. Agent: By any chance, have you tried to re-install the Desktop App? Agent: In that way, if there is any problem in that part, this could fix it. Customer: I'll try Agent: Sure, thank you! Agent: Although, in case you have not tried yet, if  you uninstall the App, please check if you can delete any folder that could be related to the Desktop App from your computer. Agent: Once this is done, please download the Desktop App from this link: Customer: I have to choose it from Simon, right? Agent: Oh, please don't download the App from the Simon, actually that might be the problem. Customer: The link you gave me does not load Customer: White page Agent: I believe the Simon has an old version of the Desktop App, which has not been removed from their store for some unknown reason, but that version of the App uses a characteristic blue color instead of the read one. Client: Parce que vous avez oublié de la remettre dans le nouveau firmware Client: Je vois que vous ne m'aiderez pas, au revoir Agent: Je m'excuse, mais cette fonctionnalité n'a jamais été incluse sur l'appareil. en: Customer: Hello, I just bought one and I'm very disappointed; unlike the announcement, the Pelletier S.A. does not offer landscape mode view, which is an absolutely essential feature for me. Customer: I read in forums that it disappeared with the latest firmware versions. Customer: rioubernadette@hotmail.fr Customer: I unpacked it today and I use epubs with no copyright Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Customer: Simply, regardless of the Pelletier S.A. book, which is readable, there is no icon to change the orientation, which existed before the last firmware updates. Customer: This is a known problem in Pelletier S.A. forums Agent: Yuou can't read in landscape mode anymore, correct? Customer: That's right Agent: I understand, I apologize for the inconvenience, but I'm going ot help you. Customer: ok Agent: One question. Agent: How did you use the landscape mode on your Pelletier S.A. before? Customer: Everything is described above Agent: I see, it's important to share with you, that Pelletier S.A. does not have the landscape mode active from our side. Agent: We are not sure if there's a way to add it to it's functions, byt the device does not have it originally. Customer: What is your native language? Customer: I'm telling you that the device used to have it before the updates Agent: I understand. Agent: How were you able to read in lanscape mode before? Customer: Not me, people who used the same device with an older firmware version Agent: I see, we can't assure you how these users were using the landscape mode, since the device does not have this mode active. Agent: Only Pelletier S.A. and Pelletier S.A. have the landscape mode included. Customer: Not true. Customer: In fact, I just read that you simply have to add a line to the Pelletier S.A. file to reactivate it: [DeveloperSettings] ForceAllowLandscape=true Agent: I understand, this feature does not come from us, Agent: for this reason, we can't assure you how it will works on the device. Customer: Because you forgot to include it in the new firmware Customer: I can see that you won't help me, goodbye Agent: I apologize, but this feature has never been included on the device. Agent: For this reason landscape mode has not been added after the last update. Agent: We just have 2 devices that include landscape mode, Pelletier S.A. and Pelletier S.A.. Agent: Pelletier S.A. has never include landscape mode, not even before the last update. Agent: We apologize for the misunderstanding. Agent: Is there anything else that I can help you with? Agent: Please let us know if you need further support or if you have any additional questions. Agent: Unfortunately, due to quality purposes, I will need to release the interaction if I don’t receive a response in the next 2 minutes. Agent: Sadly I have not received a response after 2 minutes and I will need to release this interaction due to quality purposes, if you have any other question, please contact us again, and we’ll be more than happy to continue assisting you. Agent: Thank you for contacting Pelletier S.A., it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day!

fr: Client: bonjour je veux louer un livre avec ma liseuse sur over drive, toutes les plages ont été remplies, mais je n'arrive pas à récupérer le livre en question Client: celina46@lesage.com Client: je ne veux pas acheter mais louer Agent: Bonjour Léon Lebrun, Client: bonjour Agent: Pour demander un eBook, vous devez vous connecter à votre application sur l'appareil et rechercher l'eBook dans votre bibliothèque locale. Agent: Vous pouvez ajouter ou mettre à jour votre adresse de facturation et vos informations de paiement sur https://baron.fr/ Agent: Avant de mettre à jour votre compte avec une nouvelle carte de crédit, voici quelques choses à retenir : Agent: Entrez votre adresse de facturation et votre code postal exactement comme ils apparaissent sur votre relevé de carte de crédit. en: Customer: Hello, I'd like to rent a book using my reader on over drive, all the pages have been filled, but I can't recover the book in question Customer: celina46@lesage.com Customer: I don't want to buy, but to rent it Agent: Hello Léon Lebrun Customer: Hello, Agent: To request the eBook you need to sign in on your app in the device and search for the eBook in your local library Customer: I did it, but I can't get the book back, what should I do? Agent: To return the book you can only do it by contacting the library or wait the agreed time for them to remove it from your account Customer: I'm on over drive and logged into my account, the name of the library network is there, but what do I need to do to get my book? Agent: Do you want to return or borrow it? Customer: To borrow it Agent: Ok, only siign in with your app on the device and search the eBook, if the file is available you can download to borrow the eBook Customer: Well, I am on my Briand settings, I connect through wi-fi Agent: Good to continue and ask for the eBook you need to update your billing information in your account on the site in https://baron.fr/ Customer: What billing? Agent: Your personal information you need add the same data like your library card to borrow eBooks Customer: The information was already entered in my Briand, what can I do in addition to this? Agent: Add the information in your account on the web site Customer: Ok, but how do I get there? Customer: Sorry, I'm not from the generation who knows how to deal with these things Agent: Don't worry you can connect in your mobile device and visit the site and update the information in "My Accoun" + "Account Settings" and save after you can start to borrow eBooks in your device Customer: I click on account and I don't see the account settings Agent: Are you sign in on the web site? Customer: How can I do it? Agent: Sign in with your PC and open the browser Agent: In the task bar add https://baron.fr/ Customer: I'm on the Briand destop Customer: So, I have to go to the 'account' on my laptop and not on the reader Agent: The app is different, please use the site Customer: Ok, I clicked on accounts Customer: Now what should I do Agent: Update your credit card and billing information Agent: You can add or update your billing address and payment information at https://baron.fr/ Agent: Before you update your account with a new credit card, here are a few things to remember: Agent: Enter your billing address and postal code exactly as it appears on your credit card statement. Agent: If you have trouble purchasing a book using a new credit card, try entering abbreviated and full versions of the street names. Agent: For example 'Street' and 'St. Agent: , or 'Drive' and 'Dr'. Agent: If you're a U.S. customer, enter the postal code in full. Agent: For example, +33 (0)4 58 70 82 91. Agent: Ensure that you're entering the address that's associated with your new credit card. Agent: Make sure that your new credit card has been activated. Agent: When you are are ready to add or update your credit card information: Agent: Go to https://baron.fr/. Agent: Sign in to your Briand account. Agent: Click the My Account at the top right side of the page. Agent: Account Settings. Agent: Select the Payment Information tab. Agent: Under the Payment Information heading, click Change preferred payment method. Agent: After you've made the changes, click Save. Agent: If necessary, you can update your Billing Address on the left hand side on the same page. Customer: I don't see ' my account' Customer: it only says 'back to store' and 'French' Agent: Are you on the site or still on the app? Customer: I'm on the site that you indicated Agent: Ok now have sign in? Customer: on the Briand desktop app and I clicked on the 'Accounts' green box Agent: Please enter the website, do not use the application please Customer: well, I'll take your leave, this is too much for me right now, I'll contact you later Agent: No problem Agent: Thank you for contacting Briand, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day.
