Client: MA Da Silva EST COMPLÈTEMENT GELÉE ET MÊME LE BOUTON D'ALLIMENTATION NE FONCTIONNE PAS. Client: QUE FAIRE ? Client: laurelemonnier@ifrance.com Client: L'anomalie Agent: Merci pour l'information. Agent: Nous serons heureux de vous aider. Agent: Quel type de liseuse Da Silva avez-vous ? Client: J'ai acheté ma nouvelle liseuse en décembre et elle est gelée; le bouton pour l'ouvrir et fermer ne fonctionne pas. Client: Sur mes anciennes liseuses il y avait un petit trou ou insérer un trombone mais il n'y en a pas sur celle-ci. Client: Que faire ? Agent: Par hasard, avez-vous des livres externes dans votre liseuse. Client: non Agent: D'accord, veuillez d'abord suivre ces étapes : Agent: 1 Agent: Maintenez le bouton d'alimentation enfoncé pendant 15 secondes et relâchez-le. Agent: Attendez 5 secondes. Agent: 2 Agent: Appuyez à nouveau fermement sur le bouton d'alimentation pour redémarrer l'appareil. Client: on dirait que le bouton ne s'enfonce pas Agent: Semble-t-il être bloqué ? Client: oui, il ne bouge pas Client: Da Silva 32gb Agent: Pouvez-vous essayer d'appuyer dessus, en le déplaçant un peu d'un côté à l'autre, pour voir s'il sort ? Client: il ne bouge pas Client: même le fil pour la recharger ne fonctionne et le couvercle de veille ne fonctionne pas non plus Agent: Nous vous remercions. Agent: Par hasard, avez-vous remarqué lorsque le bouton a été bloqué ? Client: je tentais de la recharger et cà ne fonctionnais pas alors j'ai essayé de l'éteindre et le bouton d'alimentation ne répondait plus Agent: À quoi l'écran ressemble-t-il maintenant ? Client: gelé dans la page de lecture avec les informations de haut et de bas de page Agent: Il ne dit pas « Éteint », n'est-ce pas ? Client: non Agent: D'accord, merci, pourriez-vous essayer ceci ? Agent: Nous savons que ce n'est peut-être pas possible parce que le bouton d'alimentation est bloqué, mais essayez quand même. Agent: 1. Agent: Appuyez et maintenez l'un des boutons de tour de page. Agent: 2. Agent: Tout en maintenant le bouton de rotation de la page enfoncé, maintenez le bouton d'alimentation enfoncé. Agent: 3. Agent: Attendez que l'écran clignote et lance le processus de réinitialisation. Agent: Il faut généralement environ 30 secondes à la liseuse pour lancer le processus de réinitialisation. Client: aucun effet Agent: Merci. Agent: Nous pouvons continuer à remplacer notre appareil par un nouveau, êtes-vous d'accord ? Client: oui Agent: D'accord, pour démarrer le processus, veuillez nous fournir cette information Agent: Nom : Agent: Nom de rue : Agent: Appartement / / Suite / / Autre : Agent: Ville : Agent: État / province / territoire : Agent: Pays : Agent: Code postal : Agent: Téléphone : Agent: Nom de l'appareil : Client: pierrette parent Client: 96, rue Luce Pelletier
44992 Saint ManonBourg 8Da Silva 32GB  que j'ai acheté le 19 octobre 2020 (order LHVSFRAPZXJ) Agent: Votre ville est le Québec ? Agent: Désolé, votre province ou région, est-ce le Québec ? Client: Saint-Marc-Sur-Richelieu, Québec, Canada, Da Silva Agent: Merci. Client: oui Agent: Merci. Agent: Pouvez-vous accéder à votre email maintenant ? Agent: Nous vous enverrons un e-mail avec un lien pour valider vos informations d'expédition. Agent: 1 Agent: Assurez-vous que votre adresse de livraison est exacte et notez que l'appareil de remplacement vous est expédié. Agent: Faites des corrections, si nécessaire. Agent: 2. Agent: Cliquez sur Accepter en bas de l’écran. Client: est-ce vous qui m'avez envoyé un message par email et qui requiert une réponse ? Agent: Cela ne nécessite pas de réponse, mais vous devez ouvrir l'e-mail et le lien dessus et valider vos informations. Client: OK oû dois-je retourner l'appareil défectueux ? Agent: Merci, Agent: Ce serait tout pour l'instant Client: Merci Agent: Nous vous informons simplement des prochaines étapes de la procédure. Agent: Dans les 2 jours ouvrables, une étiquette de retour vous est envoyée par e-mail. Agent: Imprimez l'étiquette de retour et suivez les instructions fournies pour nous renvoyer votre appareil. Agent: Une fois votre appareil défectueux reçu par Da Silva, un appareil de remplacement sera expédié. Agent: • Vous recevrez un e-mail avec les informations de suivi. Agent: • Prévoyez 7 à 10 jours ouvrables pour la livraison. Client: Merci Agent: Merci beaucoup pour votre temps Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que nous pouvons faire pour vous aider maintenant ? Client: Non merci
en:
Customer: My Da Silva is completely frozen, and even the power button does not work. Customer: What to do? Customer: laurelemonnier@ifrance.com Customer: The anomaly Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: What kind of Da Silva do you have? Customer: I bought my new e-reader in December and it is frozen; the button to open and close it does not work. Customer: On my old reading machines, there was a small hole to insert a paper clip but there is none on this one. Customer: What to do? Agent: By any chance, do you  have any external books in your eReader/ Customer: No Agent: Ok, please first follow these steps: Agent: 1 Agent: Hold down the power button for 15 seconds and release it. Agent: Wait 5 seconds Agent: 2 Agent: Press the power button once more firmly to reboot the device. Customer: it looks like the button does not press Agent: Does it seem to be stuck? Customer: yes, it does not move Customer: Da Silva 32 GB Agent: Could you try to press it around, moving it a little from side to side, to see if it pops out? Customer: it does not move Customer: even the wire for the charger does not work and the standby cover does not work either Agent: Thank you. Agent: By any chance, did you notice when the button got stuck? Customer: I tried to charger it and it did not work, so I tried to turn it off and the power button did not respond anymore Agent: How does the screen look now? Customer: Frozen in the reading page with top and bottom information Agent: It doesn't say "Powered off" , right? Customer: no Agent: Ok, thanks, could you please try this? Agent: I know it might not be possible because of the power button being stuck, but please try it anyway Agent: 1 Agent: Press and hold one of the page turn buttons. Agent: 2 Agent: While holding the page turn button, press and hold the power button. Agent: 3 Agent: Wait until the screen flashes and starts the reset process. Agent: It usually takes about 30-seconds for the eReader to start the reset process. Customer: no effect Agent: Thanks. Agent: We can proceed to replace our device for a new one, do you agree? Customer: Yes. Agent: Ok, to start the process please provide me this information Agent: Name: Agent: Street Name and number: Agent: Apartment // Suite// Other: Agent: City: Agent: State/Province/Territory: Agent: Country: Agent: Zip/Post Code: Agent: Telephone #: Agent: Device name: Customer: Pierrette's parent Customer: 96, rue Luce Pelletier
44992 Saint ManonBourg 8Da Silva 32GB that I bought on October 19, 2020 (order LHVSFRAPZXJ) Agent: Your city is Quebec? Agent: Sorry, your province or region, is Quebec? Customer: Saint-Marc-Sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada, Da Silva Agent: Thanks! Customer: Yes. Agent: Thanks! Agent: Can you please access your email now? Agent: we will send you an email with a link to validate your shipment information. Agent: 1 Agent: Ensure your shipping address is accurate and note the replacement device being shipped to you. Agent: Make any corrections, if necessary. Agent: 2 Agent: Click on “Agree” at the bottom of the screen. Customer: did you send me an email message that requires an answer? Agent: It doesn't require an answer, but you must open the email and the link in it, and validate your information Customer: Ok where should I return the defective device? Agent: Thanks! Agent: This would be all for now Customer: Thank you Agent: I'll just let you know the next steps of the process Agent: Within 2 business days, a return shipping label is sent to you via email. Agent: Print the return label and follow the instructions provided to send your device back to us. Agent: Once your defective device is received by Da Silva, a replacement device will be shipped. Agent: • You will receive an email with the tracking information. Agent: • Allow 7 to 10 business days for delivery. Customer: Thank you Agent: Thanks  a lot for your time Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with for now? Customer: No thanks

fr: Client: Bonjour, Client: Dans ma Perrin je n ai pas l Perrin. Client: Comment l installer ? Client: Ou dois je retourner la liseuse. Client: Merci d avance Client: Oui Client: alexandriabaron@pascal.fr Client: Le messager des Perrin Agent: Bonjour, ce sera un plaisir de vous aider aujourd'hui, à propos de vos doutes, il Perrin n'inclut pas la fonctionnalité pour avoir Perrin comme autres appareils, désolé Client: Sur le site vous dites que Perrin inclut la fonctionnalité Client: Dans la liste des liseuse supportant le service Client: J ai les screen shoy Client: Shot Client: Et dans le manuel utilisateur egalement Agent: Désolé, ma confusion, oui cela l'inclut, j'ai mal lu le nom, pour l'avoir vous devrez faire une réparation de compte afin que cela puisse apparaître, je peux vous transmettre les étapes Client: Réparation de compte? Agent: Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: Appuyez sur l'icône Plus en bas de l'écran. Agent: Appuyez sur « Paramètres ». Agent: Appuyez sur « Informations sur l'appareil ». Agent: À côté de « Réparer votre compte Perrin », appuyez sur « Réparer ». Agent: Appuyez sur « Réparer maintenant ». Agent: Oui est un correctif qui résout normalement les problèmes de Perrin, en attendant laissez-moi vérifier pourquoi il n'apparaît pas automatiquement dans votre cas Client: Ça ne marche pas Agent: Merci de l'avoir essayé, vous avez une adresse de facturation en France, non ? Client: Achat chez Perrin Client: Perrin saint Véronique Georges Agent: Merci, dans ce cas, cela semble être à cause de l'emplacement, ce sont les seuls pays qui le gèrent. La fonction Perrin intégrée pour les liseuses Perrin n'est compatible seulement dans les pays suivants : Agent: Canada Agent: Etats-Unis Agent: Royaume-Uni Agent: Australie Agent: Nouvelle-Zélande Agent: Danemark Agent: Finlande Agent: Norvège Agent: Suède Agent: Taïwan Agent: Hong Kong Agent: Singapour Client: Ça c est la liste des pays où les bibliothèques supporte le format des drm Perrin Client: Notre bibliothèque le fair Client: Fait Client: Donc j ai acheté un produit compatible Agent: C'est la liste des applications Perrin qui peuvent être dans différents pays, mais laissez-moi vérifier s'il est possible de l'ajouter pour votre pays ou pas d'une autre manière. Client: Il faut créer un compte comme si on était a l étranger pour avoir l Perrin??? Agent: Pour avoir un compte de Perrin par exemple sur votre ordinateur, le pays crée un compte normal, car l'application est quand vous devez être dans l'un de ces pays ou avoir un appareil compatible, vous avez l'appareil mais le pays ne vous permet pas de télécharger ou d'avoir Perrin directement sur votre liseuse, dans ce cas, ce que vous pouvez faire est d'exporter des livres de la bibliothèque par Perrin, cela peut être fait dans n'importe quel pays et dans n'importe quel appareil Client: OK mais comment lire le ade c est effectivement le format proposé mais je croyais qu il fallait l Perrin pour l ouvrir Agent: Le Perrin est une application que vous téléchargez sur l'ordinateur, vous pouvez télécharger et emprunter des livres de la bibliothèque. Dans cette application, vous autorisez l'application sur les deux appareils et les livres apparaîtront automatiquement dans votre appareil. Agent: Je peux également vous envoyer les étapes complètes par e-mail si elles fonctionnent pour vous Client: D accord je comprends Client: Je veux bien l email Client: Je vous remercie Agent: Bien sûr avec plaisir, si après cela vous avez encore des questions, vous pouvez les renvoyer sur l'e-mail et je vous aiderai avec plaisir  Client: Merci beaucoup et bonne soirée Agent: Avec plaisir, merci et bonne soirée
en: Customer: Hello, Customer: I don't have the Perrin in my Perrin. Customer: How do I install it? Customer: Or do I have to return the eReader. Customer: Thank you Customer: Yes Customer: alexandriabaron@pascal.fr Customer: The Perrin messenger Agent: Hello it will be a pleasure to assist you today, about your doubt he Perrin do not include the feature for has Perrin as other devices, sorry Customer: Your site says that the Perrin includes the feature Customer: In the list of eReaders supporting the service Customer: I have the screenshoys Customer: Shots Customer: It's also mentioned in the user manual Agent: Sorry my confusion, yes it include it, I read bad the name, for have it you will need to do a repair of account so it can appear I can pass you the steps Customer: Account repair? Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the  More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: Beside 'Repair your Perrin account', tap Repair. Agent: Tap Repair now. Agent: Yes is a fix that normally solve the Perrin problems, meanwhile let me check why it do not appear automatically in your case Customer: It doesn't work Agent: Thank you for trying it, you  have the billing address of France, no? Customer: Purchased from Perrin Customer: Perrin saint Véronique Georges Agent: Thank you, in this case it looks that is because of the location, this are the only countries that handle it The built-in Perrin feature for Perrin eReaders is only compatible in: Agent: Canada Agent: United States Agent: United Kingdom Agent: Australia Agent: New Zealand Agent: Denmark Agent: Finland Agent: Norway Agent: Sweden Agent: Taiwan Agent: Hong Kong Agent: Singapore Customer: That is the list of countries where libraries support the drm Perrin format Customer: Our library dies it Customer: Does it Customer: So I bought a compatible product Agent: This is the list of the Perrin app that can be in different countries, but let me check if is possible to add it for your country or not in another way Customer: Do I have to create an account as if I were abroad to have the Perrin??? Agent: To have account of Perrin for example in your computer is creating an account normal, for have the app is when you need to be in one of this countries or have one device that is compatible, you have the device but the country wont allow you to download or have Perrin direct on your ereader, in this case what you can do is export books of the library by Perrin, this can be done in any device and country Customer: Ok, but how can I read the ade, it's actually the offered format, but I thought I needed the Perrin to open it Agent: The Perrin is one app you download on the computer there you can download and borrow books from the library, there in this app you authorize the app on both devices and the books will appear automatically in your device Agent: I can also send you the complete steps by email if they work for you Customer: Ok, I understand Customer: I do indeed want the email Customer: Thank you. Agent: Sure with pleasure, if after that you still have questions you can write them back on the email and gladly I will help you Customer: Thank you very much and have a good evening Agent: A pleasure, thanks and also good evening

fr: Client: Bonjour Client: J'ai récemment acheté une Bourdon, et la batterie ne dure pas plus de deux jours Client: Est-ce que la lecture de .pdf diminue la durée d'autonomie de la batterie ? Agent: Ce sera un plaisir de vous aider. Agent: Veuillez m'accorder un moment pour vérifier le compte. Agent: Merci pour votre patience Agent: Je vous présente mes excuses que vous rencontriez ce problème, je ferai de mon mieux pour vous aider. Agent: utilisez-vous une coque de protection pour votre Bourdon ? Client: Un cas ? Client: Pas de coque ou de housse Agent: avez-vous essayé une réinitialisation simple ? Agent: Éteignez simplement la liseuse et rallumez-la Client: Je l'ai éteinte et redémarrée plusieurs fois, toujours pareil Agent: dans ce cas, vous pouvez essayer une réinitialisation manuelle sur votre appareil Client: Déjà fait aussi Agent: avez-vous mis à jour la liseuse via un ordinateur ? Client: Oui Agent: d'accord, dans ce cas, je peux revoir vos options de garantie, où et quand votre liseuse a-t-elle été achetée ? Client: Sur Bourdon, le 31 décembre Agent: y a-t-il une photo du reçu de l'achat ou une autre preuve d'achat que vous pouvez partager avec moi s'il vous plaît ? en: Customer: Hello Customer: I recently bought a Bourdon, and the battery lasts no more than two days Customer: Does reading .pdf files shorten the battery life? Customer: Or is it a wrong charger? Customer: Thank you in advance Customer: Christophe Labbé-De Oliveira Customer: suzannemillet@charpentier.fr Customer: I didn't buy anything, just transferred some files Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a moment to verify the account. Agent: Thanks for waiting Agent: I am sorry that you are experiencing this issue, I will do my best to assist you. Agent: is your Bourdon using a protective case? Customer: A case? Customer: No case or cover Agent: did you try a simple reset? Agent: Just turn off the ereader and turn in on again Customer: I switched it off and on several times, no changes Agent: in this case you can try a manual reset on your device Customer: Already done that too Agent: did you update the ereader via computer? Customer: Yes Agent: okay, in this case I can review your warranty options, where and when was your ereader purchased? Customer: On Bourdon, December 31 Agent: is there any photo of the receipt of purchase or any other proof of purchase you can share with me please? Customer: Visitor uploaded: https://www.mallet.com/ Customer: URL: https://www.mallet.com/ Customer: Type: image/jpeg Customer: Size: 403946512 Agent: thank you very much, please one moment Agent: thanks for waiting Agent: your device is under warranty Agent: we will replace it Agent: i will submit your replacement request Agent: to my team Agent: we will send further details via email Agent: please respond to that email as soon as you receive it Agent: you should receive the email later on today Agent: when you reply to the email we can continue with your replacement request Customer: Okay, thank you very much! Customer: And hang in there :) Agent: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation. Agent: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further. Agent: Thank you for contacting Bourdon, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day.

fr: Client: Incapable d'ouvrir les livres transférés sur la liseuse. Client: Donne message `Votre liseuse n'est pas autorisée à ouvrir ce livre`. Client: frederiquemallet@turpin.org Client: Aucun achat de livre. Client: Ce sont de la bibliotheque municipale. Client: Parmi eux Je suis un chercheur d'or Agent: Merci pour les informations fournies, nous espérons que vous allez bien. Agent: Veuillez nous laisser vérifier votre compte Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Nous serons heureux de vous aider. Agent: Veuillez nous donner un moment. Agent: Nous sommes désolés que vous rencontriez des problèmes pour télécharger l'ebook sur votre appareil. Agent: Bonnin S.A.R.L. est-il installé sur votre ordinateur ? Client: Oui. Client: Tout allait bien avec mon ordi de maison mais le probleme a commencé après que j'ai essayé de faire un download de mon ordinateur portable. Client: Ca ne fonctionne plus à partir de mon ordi maison. Agent: Dans ce cas, vous devez annuler l'autorisation de l'ordinateur et de la liseuse. Agent: Ensuite, autorisez à nouveau l'ordinateur et la liseuse avec Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Client: Comment on fait ça. Client: Faut-il éinstaller Bonnin S.A.R.L. et commencer à nouveau? Agent: Veuillez suivre ces instructions : Agent: Vous devez annuler l'autorisation de l'ordinateur et de la liseuse. Agent: Ensuite, autorisez à nouveau l'ordinateur et la liseuse avec Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Ouvrez Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Supprimez le fichier de Bonnin S.A.R.L. ainsi que de Bonnin S.A.R.L. (sous Mes documents) Agent: Assurez-vous que la date et l'heure de votre liseuse sont correctes. Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre ordinateur : Agent: a. Agent: Appuyez sur CTRL + MAJ + D tout en même temps. Agent: (Si vous êtes sur un Mac, appuyez sur Command+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Entrez votre mot de passe Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Agent: c. Cliquez sur Continuer. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre liseuse : Agent: a. Branchez votre liseuse Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Agent: b. Agent: Appuyez sur Connecter sur votre liseuse Agent: c. Cliquez avec le bouton droit sur la liseuse Bonnin S.A.R.L. à gauche sous Appareils. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation du dispositif. Agent: e. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: 6 Agent: Fermez Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Débranchez votre liseuse. Client: C'est noté. Client: Je vais essayer. Client: Merci beaucoup. Agent: Vous êtes les bienvenus, nous espérons qu'il fonctionne. Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Bonne journée. Agent: Au revoir. Client: Bonjour. Agent: Bonjour,
en: Customer: Unable to open the books transferred to the eReader. Customer: It says 'Your reader is not allowed to open this book'. Customer: frederiquemallet@turpin.org Customer: No book purchase. Customer: They are from the municipal library. Customer: One of them is Je suis un chercheur d'or Agent: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine. Agent: Please let me verify your Bonnin S.A.R.L. account. Agent: I will be happy to assist you. Agent: Please give me a moment. Agent: I'm sorry you have issues downloading the ebook to your device. Agent: Do you have Bonnin S.A.R.L. installed in your computer? Customer: Yes. Customer: Everything was fine with my home computer, but the problem started after I tried to download something from my laptop. Customer: It no longer works from my home computer. Agent: In this case you have to de-authorize  the computer and the ereader. Agent: Then authorize the computer and the eReader again with Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Customer: How do I do that. Customer: Do I have to reinstall Bonnin S.A.R.L. and start again? Agent: Please follow these instructions: Agent: you have to de-authorize the computer and the ereader. Agent: Then authorize the computer and the eReader again with Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Open Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Delete the file from Bonnin S.A.R.L. as well as from Bonnin S.A.R.L. (under My Documents) Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: De-authorize your computer: Agent: a. Agent: Press CTRL+SHIFT+D all at the same time. Agent: (If you're on a Mac, press Command+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Enter your Bonnin S.A.R.L. password. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: a. Plug in your Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Bonnin S.A.R.L. eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Bonnin S.A.R.L.. Agent: Unplug your eReader. Customer: Noted. Customer: I'll try that. Customer: Thank you very much Agent: You're welcome, I hope it works. Agent: Thank you for contacting Bonnin S.A.R.L., have a nice day. Agent: Goodbye. Customer: Have a nice day. Agent: Hello

Agent: Would you prefer the refund back to your credit card or as store credit? Agent: Store credit can be used right away in your next purchase and will be used automatically during the checkout, the refund will take from 3 to 5 business days to be reflected back to your credit card. Agent: I ask because if maybe you tried to enter the password of the same account and it is not the same, that could also cause the problem. Customer: The two passwords were identical Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: On the eReader, what happens if you go back to the main sign in page? Agent: What can you see there? Customer: it says log in to your account or create a new account then continue with Perez Guillet SA or log in with Perez Guillet SA Customer: which link should I click on? Agent: Well, in this case, because you only have Perez Guillet SA as login option, you should need to click the option to login with Perez Guillet SA, so please try to select it again and enter your information one more time to see if maybe you can sign in this time with your Perez Guillet SA credentials. Customer: I'll try it right away Agent: Sure, thank you so much! Customer: it worked Customer: thank you. Customer: how can I download books now? Customer: free books at first, so that I can familiarize myself with the eReader? Agent: Fantastic! Agent: I am happy to know you have access to your account now. Agent: As for your question, now that you have your account, you could begin to purchase eBooks from the Perez Guillet SA store on the eReader, or maybe from our website at http://collet.com/. Agent: In this case, if you want to try with some free eBooks, you can go to our Perez Guillet SA website using this link: Agent: When you access to this link, please search for an option that says "Sign in" or " Log In". Agent: It should be on the top-right corner of the website. Customer: Must the eReader be connected to a computer or is it possible on Perez Guillet SA? Customer: If I understood correctly, I must first download a book on the computer and then download it on the eReader? Agent: Not exactly, if you have the eReader connected to the WiFi at the moment, it is not necessary to connect it to the computer to transfer Perez Guillet SA eBooks. Agent: If you want to add a free eBooks from to your Perez Guillet SA account, you need to access the link I sent you, sign into your account using Perez Guillet SA as login option and then you can add all the free eBooks you want to your account. Agent: Once you add all the eBooks, you can go back to the eReader and then sync the eReader to download the new eBooks there. Agent: To sync, there is an icon on the top that looks like a spinning arrow or circle. Agent: Only if you would like to try transfer eBooks from a third-party device, it would be necessary to use a computer and another program called Perez Guillet SA to make that transfer process. Customer: Thank you very much for all these explanations Agent: You're welcome, Zacharie Fischer! Agent: It is a pleasure to help you. Agent: I wish you enjoy your reading and if you require further assistance with it, please let us know at anytime you need and we will be more than happy to help you! Agent: Is there anything else I can do for you?

en: Customer: Hello, I can't download my purchase Customer: moniqueleclerc@pierre.fr Customer: January 4 Agent: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine. Agent: Please let me verify your Delmas et Fils account. Agent: I will be happy to assist you. Agent: Please give me a moment. Agent: I'm sorry you have issues with the ebook you purchased. Agent: What is the title of the ebook you have issues with? Customer: Maggie-now Agent: What kind of device are you using to read the ebooks? Customer: When I go to the https://dupre.fr/ site with my account, I can see all the books I purchased, but when I use my phone app, I can only see the last book I bought, Ville de papier, and the new Magie-Now is nowhere to be found Customer: I read books on my iPhone Agent: Ok. Agent: Thank you. Agent: Please click repair account on the Delmas et Fils app. Customer: I did it several times, but it didn't work Customer: I also deleted the app several times, but it didn't work Agent: Don't worry, I have worked with the ebook now here. Agent: Please try to click repair account on the after I worked the ebook from here. Customer: I'm contacting you from my Delmas et Fils computer, but I read my books on my iPhone Agent: I understand. Agent: Have you repair account on the iphone? Agent: Delmas et Fils app Customer: yes, several times and again just 1 minute ago Agent: Were you able to open the ebook? Agent: Please sign out from the Delmas et Fils account on the Delmas et Fils app then wait 3 minutes and sign back in again. Customer: Only one book is displayed on my iPhone (ville de papier, bought a few weeks ago, and yes, I can open it Customer: As I said, I deleted the app several times and waited the necessary 10 minutes  Agent: I'm trying to help you and I would like you to please follow my instructions, because I just worked with the ebook here. Customer: ok, I just deleted the app again Agent: No don't remove the ap[p Agent: Just sign out from the Delmas et Fils account. Customer: I have 2 choices: uninstall or delete Customer: ok, I just found it, I logged out Agent: Ok. thanks Customer: ok, now I see all my books except the one I bought a few weeks ago: Ville de papier?? Agent: Ok. One moment please Agent: I didn't find the ebook:  City of paper in your Delmas et Fils account or purchased history. Agent: When was it purchased? Customer: a few weeks ago. Customer: Before contacting you, it was the only book that was being displayed on the app... Customer: Les villes de papier by Céline Morvan-Meyer Agent: Do you have the receipt# ? Customer: I'm looking for it Agent: Ok. Agent: Thanks Customer: I can't find it Customer: I paid for it with an indigo gift card Agent: Ok. Agent: It must be in your email Customer: I don't keep all my emails!!! Customer: Once it was downloaded, I had to delete the email... Agent: Ok. Agent: If you have or use another email that may be related to the Delmas et Fils account; you can also provide me that so I can search for an account Customer: No, I have only one email for 7-8 years Agent: The last purchased was the MAggie now ebook and this is  from 7379, I don't see any purchased from 2020 Customer: Before chatting with you, I had it in my app!!! Customer: Your system works poorly and I have to waste a lot of time solving your problems, and now you tell me that you have lost one of my books! Agent: So I think you may have use a different email address and created a different account and this is the reason the ebook  is not under this account. Customer: I have the same email for 7-8 years!!! Customer: What is the phone number so I can complain? Customer: Please give me a phone number Agent: At the moment the phone support is not available but I can help you here. Agent: Please provide me  a screenshot of your payment that you made for that ebook. Customer: It is a book of 12$!!! Customer: Do you think I keep all my invoices, especially after the book is downloaded?? Customer: I have already wasted too much time with this. Please give me a phone number and I will call later Agent: I'm sorry at the moment our phone support is temporary unavailable but I will be happy to help you on the chat or email support. Customer: I will call later Agent: You can also provide a screenshot of your  bank statement Customer: I paid with a gift card! Agent: I'm sorry I don't understand what was your method of payment Customer: Delmas et Fils Agent: If  you saw the ebook the confirmation email must be in your recycle bin. Customer: The same card used to buy Maggie-Now on January 4, 7379 Customer: I do not keep all my emails! Customer: You are making me repeat the same things and wasting my time. Agent: I want to help you find your  purchase but you have to provide me more information. Customer: Your terrible attitude just made you lose a client forever. I will find the phone number, and make a complaint. Agent: I can email to you with some requirement and you can provide me information and according to it we can search your account.

Agent: At this moment, are you setting up the Poirier S.A.S. eReader again? Customer: what is the original account? Agent: The original account is the one associated with the second email address you provided me. Customer: yes, but that of the other eReader, is it possible to have 2 eReaders on the same account? Agent: Yes, it is completely possible! Agent: If you have a second eReader, you also need to sign in on the original account and all your Poirier S.A.S. will also download in the second eReader. Customer: on the Wi-Fi eReader, of course Agent: Do you mean you are trying to connect the eReader to the WiFi at this moment? Customer: it works on Poirier S.A.S. §§ Agent: The WiFI is properly connected to the eReader at the moment? Customer: the eReader wants to log in to the Poirier S.A.S. account? Customer: IT WORKS Agent: Thank you very much. Agent: Do you had success signing in with the Poirier S.A.S. login option? Customer: no, I didn't have the codes here, I found Poirier S.A.S. Customer: the 2 tablets have the same accounts and the same books, it's even better than the accounts! Customer: 2 accounts Customer: thank you very much Agent: Good to know! Agent: That login option is also associated with your account, so that explains why it worked! Agent: And yes, as long as you always use the original account in all your devices with Poirier S.A.S., your eBooks will download there. Agent: I wish you enjoy your reading! Agent: And you're welcome, it is a pleasure to help you! Agent: Is there anything else I can do for you? Customer: thanks again, and have a good evening Agent: Thank you so much! Agent: I wish you also have a good end of the day, too! Agent: Thank you for your time and kindness, Diane Lebrun. Agent: It means so much for me to know I was able to help you both with this! Agent: Goodbye!

Customer: Why did I have to return the Reynaud eReader before January 5 but did not receive the Reynaud, which by the way is not free of charge Customer: lorraineda-costa@live.com Agent: Hi Sébastien Bigot Le Rey! Agent: Are you still there? Agent: Can you please confirm either the date of your most recent purchase or the title of one of the ebooks/audiobooks in your account? Customer: I don't remember Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Nice to meet you, Sébastien Bigot Le Rey. Agent: I hope you are having a great day! Agent: To be able to verify your account you can provide me with an eBook title in it or your billing address. Customer: Delivery is at 389, boulevard Guillot
25385 Lagarde Agent: Splendid, thank you. Agent: If I understand your issue correctly, you want to return your Reynaud? Customer: I bought a Reynaud eReader in late December, but I received another Reynaud, so I already have one. Therefore, I returned it before Jan 5 as per https://guerin.fr/, but I've been waiting for several days and you haven't done anything Agent: You want to return your Reynaud? Agent: I have read your last interaction. Agent: Thank you. Agent: Have you sent the Reynaud back to us? Customer: I did that before Jan 5 Customer: You received it but you're taking too long to send me the Reynaud Agent: You send the Reynaud on January 5th? Customer: What's wrong Customer: You received my Reynaud before Jan 5, as requested Agent: Thank you, please allow me a moment. Customer: Sébastien Bigot Le Rey talked Customer: with a gentleman who told me you had received it and that I would get the Reynaud in a few days, but it's been more than a week Agent: I understand, please allow me a moment. Agent: You sent the eReader yesterday or when did you send the Reynaud? Customer: I sent a Reynaud before Jan 5, as you had asked me Customer: I had ordered a Reynaud in dec. Agent: Thank you, please allow me a moment. Customer: Sébastien Bigot Le Rey received a Reynaud instead of a Reynaud Customer: Then I returned the Reynaud, which you received. Agent: Thank you, please allow me a moment while I look into the issue. Customer: So we were supposed to receive a Reynaud in the exchange. Customer: But we've waiting for more than a week Customer: What's the problem Customer: What is delaying the shipment of the Reynaud. Agent: I will proceed to escalate this ticket so our team can look into it and we will get back to you through email as soon as possible. Agent: I truly apologize for the inconvenience. Customer: It's pretty simple to me,,, Customer: what are you waiting for to send me the Reynaud I paid for Customer: I'll be waiting for your email and I hope you fix this situation soon.. Agent: I'm truly sorry, we will get back to you as soon as possible. Agent: In the meantime is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: no, thanks Agent: Thank you for contacting Reynaud, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day.

en: Customer: Hello, I bought the first volume of a series but then I found out that I could buy the entire collection, I haven't read it yet, I would like to return it so that I can buy the collection, the order number is #PHONE_NUMBER#, the book is Yves Louis Customer: Thank you Customer: prevostmichelle@laposte.net or EMAIL-1, I've been trying to change it for some time Customer: Today, January 9 Agent: Hello, thank you for the information. Agent: Would you prefer the refund back to your payment method or as store credit? Agent: Store credit can be used right away in your next purchase and will be used automatically during the checkout. Agent: I can see here that you can change your email address, because you have created an account with the other email address. Agent: We have two options on this cases, one would be to link both accounts, and the other one, transferred all your books, but your old purchase history will remains on your current account. Agent: Yves Louis , I am still here to help you. Customer: Soon I will not be able to use the email prevostmichelle@laposte.net, because it's a company email Customer: Will I be able to respond with the Denis S.A. address by linking the two accounts? Agent: I see, well the emails just be send to main email, and I,m afraid that link could't works. Agent: But I can transfer all your books if you want Agent: And you will be able to use the other email to purchase and read your books Customer: Ok, yes, thank you Agent: Great, one moment please I'll transfer all your books. Agent: Thank you for holding, Yves Louis. Agent: All your books has been transferred to your Denis S.A. account. Agent: Please make sure to tap continue with Denis S.A. option on Agent: more sign in options when you sign in, and  sync your device. Customer: Ok, thank you very much Agent: My pleasure Yves Louis, happy to help. Agent: If you need further assistance please don't hesitate to reply my email and I will gladly continue assist you. Agent: Or you can thread open a new interaction with us. Agent: You will receive a survey shortly after the chat is closed in which my customer service skills will be evaluated, it will greatly help us to hear from you. Agent: Thank you for contacting Denis S.A., it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent evening. Customer: Yes, thanks and have a good evening too.

Agent: Mme Agent: Je reste disponible Client: je ne comprends pas compte de lien Agent: Je suis désolé si je n'étais pas clair. en: Customer: I have just subscribed to an audio book, by mistake, and wish to cancel. Agent: Hello,  I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: In order to do that, can you please provide me the email address of your Delannoy account? Customer: coulonnicole@orange.fr Agent: For security purposes, can you please confirm either the date of your most recent purchase or the title of one of the ebooks/audiobooks in your account? Customer: I bought at Delannoy Mais la vie continue, by Lucie Briand-Le Roux Agent: Thank you so much, Lucie Briand-Le Roux. Agent: If I understand correctly, you want to cancel your subscription, right? Customer: Yes. Agent: Got it, I am going to help you to do that. Agent: Please go to website http://roy.com/, and then sign in into your account Agent: Then please, go to my account and you should be able to see "Subscriptions" button Agent: You have initiated a free trial, so you haven't been charged. Agent: You have a credit to get a free audiobook Agent: Once your subscription is canceled, you have 6 months to redeem this credit. Customer: I don't understand this at all. I bought an audio book from Lucie Briand-Le Roux, I don't see it in the Delannoy app on my phone. I don't understand anything, I want to cancel this subscription that I made by mistake... Should I go to Account and Subscriptions? Agent: I see, Lucie Briand-Le Roux. Agent: I am sorry to hear about that, I have cancelled the audiobook subscription by my end. Agent: Regard to your book, do you have the receipt number? Agent: Let us know if you need further support or if you have any further questions. Agent: Unfortunately, for quality reasons, I will have to release the interaction if I do not receive a response within the next 2 minutes. Agent: But don't worry, we will gladly continue assisting you via email or you can contact us again. Agent: Your reference number is Lucie Briand-Le Roux Customer: MAMJFR5G2H2 Agent: Thank you, the book was purchased with Delannoy? Customer: Yes. Agent: I see, Lucie Briand-Le Roux. Agent: You can't see your book, because you have to link your Delannoy and your Delannoy account, in order to see the book. Agent: please Customer: How do I associate my Delannoy account with Delannoy Agent: Ok, I am going to help you. Agent: In order to link the accounts, can you please go to website http://roy.com/? Customer: I'm in. Agent: Then please sign in into your Delannoy account Agent: If you are signed, please tap "My account" at the top of  the screen Customer: I'm on. Customer: It's done. Agent: Then please go to account settings Customer: It's done. Agent: Please go under, and you should be able to see the option to link your Delannoy account Customer: I don't understand... "go under"? Agent: Yes please under your account settings you should be able to see options yo link account Agent: Mrs. Agent: I am still here fo you Customer: I don't understand "link account". Agent: I am sorry if I wasn't be clear. Agent: Please help me to look into this article to clarify your doubts http://roy.com/ Agent: Let us know if you need further support or if you have any further questions. Agent: Unfortunately, for quality reasons, I will have to release the interaction if I do not receive a response within the next 2 minutes. Agent: But don't worry, we will gladly continue assisting you via email or you can contact us again. Agent: Your reference number is Lucie Briand-Le Roux Customer: Okay, thank you. Agent: Thanks to you for your patience, I hope that link your accounts has been successfully. Agent: Please let me know if there's anything else I can do for you

fr: Client: Bonjour, Client: J'ai créé un compte il y a des années sous l'adresse email neveugilles@pascal.fr mais quand je me connecte à ma Guilbert Gay et Fils, cela me dit que le compte a été désactivé. Client: Je souhaiterais le réactiver, comment faire ? Agent: Nous serons heureux de vous aider. Agent: Veuillez nous accorder un moment pour vérifier le compte. Agent: Veuillez répondre à cet -email. Client: L'adresse e-mail est bien Valentine Thomas ? Client: J'ai acheté la Guilbert Gay et Fils en 2013 je pense, j'avais acheté Valentine Thomas à cette même occasion (Noël) et depuis je n'ai plus d'achat dessus car je ne m'en suis plus servie. Client: Là je souhaite l'ouvrir, ça demande mon code et ça me dit que mon compte est désactivé Agent: Oui, c'est l'adresse e-mail. Client: Là j'ai recréé un compte sous Valentine Thomas pour pouvoir l'utiliser mais j'aimerais retrouver mes achats et lectures sous Valentine Thomas Agent: Nous envoyons l'e-mail Agent: si vous avez des achats manquants, nous pouvons les localiser Agent: Nous avons juste besoin de quelques informations : Agent: Nous serions heureux de vous aider à localiser cette transaction pour vous. Client: Merci beaucoup. Client: je vais essayer Agent: Nous continuons avec vous.
en: Customer: Hello, Customer: I created an account years ago with the email address neveugilles@pascal.fr, but when I log in to my Guilbert Gay et Fils, it says that the account has been disabled. Customer: I would like to reactivate it, how do I do it? Customer: Best regards, Customer: The purchase date is very old, and it has the Guilbert Gay et Fils saga, for example Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a moment to verify the account. Customer: thank you Agent: thanks for waiting Agent: I located the account Agent: however, there are no purchases in this profile Agent: in order to verify your account I will send you an email Agent: Please reply to that email Customer: Is the email address Valentine Thomas? Customer: I bought the Guilbert Gay et Fils in 2013, I think, I bought Valentine Thomas on the same occasion (Christmas) and I didn't buy anything after that because I didn't use it. Customer: I want to open it, but it's asking for my code and saying that my account has been disabled Agent: yes, that is the email address Customer: I created an account under Valentine Thomas so that I could use it, but I would like to find the purchases and readings that are saved under Valentine Thomas Agent: I am sending the email Agent: if you have missing purchases we can locate them Agent: we just need some information: Agent: We would be happy to assist in locating this transaction for you. Agent: Please provide the following information in order to investigate. Agent: • Date you were charged: Agent: • Amount you were charged Agent: • How many times you were charged: Agent: • Your Postal code: Agent: • First 4 and Last 4 digits of the credit card: Agent: • Last name of the credit card holder: Agent: • If the receipt is from Guilbert Gay et Fils, please provide the Guilbert Gay et Fils number: Agent: the email is sent Agent: please reply to it Agent: I received your reply Agent: Please one moment, I will activate the account Agent: the account has been reactivated Agent: Please access with your email address and password Agent: if you have problems with the password please let me know Customer: Thank you very much Customer: I'll try it Agent: I continue with you

fr: Client: Bonsoir, j'ai changé d'adresse e-mail et les livres associés à mon ancienne adresse e-mail (qui n'existe plus) ont disparus de ma liseuse Maury S.A.R.L.. Client: Comment faire pour les retrouver s'il vous plait? Client: Merci Client: l'ancienne adresse était cpicard@loiseau.com Client: la nouvelle est Théophile Alexandre Agent: Bonjour, c'est un plaisir de vous rencontrer. Agent: J'ai maintenant vérifié les deux e-mails que vous m'avez fournis Agent: Et le problème est que les e-mails n'ont pas été changés Agent: Vous avez créé un nouveau compte Agent: Maintenant, vous avez deux comptes Client: Peut-on les fusionner? Agent: C'est exact, je peux effectuer une fusion entre les deux Agent: Un compte gardera tous vos livres Agent: Et l'autre devra être désactivé Agent: Lequel souhaitez-vous conserver ? Client: bonne nouvelle! Client: Il faut supprimer le compte hotmail puisque cette adresse n'existe plus svp Client: vous êtes toujours là? Agent: C'est fait. Agent: Veuillez synchroniser votre nouveau compte Client: J'ai synchronisé mais je ne vois toujours pas les anciens livres Agent: Sur quel appareil essayez-vous cela ? Client: la liseuse Maury S.A.R.L. Agent: Êtes-vous sûr d'être connecté sous le bon nouveau compte ? Client: oui Agent: Veuillez suivre ces instructions pour exécuter une réparation de synchronisation de votre bibliothèque Maury S.A.R.L.. Agent: Vous aurez besoin d'accéder à une connexion WiFi active avant de commencer. Agent: Remarque : Cela ne supprime aucun de vos favoris. Agent: Il rafraîchit simplement le téléchargement de vos livres. Agent: Sur votre liseuse... Agent: Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: Appuyez sur « Paramètres » Agent: Appuyez sur « Informations de l'appareil » Agent: Appuyez sur « Réparation » Agent: Appuyez sur « Réparation » maintenant Client: ça a marché, merci beaucoup pour votre aide! Client: bonne soirée Agent: Très bien ! Agent: Bonne journée ! Agent: N'oubliez pas que nous sommes toujours là pour vous !
en: Customer: Good evening, I changed my email address and the books associated to my old email address (which no longer exists) have disappeared from my Maury S.A.R.L. reader. Customer: How do I find them please? Customer: Thank you. Customer: The old email address was cpicard@loiseau.com,  Customer: and the new one is Théophile Alexandre. Agent: Hi there, very nice to meet you! Agent: I have now checked both of the emails you provided me Agent: And the problem is that the emails were not changed Agent: You created a new account Agent: Now you have two accounts Customer: Can they be merged? Agent: That is correct, I can perform merge between both Agent: One account will keep all your books Agent: and the other will have to be deactivated Agent: Which one you decide to keep? Customer: That's good news! Customer: You need to delete the hotmail account since that email address no longer exists. Customer: Are you still there? Agent: It is done! Agent: Please, synchronize your new account Customer: I synchronized it but I still don't see the old books. Agent: On what device are you trying this? Customer: The Maury S.A.R.L. reader. Agent: Are you sure you are signed in under the correct new account? Customer: Yes. Agent: Please follow these instructions to run a synchronization repair of your Maury S.A.R.L. library . Agent: You'll need access to an active WiFi connection before you start. Agent: Note: This does not remove any of your bookmarks. Agent: It simply refreshes the download of your books. Agent: On your eReader... Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap on settings Agent: Tap on device information Agent: Tap on repair Agent: Tap on repair now Customer: It worked, thanks so much for your help! Customer: Have a good evening. Agent: Great! Agent: Have a wonderful day! Agent: Remember we are always here for you!

fr: Client: Bonjour, je ne suis pas capable de forcer l'arrêt de ma liseuse Wagner. Client: L'écran est gelé suite à la connection à mon ordinateur. Client: Merci! Client: caubry@sfr.fr Client: Odile et Margaud-Gabrielle Jean Agent: Bonjour Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, merci pour l'information. Agent: Je serai ravi de vous aider. Agent: Un instant s'il vous plaît, je vais obtenir vos informations. Client: Merci Agent: Merci d'avoir patienté Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, si je comprends bien, l'écran de votre Wagner est figé, n'est-ce pas ? Client: Oui c'est exact Client: Il ne l'était pas plus tôt lorsque je l'ai connecté à mon ordinateur pour faire le ménage dans mes livres Client: En le rouvrant, j'ai pu constater que l'écran est figé sur une page du livre que je suis en train de lire Agent: Je vois, Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, je suis vraiment désolé de l'entendre. Agent: Je vais vous aider. Agent: Wagner a été chargée pendant au moins trois heures ? Client: J'ai essayé de forcer l'arrêt en cliquant sur le bouton d'alimentation sur le côté, mais rien ne se passe Client: Non il n'a pas été chargé pour 3 heures Client: Quand je le connecte à mon ordinateur même celui-ci ne reconnaît pas mon Wagner Agent: Je vois, Margaud-Gabrielle Jean. Agent: Donc, l'ordinateur ne reconnaît pas le liseuse, même après qu'elle ait été bloquée ? Client: Oui Agent: Et avant qu'elle ne se bloque ? Client: Mon ordinateur l'a reconnu car j'ai pu supprimer des livres dessus Agent: Ok, je vois, pouvez-vous s'il vous plaît connecter la liseuse comme vous le faisiez généralement pour la charger ? Client: Désolée je ne comprends pas ce que vous voulez dire Agent: Mes excuses Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, pouvez-vous s'il vous plaît connecter l'appareil pour le charger ? Client: Oui Client: Voilà c'est branché Agent: Merci, nous allons maintenant essayer une réinitialisation manuelle, s'il vous plaît. Agent: 1 Agent: Connectez votre liseuse à une source d'alimentation en effectuant l'une des opérations suivantes : Agent: - Allumez votre ordinateur et connectez d'abord le cordon d'alimentation USB fourni à votre ordinateur, puis à votre liseuse. Agent: - Branchez le chargeur mural (non inclus) sur une prise de courant, puis connectez votre liseuse au chargeur mural. Agent: 2 Agent: Appuyez sur le bouton d'alimentation et maintenez-le enfoncé jusqu'à ce que le voyant d'alimentation situé dans le coin supérieur droit de votre liseuse s'éteigne. Agent: Vous verrez un écran « Éteint » lorsque votre liseuse sera éteinte. Agent: 3 Agent: Relâchez le bouton d'alimentation. Agent: 4 Agent: Maintenez enfoncé le bouton d'alimentation de votre liseuse pendant 30 secondes. Agent: 5 Agent: Attendez que l'écran de restauration apparaisse. Agent: 6 Agent: Relâchez le bouton d'alimentation. Agent: L'écran de votre liseuse deviendra noir et commencera le processus de restauration. Agent: , je sais que le processus peut prendre du temps. Agent: Juste un rappel amical, je suis toujours là pour vous. Client: C'est fait et elle fonctionne Client: Je n'ai rien perdu en plus tout est bien là Agent: Génial Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, vraiment content d'entendre ça ! Client: Merci beaucoup! Client: Excellent service je ne regrette pas mon achat! Client: Au plaisir Client: Je vais tenter de reconnecter mon Wagner à mon ordinateur Agent: Mon plaisir Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, vraiment heureux de vous aider ! Agent: Pour cela ou une autre question que vous pourriez avoir, n'hésitez pas à nous recontacter. Agent: Nous sommes heureux de pouvoir vous aider. Agent: Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, veuillez me laisser savoir s'il y a autre chose que je puisse faire pour vous.
en: Customer: Hello, I can't force my Wagner eReader to quit. Customer: The screen freezes when I connect it to my computer. Customer: Thank you! Customer: caubry@sfr.fr Customer: Odile et Margaud-Gabrielle Jean Agent: Hello Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: One moment please, I'll get your details. Customer: Thank you Agent: Thank you for holding Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, if I understand correctly the screen of your Wagner is frozen right? Customer: Yes, that is correct Customer: But it wasn't earlier when I connected it to my computer to manage my books Customer: When I reopened it, the screen was frozen on a page of the book that I'm reading Agent: I see, Margaud-Gabrielle Jean,  I am really sorry to hear that. Agent: I'm going to help you. Agent: Wagner has been charged for at leas three hours? Customer: I tried to force quit it by clicking on the power button on the side, but nothing happens Customer: No, it hasn't charged for 3 hours Customer: When I connect it to my computer, it doesn't recognize my Wagner Agent: I see, Margaud-Gabrielle Jean. Agent: So computer doesn't recognize the eReader, even after it got freeze? Customer: Yes Agent: And before it got freeze? Customer: My computer recognized it because I was able to remove some books from it Agent: Ok, I see can you please connect eReader as you charged it usually? Customer: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean Agent: My apologizes Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, can you please connect device in order to charge it? Customer: Yes Customer: It's connected Agent: Thank you, now we are going to attempt a manual reset, please. Agent: 1 Agent: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following: Agent: - Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader. Agent: - Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger. Agent: 2 Agent: Press and hold the power button until the power light on the top-right corner of your eReader turns off. Agent: You'll see a 'Powered off' screen when your eReader is turned off. Agent: 3 Agent: Release the power button. Agent: 4 Agent: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds. Agent: 5 Agent: Wait for the Restore screen to appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Release the power button. Agent: Your eReader screen will turn black and begin the restoring process. Agent: , I know the process might take time. Agent: Just a friendly reminder I am still here for you. Customer: It's done, and it works Customer: I haven't lost anything, everything is there Agent: Awesome Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, really happy to hear that! Customer: Thank you very much! Customer: Excellent service, I don't regret my purchase! Customer: My pleasure Customer: I'll try to reconnect my Wagner to my computer Agent: My pleasure Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, really happy to help you! Agent: For this or another question you may have, please don't hesitate to contact us again. Agent: We are happy to help you. Agent: Margaud-Gabrielle Jean, please let me know if there's anything else I can do for you.

fr: Client: Bonjour, J'ai enfin réussi à télécharger mes livres acheté à la Dupont sur ma liseuse, mais elle n'arrive pas à ouvrir les documents. Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Dupont, pourriez-vous nous fournir l'adresse électronique de votre compte Dupont ? Agent: Je comprends que vous ne pouvez pas ouvrir vos livres récemment achetés, est-ce à propos de tous les titres ou de quelques-uns seulement ? Client: oui tous Client: je dois dire que mon mari avait téléchargé les livres du site Dupont sur notre pc, mais qu'on ne pouvait pas les ouvrir non plus Agent: Ok, pas de problème, il n'est pas nécessaire de faire le transfert manuellement, car vos comptes sont liés, vous pouvez les synchroniser via WiFi Agent: Avez-vous accès à votre écran d'accueil sur votre liseuse ? Client: oui je l'ai fait et toutes les couvertures apparaissent Client: par e-reader, vous voulez dire liseuse ? Agent: Non, je parle de votre appareil Dupont. Agent: Ou essayez-vous d'accéder à vos livres à partir d'un autre appareil ? Client: et bien j'ai acheter une liseuse Dupont, mais pas d'autre appareil Agent: Ok, alors oui, la liseuse Agent: Voyez-vous l'écran d'accueil ? Client: oui Agent: Ok, vous devrez d'abord vous déconnecter Agent: Pour SE DÉCONNECTER > Agent: 1 Agent: Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: 2 Agent: Appuyez sur l'icône Plus en bas de l'écran. Agent: 3 Agent: Sélectionnez les "Paramètres". Agent: 4 Agent: Appuyez sur Comptes. Agent: 5 Agent: Sous Dupont, appuyez sur Déconnexion. Agent: Un écran de confirmation apparaîtra. Agent: 6 Agent: Appuyez sur Déconnexion. Client: ok Client: c'est fait Agent: Une fois que vous vous déconnectez, vous devrez définir votre langue et votre réseau wifi sur votre liseuse. Agent: Ensuite, avant de saisir votre adresse électronique et votre mot de passe, vous serez invité à sélectionner une option de connexion. La bonne option pour votre compte est l'option de connexion Dupont. Agent: Pour choisir cette option de connexion, vous devez appuyer sur « Plus d'options de connexion », vous devrez y choisir Dupont. Agent: Vous pouvez également choisir Dupont Agent: Une fois que vous vous reconnectez, informez-moi. Agent: Joséphine Allain? Client: je suis sur la liste d'option Client: est ce que je dois prendre la premiere option proposé, sans aller sur la liste Agent: Ok, si vous pouvez y accéder, allez-y Client: ca y est Agent: Ok, c'est bien. Agent: Maintenant que vous avez accédé à votre compte, vous pouvez réparer votre compte. Agent: Sur votre liseuse... Agent: Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: Appuyez sur l'icône Plus en bas de l'écran. Agent: Appuyez sur Paramètres. Agent: Appuyez sur Informations sur l'appareil. Agent: À côté de « Réparer votre compte Dupont », appuyez sur Réparer. Agent: Appuyez sur Réparer maintenant. Client: je n'ai pas "informations sur l'appareil" mais j'ai "informations techniques" Agent: Ok, appuyez dessus Client: ok Agent: Cela peut également indiquer récupérer ou restaurer le compte Client: j'ai réparer votre compte Dupont Agent: Très bien. Agent: Maintenant, vous pouvez aller dans mes livres et voir si vous êtes en mesure d'ouvrir vos livres Dupont Client: Pardon, je voulais dire : j'ai "réparer votre compte Dupont" Agent: Ok, veuillez cliquer dessus Client: j'ai réussi à ouvrir un des livres, mais je n'arrive plus à revenir sur la page d'accueil pour vérifier les autres Agent: Il vous suffit d'appuyer en haut à gauche de votre écran pour revenir Client: ok Client: Je vous remercie beaucoup car je viens de passer plusieurs jours très stressants par peur de ne pas réussir à utiliser ma liseuse Client: Bon courage et bonne fin de journée. Client: Encore merci. Agent: Merci pour l'information. Agent: Je serai ravi de vous aider. Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Dupont, ce fut un plaisir pour moi de vous aider aujourd'hui. Agent: J'espère que vous passez une excellente journée !
en: Customer: Hello, I finally managed to download the books I bought from Dupont on my eReader, but it can't open the documents. Agent: Thank you for contacting Dupont, can you please provide the email address of your Dupont account? Agent: I understand that you are not being able to open your recently purchased books, is this about all the titles or just a few of them? Customer: yes, all of them Customer: I must say that my husband had downloaded the books from the Dupont site to our pc, but we weren't able to open them either Agent: Ok, no problem, there is no need to make the transfer manually, as your accounts are linked you can have them synced via WiFi Agent: Do you have access to your home screen on your e-reader? Customer: yes, I did it and all the covers are being displayed Customer: by eReader, do you mean reader? Agent: No, by e-reader I mean your Dupont device. Agent: Or are you trying to access your books from a different device? Customer: well, I bought a Dupont eReader, but no other device Agent: Ok then yes, the liseuse Agent: do you see the home screen on it? Customer: yes Agent: Ok, you will first need to sign out Agent: To SIGN OUT> Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the  More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Dupont, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Sign out. Customer: ok Customer: done Agent: After you sign out you will need to set your language and wifi network on your e-reader Agent: Then, before you type in your e-mail address and password, you'll be asked to select a sign in option, the correct one for your account is the Dupont sign in option. Agent: To choose this sign in option you need to tap on "More Sign in options", there you will need to choose Dupont. Agent: You can also choose Dupont Agent: Once  you sign back in please let me know Agent: Joséphine Allain? Customer: I'm on the options list Customer: should I accept the first option, without going through the list Agent: Ok, if you can access then go ahead Customer: it's here Agent: Ok, good! Agent: Now that you have accessed your account you can repair your account. Agent: On your e-reader... Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the  More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: Beside 'Repair your Dupont account', tap Repair. Agent: Tap Repair now. Customer: I don't have "device information", but I have "technical information" Agent: Ok, tap there Customer: ok Agent: It may also say recover or restore account Customer: I repaired your Dupont account Agent: Great. Agent: Now you can go to my books and see if you are able to open your Dupont books Customer: Sorry, I meant: I "repaired your Dupont account" Agent: Ok, please tap there Customer: I managed to open one of the books, but I can't go back to the homepage to check the others Agent: You just need to tap on the top left side of your screen to go back Customer: ok Customer: Thank you very much, these were highly stressful days because I thought I wouldn't be able to open my eRreader Customer: Take care and have a good evening. Customer: Thanks again. Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Thank you for contacting Dupont, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day.

en: Customer: Hello, Customer: jolyrichard@lesage.com Customer: no purchase to this date Agent: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine. Agent: Please let me verify your Chevallier account. Agent: I will be happy to assist you. Agent: Please give me a moment. Agent: Thank you for holding, What can I do for you today? Customer: I bought a Chevallier reader and I only have access to books in English Agent: Ok. Agent: I suggest to please add your billing address on your Chevallier account on the Chevallier website. Agent: Please use a computer. Customer: I'll try to do it, thanks Agent: Go to https://le.com/. Agent: Sign in to your Chevallier account. Agent: Click My Account near the top of the page Agent: Click account settings Agent: Click payment information  and save it Agent: When you have already updated the billing information, I suggest to please sign out from the Chevallier account on the ereader then wait 2 minutes and sign back in again. Agent: This will solve the issue. Agent: 1.-Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2.-Tap the  menu( 3 horizontal lines) More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Chevallier, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Sign out. Customer: Thank you Agent: Would you like anything else that I can help you with?

Customer: No, I didn't get any error message, and when I go to my books, it says that I still don't have any books Agent: Are you using an eReader or mobile app to open the books? Customer: It's a recently purchased Da Silva S.A. nia tablet Customer: Da Silva S.A. Agent: Thank you, I'll share a couple of steps to perform into the eReader then, okay? Agent: Please let me know once it has been done. Customer: done Agent: Very good. Agent: Can I please delete the billing information registrated in your account, so that you add it again? Customer: yes, no problem Agent: Thank you! Agent: Now, please open a new incognito tab Agent: 1 Agent: On your computer, open Coulon. Agent: Thank you for contacting Coulon, good day to you too!

en: Customer: I can't download my books to my eReader Customer: ihamon@club-internet.fr Customer: on 2020/12/21 Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Nice to meet you, Charlotte Robert. Agent: I hope you are having a great day! Agent: I apologize but I'm unable to find an account under the email that you provided. Agent: Please double check it's written correctly. Customer: yes, but I'd rather get my books back Customer: ihamon@club-internet.fr Agent: Thank you, please allow me a moment. Agent: Can I please know what eReader model you have? Customer: Chevallier.... waterproof Agent: Thank you. Agent: Can I please know what eBook title you're having issues with or is it all of them? Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Beside Repair your Chevallier account, tap Repair. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Repair now. Agent: I just need to refresh this interaction every two minutes so if you could let me know how's everything going that'd be great. Customer: I got several messages saying "oops, an error has occurred" Customer: I selected "repair", but nothing happens Agent: Please go to your eBooks and let me know if the issue is solved. Customer: should my eReader be connected? Customer: it's on wifi Agent: Yes, your eReader does need to be connected to your WiFi Customer: nothing happens Agent: I understand, please sign out and back in from your account. Agent: Keep in mind you need to know your password to be able to sign back in. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Chevallier, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: Tap Sign out. Agent: I just need to refresh this interaction every two minutes so if you could let me know how's everything going that'd be great. Customer: apart from the dictionary that's spinning, nothing happens Agent: Can I know if you've signed out of your account? Customer: yes..... nothing happens Agent: Are you still receiving the same error message? Customer: not even that Agent: I didn't quite get it. Agent: Are you still receiving the same error message? Customer: I didn't get any message Agent: Can I know what the issue is now? Customer: still the same Agent: Can I know what the issue is now? Customer: I can't open any books Agent: Are you receiving an error message? Customer: no Agent: Please do a factory reset on your device but please keep these points in mind Agent: Perform a Factory Reset on the eReader Agent: If you reset your eReader, you'll: Agent: Remove all books from your eReader. Agent: Any books you purchased from Chevallier can be re-downloaded after a factory reset. Agent: Lose any bookmarks and annotations you've made in your books since you last synced your eReader. Agent: Sign out of your account on your eReader. Agent: Reset all of your settings and preferences. Agent: Return your eReader to its original settings. Agent: To reset your eReader: Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the  Menu icon at the top of the screen. Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: Tap Factory reset under Advanced. Agent: Tap Reset now. Agent: I just need to refresh this interaction every two minutes so if you could let me know how's everything going that'd be great. Agent: Charlotte Robert? Agent: Are you still with me? Agent: If you contact  we'll gladly assist you. Agent: Thank you for choosing us. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: can you be reached by phone? Agent: We don't have a phone number line active currently. Customer: it's not easy to be on multiple screens! Agent: I can schedule a call back if you'd like?

en: Customer: Hello, Customer: I have gray spots on my screen on the side of my Chauvin S.A.S. buttons. Customer: gregoireferrand@orange.fr Customer: I have not bought any books yet, because I just received an e-Reader this week. Customer: I borrowed e-books from my library. Customer: Is it a defect of the e-Reader the gray spots in some places on the screen? Customer: It is not very pleasant when reading. Agent: Thew spots you are seeing are on the screen or the plastics? Customer: On screen. Agent: Have you tried to complete a reset? Agent: To perform a factory reset on your Chauvin S.A.S., please follow the steps below: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap Home at the top of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Tap Factory reset under Advanced. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Reset Now. Customer: No I did not try, but should I do it? Agent: Yes, please Customer: Reset is ongoing. Customer: I still see the gray areas. Agent: Where did you make the purchase. Customer: Chauvin S.A.S. Customer: online Customer: And then? Agent: I appreciate your patience, Agent: You would be able to return for exchange. Agent: I can also process a warranty replacement if you like? Customer: How does warranty replacement work? Customer: Chauvin S.A.S. in my city never has it in store but only online. Customer: So if I make the return with them, I lose my discount that I had during the purchase. Agent: I would request your shipping information and then send yo a link to verify information once you select agree. Agent: in 2 business days you will receive a shipping label vie email. Agent: The reader has a one year warranty Customer: Yes, I am interested. Agent: The process take 7-10 days to complete Customer: 7-10 days to receive my new e-Reader? Agent: I have sent an email requesting information Agent: Once I receive the response I will send part 2 of the email. Customer: I have not received the email yet. Customer: gregoireferrand@orange.fr? Agent: Yes , Customer: Nothing received. Agent: A few moments Customer: I will wait. Agent: I appreciate your patience. Customer: What are the next steps to take forward? Customer: I receive a new e-Reader and I return the defective one to you later? Agent: Once your defective device is received by Chauvin S.A.S., a replacement device will be shipped. Customer: ok. Customer: I have no risk of losing the device? Customer: I have not yet received an email from you. Customer: Is it normal that I have not received the email yet? Agent: To start the replacement process please provide all contact information below: Agent: Part 1 – Send us your contact information Agent: Name: Agent: Street Name and number: Agent: Apartment // Suite// Other: Agent: City: Agent: State/Province/Territory: Agent: Country: Agent: Zip/Post Code: Agent: Telephone #: Agent: Device name:

en: Customer: how do I download the books I just bought? Customer: hello Customer: I just bought books that I do not know how to download to my e-Reader Agent: Can you give me the e mail address of your Aubert account please? Customer: thibautchauveau@yahoo.fr Agent: thank you. Agent: please allow me a couple of minutes Agent: the books are in your library, you have a Aubert reader new and you have your personal information entered. Customer: goodbye
