en: Customer: I can't synchronize my reader. I have a new computer because mine was ko and I just made the purchase. Thanks Customer: devauxalphonse@vallee.com Customer: The Last Queen Customer: I also bought block 857 Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a moment to verify the account. Agent: thanks for waiting Agent: I am sorry that you are experiencing this issue, I will do my best to assist you. Agent: What is the error message or problem you are getting when trying to sync your eReader? Customer: Thank you! No worries, I am patient and I'm glad that you are helping me! Agent: you're welcome, I am happy to help Agent: Please tell me what is your eReader model Customer: Clerc Fischer S.A. Agent: Please try the following on your Clerc Fischer S.A.: Agent: To perform a sync repair on your eReader, please follow the steps indicated below: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Beside Repair your Clerc Fischer S.A. account, tap Repair. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Repair now. Agent: Then sign out and sign back in to your account and let me know if you can sync your library Customer: I still can't sync my last purchases, oops!! Agent: did you sign out of your account? Customer: No, I don't think so and I'm sorry but I'm really not tech savvy. My reader tells me on its Clerc Fischer S.A. that I am connected and that it is loading, but nothing happens after that Agent: you can follow these steps to sign out on your eReader: Agent: To sign out from your eReader, please proceed with the steps indicated below: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the Menu icon at the top of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Clerc Fischer S.A., tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: Tap Sign out. Agent: Is it possible? Customer: The name of several languages appear on the screen of my reader. What should I do? Agent: you can select your language Agent: to setup the eReader in that language Customer: What should I do now? Agent: you can follow the instructions onscreen to setup the ereader Agent: and check if you can open the books Customer: Some of my last purchases are already downloaded and others are pending. What does it mean? Agent: you should be able to download all your books Agent: you can press on the book to download it Customer: I don't understand why I need to download again books that I've read on my reader, and when I click on 'download', it says 'pending'. Agent: you can try a manual update via computer to clear any data error on the system Customer: Thanks a lot Christine Jacob, I will try solve this myself because every time I press the Download key it indicates that it is pending. Does it mean that the download will be done later or that I need to synchronize with the computer as I did before? Agent: you can turn off and on your ereader to see if it solves the issue Agent: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation. Agent: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further. Customer: Thank you very much Christine Jacob, I have 19 books still pending, but it seems that the problems can be solved with a little patience (patience that I have with humans, but not very much with the machines!!!!!!!!! Customer: I wish you a good evening. Thanks a lot, Christine Jacob Agent: thanks for your patience and preference Agent: do not hesitate to contact us again if you have any issue or doubt Customer: Thank you very much. Please don't forget to help me with the Clerc Fischer S.A.!!! Customer: My best wishes for 857. I wish that this new year brings you health, tranquility, and that we can live without this Covid issue! Agent: thanks for the wishes, I hope that you have a great and healthy 857 Agent: Thank you for contacting Clerc Fischer S.A., it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day Christine Jacob Customer: End of messages Customer: Goodbye Christine Jacob and THANK YOU again!!!

fr: Client: bonjour, Client: j'ai un problème avec l'importation de livre au fichier Courtois avec la protection Courtois Client: ma liseuse est bien autorisée et malgré cela j'ai toujours le message comme quoi elle ne l'est pas. Client: J?ai déjà essayé de repartir du départ en réinitialisant le tout mais ça ne fonctionne pas Client: anouk89@evrard.fr Client: je n'ai pas acheté de livre , je télécharge des livres par Courtois Agent: Merci pour les informations. Agent: Je serai ravi de vous aider. Agent: Je comprends que vous ne pouvez pas ouvrir certains livres que vous avez transférés d'une source différente vers votre liseuse Courtois, est-ce correct ? Client: je les transfert depuis Courtois Agent: Correct, oui, pas de problème, je serai heureux de fournir les étapes de dépannage correspondantes pour résoudre ce problème Agent: 1 Agent: Ouvrez Courtois sur votre ordinateur. Agent: 2 Agent: Supprimez le fichier de Courtois ainsi que de Courtois (sous Mes documents) Agent: 3 Agent: Assurez-vous que la date et l'heure de votre liseuse soient correctes. Agent: 4 Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre ordinateur : Agent: a. Agent: Appuyez sur CTRL + SHIFT + U en même temps. Agent: (Si vous êtes sur un Courtois, appuyez sur Commande + Maj + D). Agent: b. Agent: Entrez votre mot de passe Courtois. Agent: c. Cliquez sur Continuer. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: 5 Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre liseuse : Agent: 6 a. Branchez votre liseuse Courtois. Agent: b. Agent: Appuyez sur Se connecter sur votre liseuse Agent: c. Cliquez avec le bouton droit sur la liseuse Courtois à gauche sous Appareils. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation de périphérique. Agent: e. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: 6 Agent: Fermez Courtois. Agent: 7 Agent: Débranchez votre liseuse. Agent: 8 Agent: Autorisez votre liseuse et votre ordinateur. Agent: A. Branchez votre liseuse. Agent: b. Agent: Lancez Courtois. Agent: c. Autorisez votre appareil avec votre identifiant ID Courtois. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-téléchargez le fichier et transférez-le sur votre liseuse. Client: ok je vais essayer et je vous tiens au courant Client: merci Agent: Merci, je vais créer un e-mail de suivi pour m'assurer de ce qui s'est passé Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Courtois, ce fut un plaisir de vous aider aujourd'hui. Agent: J'espère que vous passez une excellente journée ! Client: alors j'ai refait tout le processus 2x et ça ne fonctionne toujours pas , suis désespérée Agent: Si le problème n'est pas résolu, vous devrez contacter le revendeur original du livre pour réinitialiser la licence. Agent: Êtes-vous toujours là ? Agent: Je suis désolé, pour des raisons de qualité, je devrai fermer ce chat si je ne reçois pas de réponse dans les 2 minutes. Agent: Je vais clore ce chat maintenant car je n'ai reçu aucune réponse. Agent: Nous serons ravis de continuer à vous aider par e-mail, ou vous pouvez nous contacter à nouveau à un moment plus opportun pour vous.
en: Customer: Hello, Customer: I have a problem with importing book to Courtois file with Courtois protection Customer: my e-Reader is well authorized and despite that, I still have the message as it is not. Customer: I have already tried to start again by resetting the whole, but it does not work Customer: anouk89@evrard.fr Customer: I did not buy a book, I download books by Courtois Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: I understand that you are not being able to open some books that you transferred from a different source to your Courtois e-reader, is this correct? Customer: I transfer them from Courtois Agent: Correct, yes, no problem, I will be happy to provide the corresponding troubleshooting steps to have this fixed Agent: 1 Agent: Open Courtois on you computer. Agent: 2 Agent: Delete the file from Courtois as well as from Courtois (under My Documents) Agent: 3 Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: 4 Agent: De-authorize your computer: Agent: a. Agent: Press CTRL+SHIFT+U all at the same time. Agent: (If you're on a Courtois, press Command+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Enter your Courtois password. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 5 Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: 6. a. Plug in your Courtois. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Courtois eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Courtois. Agent: 7 Agent: Unplug your eReader. Agent: 8 Agent: Authorize your eReader and computer: Agent: a. Plug in your eReader. Agent: b. Agent: Launch Courtois. Agent: c. Authorize your device with your Courtois ID login. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-download the file and transfer it to your eReader. Customer: ok, I will try and keep you up to date Customer: thank you Agent: Thank you, I will provide a follow up e-mail to make sure what happened Agent: Thank you for contacting Courtois, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day. Customer: so I have done the whole 2x process again, and it still does not work, I am desperate Agent: If the issue does not work,  you will need to contact the origin of the book to reset the lincense. Agent: Are you there? Agent: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes. Agent: I will close this chat now since no response has been received. Agent: I will gladly continue assisting you via email, or you can contact us again at a more convenient time for you.

en: Customer: Hello, Customer: We offered a Duhamel SARL e-Reader to my son for Christmas and unfortunately, despite all our attempts, it is impossible for us to read the books transferred. Customer: We gave all the permissions to both the computer and the tablet, but nothing works! Customer: Can you help me? Agent: Hello? Customer: constanceberthelot@devaux.fr Agent: For security purposes, can you please confirm either the date of your most recent purchase or the title of one of the ebooks/audiobooks in your account? Customer: I have none of them, we have just received it Agent: Hello, I will gladly help you. Agent: Which ereader model do you have? Customer: The Duhamel SARL Agent: And which version or Duhamel SARL do you have? Customer: 4.5 Agent: Have you tried to use the 3.0? Customer: No, I could not download it Agent: Can you please provide me the error that appears when you open the ebook Customer: It says we do not have the Duhamel SARL Agent: Can you please process this steps: Agent: 1) Deauthorize your Ereader Agent: 1 Agent: Turn on your eReader. Agent: 2 Agent: Connect your eReader to your computer using a Micro USB cable. Agent: 3 Agent: On your eReader: Tap Connect. Agent: 4 Agent: On your computer: Open Duhamel SARL. Agent: 5 Agent: Under 'Devices', right-click on Duhamel SARL eReader. Agent: 6 Agent: Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: 7 Agent: Click OK at the confirmation screen. Agent: 2) De-authorize Duhamel SARL Agent: 1 Agent: To deauthorize Duhamel SARL, click Help > Erase Authorization. Agent: 2 Agent: In the pop-up window that opens, enter the password for the account you used to authorize Duhamel SARL. Agent: 3 Agent: Click Erase Authorization Agent: The, please delete the file, download it again and try to transfer it Customer: Ok, I will try these steps again Customer: I come back Agent: Thank you, if the problem remains, please delete the authorization again and delete Duhamel SARL Agent: 3) Uninstall Duhamel SARL Agent: 1 Agent: Click on the Duhamel SARL icon at the bottom left corner of the screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Right-click on Duhamel SARL and select Uninstall. Agent: 3 Agent: Right-click once again on Duhamel SARL and select Uninstall. Agent: 4 Agent: When asked to confirm the uninstallation, click Yes. Agent: 5 Agent: Click on Uninstall. Agent: 6 Agent: Once the uninstall has completed, click on Close. Agent: The Duhamel SARL application is now uninstalled. Customer: OK, thanks Agent: Then delete the 3.0 version form this link Customer: thank you Agent: Please try the 3.0 version and in case that the problem remains, please contact us again Customer: oK, thanks Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Agent: Sadly I have not received a response for more than two minutes. Agent: For quality purposes this chat interaction will be closed, please remember you can always come back and we will be happy to continue assisting you.

Agent: Nous allons toujours essayer de suggérer des options, mais si les eBooks Dumas sont normaux, l'erreur provient de livres de sources autres que Dumas et des services utilisés pour les gérer, ce que nous n'avons aucun moyen de vérifier. Agent: Recevez-vous peut-être un message d'erreur ? Agent: Et si oui, quel est le message ? Client: Le message dit : «Votre liseuse n'est pas autorisée à ouvrir ce livre. Client: Ce livre est protégé par Dumas (Dumas). .. Client: Je vais essayer de contacter les gens de Dumas. Agent: D'accord, pas de problème, nous pouvons suggérer ces étapes au cas où, mais si les problèmes persistent, le support Dumas serait recommandé. Agent: Ouvrez Dumas. Agent: Supprimez le fichier de Dumas ainsi que de Dumas (sous Mes documents) Agent: Assurez-vous que la date et l'heure de votre liseuse sont correctes. Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre ordinateur : Agent: a. Agent: Appuyez sur CTRL + MAJ + D tout en même temps. Agent: (Si vous êtes sur Mac, appuyez sur Commande + Maj + D). Agent: b. Agent: Entrez votre mot de passe Dumas. Agent: c. Cliquez sur Continuer. Agent: ré. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre liseuse : Agent: a. Branchez votre liseuse Dumas. Agent: b. Agent: Appuyez sur Connecter sur votre liseuse Agent: c. Cliquez avec le bouton droit sur la liseuse Dumas à gauche sous Appareils. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation de périphérique. Agent: e. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: 6 Agent: Fermez Dumas. Agent: Débranchez votre liseuse. Agent: Autorisez votre liseuse et votre ordinateur. Agent: A. Branchez votre liseuse. Agent: b. Agent: Lancez Dumas. Agent: c. Autorisez votre appareil avec votre identifiant Dumas ID. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-téléchargez le fichier et transférez-le sur votre liseuse. Agent: Heureux de vous aider à tout moment Client: Merci, je vais essayer ça. Client: J'ai suivi vos instructions et j'ai toujours le même problème. Client: Décevant. Client: Je vais voir si Dumas a un service d'aide en ligne... Agent: Nous comprenons votre déception avec Dumas et son autorisation, comme indiqué, elles sont indépendantes et ont une page de support sur le site Dumas. Agent: Nous essaierons toujours d'aider et de suggérer des options comme vous pouvez le voir Client: Merci.

Agent: Not sure what yo umean If yo uhave issues with services not related to Dumas we would have noway to assist as they are not part of th eservices we can see for you , it is onlty normal. Agent: We will always try to suggest options  but please if th ebooks arfrom Dumas are normal then the error comes from books from sources other than Dumas and services used to manage them which are something we have no way of checking. Agent: Do you get an error message perhaps? Agent: and if so what is the message? Customer: The message indicates, "Your e-Reader is not allowed to open this book. Customer: This book is protected by Dumas (Dumas)... Customer: I will try to contact the people of Dumas. Agent: Okay no problem we can suggest these steps just in case but if issues persists contacting Dumas support would be recommended Agent: Open Dumas. Agent: Delete the file from Dumas as well as from Dumas (under My Documents) Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: De-authorize your computer: Agent: a. Agent: Press CTRL+SHIFT+D all at the same time. Agent: (If you're on a Mac, press Command+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Enter your Dumas password. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: a. Plug in your Dumas. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Dumas eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Dumas. Agent: Unplug your eReader. Agent: Authorize your eReader and computer: Agent: a. Plug in your eReader. Agent: b. Agent: Launch Dumas. Agent: c. Authorize your device with your Dumas ID login. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-download the file and transfer it to your eReader. Agent: Glad to assist anytime Customer: Thank you, I will try that. Customer: I have followed your instructions but I still have the same problem. Customer: Disappointing. Customer: I'll see if Dumas has an online help service... Agent: We understand your disappointment with Dumas and its authorization as stated they are independent and have a support page at Dumas website Agent: We will always try to assist and suggest options as you can see Customer: Thank you.

Agent: Cette option met à jour tous vos eBooks et résout des problèmes comme les eBooks manquants, les erreurs de téléchargement ou si quelque chose ne fonctionne pas correctement dans votre compte Imbert. Agent: Suivez ces instructions pour synchroniser la réparation. Agent: Vous aurez besoin d'accéder à une connexion Wi-Fi active avant de commencer. Agent: Si vous avez une liseuse Imbert : Agent: 1 Agent: Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: 2 Agent: Appuyez sur « Paramètres » Agent: 3 Agent: Appuyez sur l'option « information de l'appareil » Agent: 4 Agent: Appuyez sur réparation Agent: 5 Agent: Appuyez sur réparer maintenant Agent: Ensuite : Agent: 1 Agent: Ouvrez Imbert. Agent: Annuler l'autorisation à la fois de votre liseuse et de votre ordinateur. Agent: Fermez Philippe Masse Agent: 2 Agent: Ouvrez ensuite Imbert, ré-autorisez l'ordinateur et la liseuse à l'aide d'un identifiant Imbert. Agent: Fermez le programme. Agent: 3 Agent: Supprimez tous les fichiers des eBooks de votre ordinateur, ainsi que dans la corbeille. Agent: Vous devrez demander à votre bibliothèque de réinitialiser la licence Imbert de l'eBook et de demander une nouvelle copie de l'eBook Agent: 4 Agent: Veuillez ouvrir à nouveau Imbert et vous êtes censé être en mesure de télécharger le livre sur votre ordinateur, puis de le copier sur l'appareil. Agent: 5 Agent: Ensuite, vérifiez si cela peut être ouvert dans votre lecteur Agent: Après avoir essayé cela, veuillez vérifier si vous pouvez ouvrir des livres sur votre appareil. Agent: Si ce n'est pas le cas, assurez-vous de nous contacter à nouveau Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que je puisse faire pour vous aider ? Agent: Je suis désolé, pour des raisons de qualité, je devrai fermer ce chat si je ne reçois pas de réponse dans 2 minutes. Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Imbert, ce fut un plaisir pour moi de vous aider aujourd'hui. Agent: Passez une bonne soirée
en: Customer: The mention "Your e-Reader is not allowed to open this book" always appears despite the approach made to the letter. Customer: levymanon@charrier.fr Customer: none Customer: new member today Customer: it is for a loan to the municipal library for digital Imbert Agent: Thank you! Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information Agent: Did you properly authorized your Imbert ereader? Customer: I think yes. Customer: How to verify? Agent: In your ereader, tap on 'More' then tap on 'Settings' and then on 'Account'. Agent: At the bottom, you can find if your device was authorized with Imbert Customer: yes I see it well authorized Agent: If your device is authorized with Imbert and you are still unable to open the book, please try the following method: Agent: First, connect your Imbert device to the Imbert desktop app to update it. Agent: If you need the steps, please try the following link: http://diaz.com/ Agent: Then please try the repair account in your device. Agent: This  option refreshes all your ebooks and resolves issues like missing  ebooks, downloading errors or if something is not working properly in  your Imbert account. Agent: Follow these instructions to sync repair. Agent: You'll need access to an active Wi-Fi connection before you start. Agent: If you have a Imbert eReader: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap on settings Agent: 3 Agent: Tap on the option "device information" Agent: 4 Agent: Tap on repair Agent: 5 Agent: Tap on repair now Agent: Then: Agent: 1 Agent: Open Imbert. Agent: Deauthorize both, your ereader and your computer. Agent: Close Philippe Masse. Agent: 2 Agent: Then open Imbert, re-authorize the computer and the ereader using an Imbert ID. Agent: Close the program. Agent: 3 Agent: Delete all the files from the ebooks of your computer, ever from the recycle bin. Agent: You'll have to request your library to reset the Imbert license of the ebook and request a new copy of the ebook Agent: 4 Agent: Please open Imbert again and you are supposed to be able to download the book to your computer and then copy it to the device. Agent: 5 Agent: Then verify if it can be open in your reader Agent: After trying that, please check if you can open books in your device. Agent: If that's not the case, please make sure to contact us again Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Agent: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes Agent: Thank you for contacting Imbert, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: Have a nice evening

Agent: 2 Agent: Supprimez le fichier de Aubry S.A.S. ainsi que de Aubry S.A.S. (sous Mes documents) Agent: 3 Agent: Assurez-vous que la date et l'heure de votre liseuse sont correctes. Agent: 4 Agent: Annulez l'autorisation de votre ordinateur : Agent: a. Agent: Appuyez sur CTRL + SHIFT + U en même temps. Agent: (Si vous êtes sur un Mac, appuyez sur Commande + Maj + D). Agent: b. Agent: Entrez votre mot de passe Aubry S.A.S.. Agent: c. Cliquez sur Continuer. Agent: ré. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: 5 Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre liseuse : Agent: 6. a. Branchez votre liseuse Aubry S.A.S.. Agent: b. Agent: Appuyez sur Connecter sur votre liseuse Agent: c. Cliquez avec le bouton droit sur la liseuse Aubry S.A.S. à gauche sous Appareils. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation de périphérique. Agent: e. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: 6 Agent: Fermez Aubry S.A.S.. Agent: 7 Agent: Débranchez votre liseuse. Agent: 8 Agent: Autorisez votre liseuse et votre ordinateur. Agent: a. Branchez votre liseuse. Agent: b. Agent: Lancez Aubry S.A.S.. Agent: c. Autorisez votre appareil avec votre identifiant de connexion Aubry S.A.S.. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-téléchargez le fichier et transférez-le sur votre liseuse. Client: merci Agent: Je vous en prie. en: Customer: hello, my email is Marine Perrin and I have a Aubry S.A.S. e-reader Customer: this is the first time I download a book from the municipal library, it's on my e-reader but I can't open it; the message says: this book is protected by Aubry S.A.S.; since you removed the license from your e-reader, you must re-import it using Customer: I downloaded a free book from Aubry S.A.S.: Maintenant et à tout jamais Customer: can you help me? Customer: can you tell me what to do? Agent: I understand that you have recently added a book from a different source on your Aubry S.A.S. e-reader and are not being able to open it because of a Aubry S.A.S. license, correct? Customer: exactly Agent: OK, don't worry, I will be happy to help, here are the steps that you can follow to try to fix this matter> Agent: 1 Agent: Open Aubry S.A.S. on you computer. Agent: 2 Agent: Delete the file from Aubry S.A.S. as well as from Aubry S.A.S. (under My Documents) Agent: 3 Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: 4 Agent: De-authorize your computer: Agent: a. Agent: Press CTRL+SHIFT+U all at the same time. Agent: (If you're on a Mac, press Command+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Enter your Aubry S.A.S. password. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 5 Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: 6. a. Plug in your Aubry S.A.S.. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Aubry S.A.S. eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Aubry S.A.S.. Agent: 7 Agent: Unplug your eReader. Agent: 8 Agent: Authorize your eReader and computer: Agent: a. Plug in your eReader. Agent: b. Agent: Launch Aubry S.A.S.. Agent: c. Authorize your device with your Aubry S.A.S. ID login. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-download the file and transfer it to your eReader. Customer: thank you Agent: You're welcome Agent: You need to know that  if the following troubleshooting steps don't work, you would need to contact the library from which you got the books to have the Aubry S.A.S. license reset on each of them as this might be a license issue. en: Customer: Hello, once my book has been downloaded from the Delorme app to the Delorme eReader. Agent: Please let me verify your Delorme account. Agent: I will be happy to assist you. Agent: Please give me a moment. Customer: thank you! Customer: 4.5 Customer: I downloaded the app two days ago, so it's the latest version Agent: Ok. Agent: I suggest if you can de-authorize the computer and the ereader  from Delorme and then re-authorize it again. Agent: Open Delorme. Agent: Delete the file from Delorme as well as from Delorme (under My Documents) Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: De-authorize your computer: Agent: a. Agent: Press CTRL+SHIFT+D all at the same time. Agent: (If you're on a Mac, press Command+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Enter your Delorme password. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: a. Plug in your Delorme. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Delorme eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Delorme. Agent: Unplug your eReader. Customer: I did that procedure several times Agent: I understand but this is the way you can fix it or try the Delorme version 3.0 Customer: okay, I'm going to do it now Agent: Sure Customer: penelope62@tiscali.fr | Delorme ID (urn:uuid:#DEVICEID#) Customer: I have the same permission on Delorme and Delorme Customer: I see the eReader of the Delorme app Agent: Did you de-authorize first before you uninstall the version 3.0? Customer: I just cleared the permission on both sides Customer: I will install version 3.0 Customer: I can't find version 3.0. Customer: It always redirects me to version 4.5 Customer: are you still there? Agent: Hello, yes I'm still here. Agent: Sorry Agent: One moment let me find the link Customer: I managed to download version 3.0 Agent: Ok. Customer: I authorized my computer and then I clicked on Delorme and authorized the eReader Customer: I can see the reader and a book on Delorme. Agent: Were you able to download the ebook? Customer: yes Agent: Perfect, I'm glad that it worked with the version 3.0 Agent: Would you like anything else that I can help you with? Customer: now I'll see if I can read it from my eReader Agent: Ok. Agent: Make sure the ereader is authorize with Delorme. Customer: Thank you, everything is working. Customer: Are there any problems with version 4.5 of Delorme? Agent: Sometimes Version 4.5 for some reason doesn't want to work. Agent: This is why we suggest  to try with the version 3.0. Agent: I'm happy that it worked for you. Customer: Excellent, thanks for your help and have a good day! Agent: You're welcome. Agent: It was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: Have a wonderful day too. Agent: Goodbye.

en: Customer: My Delmas et Fils does not allow me to open a book from the library. Customer: I have Delmas et Fils on a Mac computer. Customer: Delmas et Fils tells me that I have not allowed my reader, but if I allow it nothing happens. Customer: guillonmanon@club-internet.fr Customer: A trick of the light Agent: Thank you! Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information Agent: To try and fix that problem, please try the following method: Agent: First, connect your Delmas et Fils device to the Delmas et Fils desktop app to update it. Agent: If you need the steps, please try the following link: http://www.morin.net/ Agent: Then please try the repair account in your device. Agent: This  option refreshes all your ebooks and resolves issues like missing  ebooks, downloading errors or if something is not working properly in  your Delmas et Fils account. Agent: Follow these instructions to sync repair. Agent: You'll need access to an active Wi-Fi connection before you start. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap on settings Agent: 3 Agent: Tap on the option "device information" Agent: 4 Agent: Tap on repair Agent: 5 Agent: Tap on repair now Agent: Then: Agent: 1 Agent: Open Delmas et Fils. Agent: Deauthorize both, your ereader and your computer. Agent: Close Adrienne Raymond. Agent: 2 Agent: Then open Delmas et Fils, re-authorize the computer and the ereader using an Delmas et Fils ID. Agent: Close the program. Agent: 3 Agent: Delete all the files from the ebooks of your computer, ever from the recycle bin. Agent: You'll have to request your library to reset the Delmas et Fils license of the ebook and request a new copy of the ebook Agent: 4 Agent: Please open Delmas et Fils again and you are supposed to be able to download the book to your computer and then copy it to the device. Agent: 5 Agent: Then verify if it can be open in your reader Customer: Ok I'll try that Agent: Very well. Agent: If you still experience the same issue after doing this, please make sure to contact us again Customer: Thank you Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: Not tonight, thanks Agent: Thank you for contacting Delmas et Fils, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: Have a good night

Client: oui pour un autre port USB Client: je n'ai pas un autre cable Agent: Nous pouvons essayer une réinitialisation aux paramètres d'usine, cependant, le contenu de votre liseuse serait effacé, si vous avez des livres tiers, vous devrez peut-être les ajouter manuellement une fois le processus terminé, Agent: En tant que conseil personnel, si j'étais vous, j'essaierai d'abord avec un autre câble Agent: Si le problème persiste, vous pouvez essayer la réinitialisation aux paramètres d'usine Client: je n'ai plus de livre sur ma liseuse donc je vais essayer les parametres d'usine Agent: Parfait. Agent: 5 Agent: Appuyez sur Réinitialisation aux paramètres d'usine sous Avancé. Agent: 6 Agent: Appuyez sur Réinitialiser maintenant. en: Customer: my eReader no longer connects to my computer Customer: ylenoir@petit.org Customer: none, I borrow from the library Agent: Hello, I would be more than happy to help you! Agent: Which eReader model do you have? Customer: Blanchard S.A.R.L. Agent: May I have your eReader software version Agent: To find your eReader's software version: Agent: 1)Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2)Tap the More icon at the bottom right of the screen. Agent: 3)Tap Settings. Agent: 4)Tap Device information. Agent: 5)Beside 'Software version', you'll see your eReader's version number. Agent: A version number will look something like this: "69 (#DEVICEID#, 5/27/19)" Customer: where do I find it? Customer: 69 (PBNMFRQY, 2020/11/09) Agent: Have you tried to connect your eReader with another cable? Agent: or tried another USB port? Customer: yes, for another USB port Customer: I don't have another cable Agent: We can try a factory reset, however, your ereader would be wiped, in case you have 3rd party books, you may need to add them manually after the process is completed, Agent: As a personal advice I will try first with another cable Agent: In case the problem persist, the you can try the factory reset Customer: I no longer have any books on my eReader, so I will try the factory settings Agent: perfect Agent: To perform a factory reset on your Blanchard S.A.R.L., please follow the steps below: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap Home at the top of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Tap Factory reset under Advanced. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Reset Now. Customer: I'm getting the information Agent: ok Customer: I can't log in Agent: Let me send you a reset paswrod e-mail Agent: I just sent it Customer: got it Agent: Perfect! Customer: no, Blanchard S.A.R.L. doesn't connect to my computer Customer: can you send me another connection cable? Agent: In this case, please try with another cord, and if the problem persist, you can process a manual reset Agent: Unfortunately we do not replace the cord, only the devices Agent: If you wish I can send you via e-mail the steps for the manual reset Customer: yes, please Customer: where can I find this connection cable Agent: I just send you the steps via e-mail, you can buy this cable at any store, is a generic miscro usb cord Agent: is a Micro USB cable Agent: You can buy it at any market or third party store Customer: thank you for the information Agent: We are really happy to help you. Agent: Also if you have further doubts you can answer to the e-mail I just send you Agent: We are always willing to help Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: no, thanks, have a good evening Agent: Thank you for contacting Blanchard S.A.R.L., I hope you have a good weekend

Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre ordinateur : Agent: a. Agent: Appuyez sur CTRL + MAJ + D en même temps. Agent: (Si vous êtes sur un Mac, appuyez sur Commande + Maj + D). Agent: b. Agent: Entrez votre mot de passe Pages Joly S.A.R.L.. Agent: c. Cliquez sur Continuer. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre liseuse : Agent: a. Branchez votre liseuse Pages Joly S.A.R.L.. Agent: b. Agent: Appuyez sur Connecter sur votre liseuse Agent: c. Cliquez avec le bouton droit sur la liseuse Pages Joly S.A.R.L. à gauche sous Appareils. Agent: Après avoir effectué toutes les étapes, veuillez à nouveau autoriser l'ordinateur et la liseuse avec Pages Joly S.A.R.L.. Désautorisez à nouveau l'ordinateur et la liseuse, puis désinstallez la version 4.5 de Pages Joly S.A.R.L. et redémarrez votre ordinateur, puis installez la version 3.0 de Pages Joly S.A.R.L. et recommencez tout. en: Customer: I chatted with Louise Guérin Customer: Following his advice, I have reset my reader. Customer: I have given Pages Joly S.A.R.L. permission again: My ebook was copied to my Pages Joly S.A.R.L., but I still cannot read it. Customer: thierryanouk@free.fr Customer: No purchase on Pages Joly S.A.R.L. but on Pages Joly S.A.R.L., and borrowing from the library Agent: Thank you for the information, I glad to heard that the eReader was connected to the computer. Agent: I see that you have another issue. Agent: In this case you have to de-authorize the computer and the ereader from Pages Joly S.A.R.L.. Agent: Open Pages Joly S.A.R.L.. Agent: Delete the file from Pages Joly S.A.R.L. as well as from Pages Joly S.A.R.L. (under My Documents) Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: De-authorize your computer: Agent: a. Agent: Press CTRL+SHIFT+D all at the same time. Agent: (If you're on a Mac, press Command+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Enter your Pages Joly S.A.R.L. password. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: a. Plug in your Pages Joly S.A.R.L.. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Pages Joly S.A.R.L. eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Pages Joly S.A.R.L.. Agent: Unplug your eReader. Agent: After you have done all the steps then please authorize the computer and the ereader with Pages Joly S.A.R.L. again. Customer: I can't read a book borrowed from the library Agent: I understand this is the reason you have to follow all the steps  as I mentioned. Agent: How is everything going? Customer: Ctrl + TAB + D = nothing opens... Customer: Oops, I wasn't in Pages Joly S.A.R.L. Agent: Ok. Agent: Please try again. Customer: I have followed all the steps but the new permissions show me the same message and I cannot read on my reader Agent: What version of Pages Joly S.A.R.L. do you have installed in your computer? Customer: 3617 Agent: Ok. De-authorize he computer and the eReader again  then  uninstall Pages Joly S.A.R.L. version  4.5 and restart your computer then install Pages Joly S.A.R.L. version 3.0 and do everything again. Customer: Ok Agent: Ok. Agent: Were you able to install the Pages Joly S.A.R.L. version 3.0 ?

fr: Client: JE NE PARVIENS PLUS A ACHETER DES LIVRES POUR MA Rivière SA. Client: IL Y A SYSTEMATIQUEMENT UN MESSAGE A LA CONFIRMATION "OOPS  SOMETHING WENT WRONG? Client: TRY LATER"? Client: LA CARTE DE PAIEMENT LIEE A MON COMPTE EST André Prévost. Client: VOUS POUVEZ M'EXPLIQUER OU M'AIDER ? Client: agathe56@marin.com Client: LES GENS HEUREUX LISENT ET BOIVENT DU CAFE Agent: Merci pour ces informations. Agent: Je me ferai un plaisir de vous aider. Agent: J'ai vérifié qu'il y avait des paiements refusés avec une carte de crédit sur votre compte Rivière SA. Agent: Maintenant, afin de résoudre le problème, j'ai effacé vos informations de paiement. Agent: Veuillez entrer à nouveau vos informations de paiement/facturation maintenant. Client: il y a encore eu un debit hier pour un achat Rivière SA Agent: Nous sommes heureux de vous aider à mettre à jour vos informations de paiement sur votre compte Rivière SA. Agent: Pour commencer : Agent: 1 Agent: Visitez https://www.mace.fr/ sur votre navigateur Web (Rivière SA, Rivière SA, Rivière SA, Rivière SA et supérieur). Agent: 2 Agent: Connectez-vous avec les informations d'identification de votre compte Rivière SA via Rivière SA Agent: 3 Agent: Cliquez à nouveau sur l'icône du profil et sélectionnez Mon compte. Agent: Cliquez sur Paramètres du compte. Agent: 4 Agent: Sous l'onglet Mon compte, à droite sous « Préférences et personnalisation », entrez votre nom et votre date de naissance. Agent: 5 Agent: Cliquez sur l'onglet « Informations de paiement » et entrez votre adresse de facturation (pays, adresse, code postal, numéro de téléphone). Agent: 6 Agent: Une fois terminé, cliquez sur le bouton « Enregistrer » pour enregistrer vos modifications. Agent: 7 Agent: Sous Informations de paiement, entrez les informations de votre carte de crédit (le code postal sur votre carte de crédit doit correspondre au code postal de votre adresse de facturation). Agent: 8 Agent: Une fois terminé, cliquez sur le bouton « Enregistrer » pour enregistrer vos modifications. Client: comment remettre mes infos de paiement ? Agent: Veuillez entrer vos informations de paiement et réessayer. Client: ok mais alors je vais quitter ce chat ok ? Agent: Veuillez laisser la boîte de discussion ouverte. Agent: Si vous discutez à l'aide d'un ordinateur, le chat ne sera pas déconnecté. Client: voila c'est fait Agent: Maintenant, veuillez essayer d’effectuer un achat à nouveau. Client: ok j'essaie Agent: Je vous remercie. Client: ca n'a pas marché, je recois le meme message Agent: Je peux voir que le paiement a échoué à nouveau. Agent: La carte de crédit ne libère pas les fonds. Client: ok je vais voir a banque Agent: Oui, s'il vous plaît, il pourrait y avoir une restriction avec les paiements. Client: la banque me confirme que la carte n'est pas bloquée Agent: Sur quel appareil effectuez-vous l'achat ? Client: liseuse Rivière SA Agent: Essayez de terminer le paiement à partir d'un navigateur Web sur un autre appareil, comme un ordinateur. Agent: J'ai vérifié que l'achat était terminé. Agent: Suivez les étapes ci-dessous pour effectuer une réparation de synchronisation sur votre liseuse Rivière SA (vous aurez besoin d'une connexion Wi-Fi avant de commencer) : Agent: 1 Agent: Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: 2 Agent: Appuyez sur l'icône Plus en bas à droite de l'écran (3 lignes horizontales). Agent: 3 Agent: Appuyez sur Paramètres. Agent: 4 Agent: Appuyez sur Informations sur l'appareil. Agent: 5 Agent: À côté de Réparer/Restaurer votre compte Rivière SA, appuyez sur Réparer/Restaurer. Agent: 6 Agent: Appuyez sur Réparer maintenant/Restaurer. Agent: 7 Agent: Lorsque la synchronisation s'est terminée, veuillez appuyer sur Synchroniser maintenant pour installer toutes les mises à niveau disponibles. Client: la je suis avec le call center de ma banque, ils sont entrain de mettre à jour des programmes liés au Rivière SA D secure , cela pourrait etre la cause ;; en revanche je viens d'acheter un livre  via mon pc ca a marché, mais effectivement via le PC , le paiement a du etre fqit qvec mon token Agent: Ah, oui, nous avons eu des nouvelles concernant ce problème. Client: est ce que cela veut dire que je ne pourrai plus acheter via ma liseuse ? Agent: Vos achats devraient être effectués sans problème après cela. Agent: Veuillez m'aider à trouver la version du logiciel de votre liseuse Rivière SA : Agent: 1) Allez à votre écran d'accueil. Agent: 2) Appuyez sur l'icône Plus en bas à droite de l'écran. Agent: 3) Appuyez sur Paramètres. Agent: 4) Appuyez sur Informations sur l'appareil. Agent: 5) À côté de « Version du logiciel », vous verrez le numéro de version de votre liseuse. Agent: Un numéro de version ressemblera à ceci : « 5675887 (#DEVICEID#, 5/27/19) ». Client: 5675887 (#DEVICEID#, 09/11/2020) Agent: Suivez les étapes ci-dessous pour effectuer une réparation de synchronisation sur votre liseuse Rivière SA (vous aurez besoin d'une connexion Wi-Fi avant de commencer) : Agent: 1 Agent: Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: 2 Agent: Appuyez sur l'icône Plus en bas à droite de l'écran (3 lignes horizontales). Agent: 3 Agent: Appuyez sur Paramètres. Agent: 4 Agent: Appuyez sur Informations sur l'appareil. Agent: 5 Agent: À côté de Réparer/Restaurer votre compte Rivière SA, appuyez sur Réparer/Restaurer. Agent: 6 Agent: Appuyez sur Réparer maintenant/Restaurer. Agent: 7 Agent: Lorsque la synchronisation est terminée, veuillez appuyer sur Synchroniser maintenant pour installer toutes les mises à niveau disponibles. Client: c'est fait Agent: Maintenant, vous devriez pouvoir acheter directement à partir de la liseuse Rivière SA Client: c'etait un probleme de version de liseuse ? Agent: Vous avez maintenant la dernière version disponible. Client: je croyais que les mises a jour du soft etait automatique Agent: Elles le sont, mais parfois, elles ont besoin d'un peu d'aide, en particulier lorsqu'une mise à jour des informations de votre compte Rivière SA est effectuée. Client: ok merci, j'essaierai demain, j'ai pu acheter un livre aujourd'hui et comme la banque va fqire des mises a jour cette nuit, je préfère attendre merci pour votre aide
en: Customer: I AM NO LONGER ABLE TO PURCHASE BOOKS FOR MY Rivière SA. Customer: A MESSAGE CONSTANTLY POPS UP WHEN CONFIRMING: "OOPS SOMETHING WENT WRONG? Customer: TRY LATER "? Customer: THE PAYMENT CARD ON MY ACCOUNT IS André Prévost. Customer: CAN YOU EXPLAIN OR HELP? Customer: agathe56@marin.com Customer: HAPPY PEOPLE READ AND DRINK COFFEE Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: I have verified that there are failed payments using a credit card in your Rivière SA account Agent: Now, in order to resolve the issue, I have cleared your payment information. Agent: Please re-enter your payment/billing details now. Customer: There was even a debit yesterday for a Rivière SA purchase Agent: We are happy to assist you in updating your payment information on your Rivière SA account. Agent: To begin: Agent: 1 Agent: Visit https://www.mace.fr/ on your web browser (Rivière SA, Rivière SA, Rivière SA, Rivière SA and higher). Agent: 2 Agent: Sign in with your  Rivière SA account's credentials through Rivière SA Agent: 3 Agent: Click on the profile icon again select My Account. Agent: Click on Account settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Under the My account tab, on the right under "Preferences and Personalization" enter your Name and date of birth. Agent: 5 Agent: Click the Payment Information tab and enter your Billing address (Country, address, postal code, phone number). Agent: 6 Agent: Once completed, click the "Save" button to keep your changes. Agent: 7 Agent: Under Payment Information, enter your Credit Card details (The postal code on your credit card must match the postal code on your billing address). Agent: 8 Agent: Once completed, click the "Save" button to keep your changes. Customer: How do I submit my payment info? Agent: Please enter your payment information and try again Customer: Ok, but then I'm going to leave this chat, ok? Agent: Leave the chat box open please Agent: If you are chatting though a computer, the chat will not be cut Customer: There, it's done. Agent: Now try to complete a purchase again please Customer: Ok, I'll try. Agent: Thank you Customer: It didn't work, I got the same message. Agent: I can see  that the payment failed again Agent: The credit card is not releasing the funds Customer: Ok, I'm going to check with the bank. Agent: Yes please, there might be a restriction  with the payments Customer: The bank confirmed that the card is not blocked. Agent: on which device are you making the purchase? Customer: Rivière SA reader Agent: Please try completing the payment from a web browser on a different device, like a computer Agent: I have verified that the purchase was completed Agent: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your Rivière SA (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start): Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines). Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Beside Repair/restore your Rivière SA account, tap Repair/Restore. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Repair now/Restore Agent: 7 Agent: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades. Customer: I'm on the phone with my bank's call center, they're updating the Rivière SA D secure programs, which could be the cause of this problem; on the other hand, I just bought a book via my pc and it worked, but on my PC I had to pay with my tokens Agent: Oh, yes, we had updates regarding this issue Customer: does that mean that I won't be able to make purchases using my e-reader? Agent: Your purchases should be completed well after this Agent: Please help me to find your Rivière SA's software version: Agent: 1)Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2)Tap the More icon at the bottom right of the screen. Agent: 3)Tap Settings. Agent: 4)Tap Device information. Agent: 5)Beside 'Software version', you'll see your eReader's version number. Agent: A version number will look something like this: "5675887 (#DEVICEID#, 5/27/19)" Customer: 5675887 (#DEVICEID#, 2020/11/09) Agent: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your Rivière SA (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start): Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines). Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Beside Repair/restore your Rivière SA account, tap Repair/Restore. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Repair now/Restore Agent: 7 Agent: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades. Customer: done Agent: Now you should be able to purchase directly from the Rivière SA Customer: was it an issue with the e-reader version? Agent: You have now the latest version available Customer: I thought the app updates were automatic Agent: They are, but sometimes, they need a little help, specially when an updates to your Rivière SA account's details are made Customer: ok thanks, I'll try it tomorrow, I was able to buy a book today and since the bank will make the updates tonight, I prefer to wait, thanks for your help

Agent: Dans ce cas, nous pouvons essayer de mettre à jour vos informations de paiement, cela devrait aider à compléter l'achat. en: Customer: I chose a list of books but I can't finalize it, what's wrong? Customer: nathalie92@noos.fr Customer: last purchase about 1 to 2 hours ago, la bete em cage for 13.99 euros Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a moment to verify the account. Customer: I wanted to take advantage of your €4.99 book deal???? Agent: Thanks for waiting Agent: I am sorry that you are experiencing this issue, I will do my best to assist you. Agent: what is the book that you want to purchase? Customer: it's not a book but several books, I have a whole list for just over 6955402 euros, I don't want to start all over again Customer: I only remember a book, le dernier d'Pierre Charles Agent: is this the offer you are referring to ? Customer: I can't read it, it's too small Agent: you can click on the image to make the image as the same size of your screen Customer: have you found my list, you have interesting offers but I can't purchase anything Customer: apart from Pierre Charles this does not seem to be it, it had many books (which I didn't note down, unfortunately, some of them for 2.99 euros Agent: do you get an error message during the checkout? Customer: I don't get anything because I can't finalize it Customer: you seem to be having a problem, if that is the case, let me know so that I can give up (unfortunately) Customer: why did it work with the 1st book but not with the others?? Agent: in this case we can try to update your payment details, that should help to complete the purchase Agent: is it okay if i delete your billing information for you so you can update it? Customer: sure Agent: please update your information on the website: Agent: To update your payment information please follow these steps: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to https://gimenez.com/. Agent: 2 Agent: Log in to your Hamon account. Agent: 3 Agent: Click on "My Account" and in the menu select "Account Settings” Agent: 4 Agent: Select the “Payment Information” tab. Agent: 5 Agent: Under “Payment Information”, select the type of credit card and enter your card number, security code (CVV), name on the card, and expiration date. Agent: 6 Agent: Click "Save”

en: Customer: Hello, a long time ago I used the Hervé S.A. account alexandriefischer@wanadoo.fr to buy and download books to my ipad. Customer: That address will no longer be used and will be deleted. Customer: I would like to transfer my points, purchases, etc. to my Hervé S.A. account. Customer: Linking the accounts does not solve the problem, as my purchases remain under the Hervé S.A. account... Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: I understand that you will no longer use your gmail address and would like to change it to another e-mail. Agent: Are you still able to log in with your previous email? Agent: Hello? Customer: The issue is not the address. Customer: It's the Hervé S.A. account. Customer: I cannot change my login address because these purchases were made with the Hervé S.A. account only. Customer: I will no longer use the Hervé S.A. and I would like to transfer my purchases to the Hervé S.A. EMAIL-1 account. Customer: The enter button on my ipad works 1 out of 20 attempts Agent: Alright, completely understand. Agent: I see that there is no account associated to your Hervé S.A. e-mail address. Agent: In order for me to be able to transfer your library saved on your gmail I will need you to create a new account with the other one and add your billing address information. Agent: I will gladly provide the steps on how to do this. Agent: As soon as your new account is created, feel free to let me know Customer: I have an alexandriefischer@wanadoo.fr account with Hervé S.A. Customer: Visitor uploaded: Hervé S.A..png Customer: URL: https://www.lemaire.com/ Customer: Type: image/png Customer: Size: 809492100 Agent: Oh, that's right, I just ound it Agent: You can add and update your personal information such as your Billing address, phone and Credit card details by following these steps> Agent: 1 Agent: Go to https://www.lemaire.com/. Agent: 2 Agent: Sign in to your Hervé S.A. account. Agent: 3 Agent: Click the My Account drop down menu and select Account Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Select the Payment Information tab. Agent: 5 Agent: Under the Payment Information heading, here you can add your billing address. Agent: 6 Agent: Click Save. Customer: I know I can. Customer: Are you asking me to do it? Agent: Yes, please Agent: Once the information is added I will be able to transfer your library Agent: I  see that your information was added@ Agent: The library and points transfer has been done successfully, you can now repair your account on the device you are using to see your books Agent: Are you using a Hervé S.A. e-reader, the Hervé S.A. Destkop App or the Hervé S.A. app for iOS? Customer: E-reader, ios app and I'll also use a desktop Agent: Alright. Agent: I will provide the instructions on how to perform an account repair on each of them Agent: On your e-reader: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Beside 'Repair your Hervé S.A. account', tap Repair. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Repair now. Agent: On the Hervé S.A. App Agent: From the Hervé S.A. App's home screen, tap More at the bottom of the screen. Agent: Tap Help. Agent: Tap Repair your account. Agent: Tap Repair. en: Customer: Hello, I just ordered and paid for a book (invoice number +33 5 46 88 67 26) but I can't download it to my Guillon Leleu SA reader Customer: Help! Customer: I have a doubt... Agent: Thank you for contacting Guillon Leleu SA, can you please provide the email address of your Guillon Leleu SA account? Customer: I have a gmail address bmartel@sfr.fr that might be suitable Agent: For security purposes, can you please confirm either the date of your most recent purchase or the title of one of the ebooks/audiobooks in your account? Customer: Henriette-Aurélie Vallée les pensées Agent: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine. Agent: Please let me verify your Guillon Leleu SA account. Agent: I will be happy to assist you. Agent: Please give me a moment. Customer: I'm fine, happy new year 54170 Agent: It's good to heard that you are doing well  and same to you a good year 54170. Agent: Thank you for waiting, I'm sorry you have issues with the ebook you purchased. Agent: What kind of device are you using to read the ebook? Customer: a Guillon Leleu SA e-reader Agent: Ok. Agent: Please click repair account on the Guillon Leleu SA ereader. Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the  Menu icon at the top of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Beside Repair your Guillon Leleu SA account, tap Repair. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Repair now. Customer: I'm sorry but the new book is still not being displayed Agent: Ok. Agent: In this case pleas sign out from the  Guillon Leleu SA account on the eReader then wait  3 minutes and sign back in again. Agent: 1.-Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2.-Tap the  menu( 3 horizontal lines) More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Guillon Leleu SA, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Sign out. Customer: ok Customer: I selected the "French" mode and I'm on the "welcome to Guillon Leleu SA" screen Agent: Ok. Then please set up Agent: Tap your language. Agent: Tap Set up over Wi Fi. Agent: Your eReader will search for local Wi Fi networks, and show you a list of what’s available. Agent: Tap the network you want to connect to. Agent: If necessary, use the on-screen keyboard to enter the network password. Agent: Tap Join on your keyboard. Agent: If necessary, tap Date, Time, or Time Zone. Agent: Tap Continue. Agent: Your eReader will download any available updates. Agent: The updates may take up to 20 minutes to complete. Agent: Tap the sign-in Agent: Hello are you still with me? Customer: sorry, I still don't have my new book Agent: Please tell me what email address did you use to sign in to the Guillon Leleu SA account on the ereader? Customer: bmartel@sfr.fr Agent: One moment please Agent: What I  found is that you have two Guillon Leleu SA accounts and this is the reason you are not seeing the other ebook, because you signed in on the eReader with the other account. Agent: Do you want me to transfer the ebook to the Guillon Leleu SA  account? Customer: Yes if you can, and if you could delete the Guillon Leleu SA account that would be great. Agent: Ok. Agent: Please allow me a momet Customer: Thank you, take your time. Agent: Thank you for waiting, I have transferred the ebook to the account you want and I have also de-activated the other account. Agent: Please sync the eReader and you will be able to see the ebook. Customer: I'm sorry but it's still not working. Agent: Please click repair account on the Guillon Leleu SA eReader. Customer: Yes, it's working. Customer: Thank you very much. Agent: You're welcome. Agent: I'm glad that it worked. Agent: I'm happy that you are able to read the ebook. Agent: Would you like anything else that I can help you with? Customer: Take care of yourself and thank you for your patience. Customer: Have a good one. Agent: You're welcome. Agent: It was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: Have a wonderful day. Agent: Goodbye. Customer: I think that you are not far from exellence.

fr: Client: Quand je télécharge un livre emprunté à une bibliothèque numérique sur ma liseuse, il s'affiche toujours un message d'erreur "Votre liseuse n'est pas autorisée à ouvrir ce livre" Client: annechevallier@tele2.fr Client: Perfect for you Agent: Le seul dépannage que nous avons pour Regnier est : Agent: 1 Agent: Lancez Regnier. Agent: 2 Agent: Supprimez le fichier de Regnier ainsi que de Regnier (sous Mes documents) Agent: 3 Agent: Assurez-vous que la date et l'heure de votre liseuse soient correctes. Agent: 4 Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre ordinateur : Agent: a. Agent: Appuyez sur CTRL + MAJ + D en même temps. Agent: (Si vous êtes sur un Mac, appuyez sur Commande + Maj + D). Agent: b. Agent: Entrez votre mot de passe Regnier. Agent: c. Cliquez sur Continuer. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: 5 Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre liseuse : Agent: a. Branchez votre liseuse Regnier. Agent: b. Agent: Appuyez sur Se connecter sur votre liseuse Agent: c. Cliquez avec le bouton droit sur la liseuse Regnier à gauche sous Appareils. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation de périphérique. Agent: e. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: 6 Agent: Fermez Regnier. Agent: 7 Agent: Débranchez votre liseuse. Agent: 8 Agent: Autorisez votre liseuse et votre ordinateur. Agent: a. Branchez votre liseuse. Agent: b. Agent: Lancez Regnier. Agent: c. Autorisez votre appareil avec votre identifiant ID Regnier. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-téléchargez le fichier et transférez-le sur votre liseuse. Client: Déjà tout fait à 2 reprises et aucun changement Agent: C'est le seul dépannage que nous avons. Agent: Nous avons ajouté Regnier comme fonctionnalité intégrée sur nos dernières eReaders pour éviter de travailler avec Regnier car il a toujours des problèmes Client: Comment ça fonctionne avec Regnier? Agent: Si votre bibliothèque fonctionne avec Regnier, allez dans les paramètres de votre liseuse, puis Regnier et connectez-vous avec les informations de votre carte de bibliothèque.Regnier Client: ok. Client: Y a t il une liste des bibliothèques qui fonctionnent avec Regnier? Agent: Il semble que vous devez aller directement sur le site Web d'Regnier pour le savoir. Agent: Ou pour contacter votre bibliothèque Client: Thank you. Agent: J'espère que vous passerez une excellente soirée Client: Thanks, you too
en: Customer: When I download a book borrowed from a digital library to my e-reader, I keep getting an error message that says "Your e-reader is not allowed to open this book" Customer: annechevallier@tele2.fr Customer: Perfect for you Agent: The only troubleshooting we have for Regnier is: Agent: 1 Agent: Launch Regnier. Agent: 2 Agent: Delete the file from Regnier as well as from Regnier (under My Documents) Agent: 3 Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: 4 Agent: De-authorize your computer: Agent: a. Agent: Press CTRL+SHIFT+D all at the same time. Agent: (If you're on a Mac, press Command+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Enter your Regnier password. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 5 Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: a. Plug in your Regnier. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Regnier eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Regnier. Agent: 7 Agent: Unplug your eReader. Agent: 8 Agent: Authorize your eReader and computer. Agent: a. Plug in your eReader. Agent: b. Agent: Launch Regnier. Agent: c. Authorize your device with your Regnier ID login. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-download the file and transfer it to your eReader. Customer: I did that twice and nothing changed Agent: It's the only troubleshooting we have. Agent: We added Regnier as a built in feature in our latest eReaders to avoid working with Regnier because it always has issues Customer: How does it work with Regnier? Agent: If your Library works with Regnier just go to Settings in your eReader, then Regnier and sign in with your Library card information Customer: ok. Customer: Is there a list of libraries that work with Regnier? Agent: It seems you need to go to Regnier's website directly to know that. Agent: Or to contact your Library Customer: Thank you. Agent: I hope you have an excellent evening Customer: Thank you too

fr: Client: Bonjour, je tente d'utiliser ma nouvelle liseuse Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L.. Agent: Je ferai de mon mieux pour vous aider. Agent: Utilisez-vous Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. pour transférer les livres ? Agent: Je viens de vérifier l'article. Agent: Quelle version avez-vous ? Client: Oui je l'utilise Agent: De Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. Client: 4889 Agent: Et quelle erreur s'affiche lorsque vous essayez de transférer le fichier ? Client: Le fichier semble bien se transférer. Client: Ensuite je déconnecte de manière sécuritaire (via la bare d'outil) le périphérique. Client: Ensuite, sur ma lisuse, je vais dans "Mes livres". Client: Je tente alors d'ouvrir le livre mais j'obtiens l'erreur Agent: Donc, Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. ne vous montre aucune erreur, mais elle s'affiche lorsque vous ouvrez le livre sur votre liseuse – est-ce cela ? Client: Exact Agent: Je vais vous guider à travers les étapes pour supprimer l'autorisation. Veuillez supprimer le fichier du livre et le télécharger à nouveau. Agent: 2 Agent: Connectez votre liseuse à votre ordinateur à l’aide d'un câble micro USB. Agent: 3 Agent: Sur votre liseuse : Appuyez sur Connexion. Agent: 4 Agent: Sur votre ordinateur : Ouvrez Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L.. Agent: 5 Agent: Sous « Appareils », cliquez avec le bouton droit sur liseuse Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L.. Agent: 6 Agent: Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation du périphérique. Agent: 7 Agent: Cliquez sur OK à l'écran de confirmation. Agent: 2) Annulez l'autorisation de Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. Agent: 1 Agent: Pour annuler l'autorisation deNavarro Cordier S.A.R.L., cliquez sur Aide > Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: 2 Agent: Dans la fenêtre contextuelle qui apparaît, saisissez le mot de passe du compte que vous avez utilisé pour autoriser Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L.. Agent: 3 Agent: Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Client: Pour l'étape 2 (Effacer l'autorisation) est-ce sur la liseuse ou sur Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. ? en: Customer: Hello, I am trying to use my new Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. reader. Customer: I got a message saying: "Your reader is not allowed to open this book" Customer: Hello André Lesage du Gilbert, Customer: It's André Lesage du Gilbert. Customer: I followed this guide: https://regnier.fr/ but I always get the same error message after transferring the book. Agent: Hello André Lesage du Gilbert, thank you for the information. Agent: I will do my best to help you. Agent: Are you using Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. to transfer the books? Agent: I just check the article Agent: Which version do you have? Customer: Yes, I'm using it. Agent: Of Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. Customer: 4889 Agent: And which error appears when you try to transfer the file? Customer: The file seems to transfer well. Customer: Then I securely disconnect (via the tool bar) the device. Customer: Then, on my booklet, I go to "My books." Customer: I then try to open the book but I get the mistake. Agent: So Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. does not show you any error, but it pop up when you open the book at your ereader, correct? Customer: That's correct. Agent: I will guide you through the steps to delete the authorization, please delete the book file and download it again Customer: Visitor uploaded: photo_2021-01-18_20-57-18.jpg Customer: URL: https://regnier.fr/ Customer: Type: Image/jpeg Customer: Size: 4889 Agent: Then please process the steps below: Customer: Ok. Agent: 1) Deauthorize your Ereader Agent: 1 Agent: Turn on your eReader. Agent: 2 Agent: Connect your eReader to your computer using a Micro USB cable. Agent: 3 Agent: On your eReader: Tap Connect. Agent: 4 Agent: On your computer: Open Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L.. Agent: 5 Agent: Under 'Devices', right-click on Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. eReader. Agent: 6 Agent: Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: 7 Agent: Click OK at the confirmation screen. Agent: 2) De-authorize Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. Agent: 1 Agent: To deauthorize Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L., click Help > Erase Authorization. Agent: 2 Agent: In the pop-up window that opens, enter the password for the account you used to authorize Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L.. Agent: 3 Agent: Click Erase Authorization Customer: For step 2 (Clear Authorization), is it on the reader or on Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L.? Customer: Ok, I did it on Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L.. Customer: Then? Agent: No problem, please authorize one more time the device Agent: And with the file downloaded again, please transfer it one more time Customer: Ok, it's done. Agent: Please check if the book is now able to be read Customer: Unfortunately, same mistake. Customer: Yet the book seemed authorized in Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L.: Customer: Visitor uploaded: Navarro Cordier S.A.R.L. Customer: URL: https://regnier.fr/ Customer: Type: Image/png Customer: Size: 4889 Agent: Have you tried to transfer any other ebook tittle lately? Customer: It's the only one I've been trying the process with since receiving the device earlier. Agent: Would you gently try with another tittle, just to make sure if the problem is the device or the ebook license Customer: Ok. Agent: thank you, please let me knoe if the problem remains Customer: No, not anymore. Customer: What might be causing the problem? Agent: Probably the ebook license of the first book is damaged, in this case, you may need to contact your library so they can restore the file Customer: Ok, thank you!

en: Customer: Hello, when I borrow a book from the library, I get this message: book protected by Godard S.A.. Customer: You must authorize your reader again with your Godard S.A. ID using Godard S.A.. Customer: I tried that, without success. Customer: regnierjules@alves.fr Customer: regnierjules@alves.fr Agent: Have you purchased any book with Godard S.A.? Customer: no purchase Customer: no Agent: Thank you. Agent: I understand you have issues with Godard S.A., is that correct? Customer: yes. Customer: Yes. Agent: Please try this next process. Agent: If you receive a Content Locked error when reading books on Godard S.A., the eBook  you’re trying to read is protected by Godard S.A. (Godard S.A.). Agent: DRM prevents the unauthorized copying or redistribution of eBooks to protect the rights of authors and publishers. Agent: Most public library eBooks are protected with Godard S.A.. Agent: Open Godard S.A.. Agent: Delete the file from Godard S.A. as well as from Godard S.A. (under My Documents) Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: a. Plug in your Godard S.A.. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Godard S.A. eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Godard S.A.. Agent: Unplug your eReader. Agent: Authorize your eReader and computer: Agent: a. Plug in your eReader. Agent: b. Agent: Launch Godard S.A.. Agent: c. Authorize your device with your Godard S.A. ID login. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-download the file and transfer it to your eReader. Customer: Thank you, it's too complicated! Agent: Do you want me to send you the steps via email so you can take your time to make this process?
